You´re standing on a virtual platform in space and virtual asteroids attack you from all sides. Shooting the, requires aiming well, as you can also destroy the outer shield which protects you from the outside. The platform is protected with a shield, but the platform shield can be destroyed and then you can die if an asteroid hits you. 

Bonus items help you to survive the level. Collect shield powerup, platform shield powerup and time freeze bonus items to win a level. 

Aim for the highest score and win against all others as the best asteroid space cowboy in our universe.

Ray Reflection VR - DEMO.title: Ray Reflection VR - DEMO
Ray Reflection VR - DEMO.desc: Shoot cubes from different directions in a room that reflects ray.

DOOR.title: DOOR
DOOR.desc:
This application realizes that people can join various virtual events.
You can enjoy communication with your friends and watch 3D contents and movies using the latest technologies.

Znanyeland - VR.title: Znanyeland - VR
Znanyeland - VR.desc:
Znanyeland is a virtual theme park, to provide a safe and cost-free theme park experience.
Immerse yourself in a virtual game and discover a world of limitless possibilities brimming with fun and excitement. 
Enjoy the thrills and enchantment of a theme park from the comfort of your own home. 
From the joys of a rollercoaster ride to levitating water slides, Znanyeland is the safest way to relish the excitement of a theme park. 
There is something for everyone! Get nostalgic and savour the thrill of it all. hop on and take a ride!

The Wild - App Lab.title: The Wild - App Lab
The Wild - App Lab.desc: The Wild is an immersive collaboration platform that uses virtual and augmented reality to help architecture, design, engineering, and enterprise teams save time and make better decisions by experiencing their work together, immersed in a shared virtual space. With native support for SketchUp, Revit, and BIM 360, The Wild aims to shape the future of collaboration by connecting people and their ideas across distance into a shared experience. For more information, visit thewild.com.

Mini Games.title: Mini Games
Mini Games.desc:
A collection of seated mini games including:

Piece Puzzle: Connect the pieces of an object to complete the puzzle.

Unblock The Road: Slide the blocks to connect the road.

Minesweeper: Find all the mines and clear the grid.

Shell Game: Pick which cup the ball is in, after the cups have been moved around.

Solitaire: The classic game of Klondike using playing cards.

Jigsaw Puzzle: Choose a picture and complete the puzzle.

Chess: The classic game of chess.

Checkers: The classic game of checkers.

Whack A Mole: Hit as many moles as you can, as fast as you can.

Gwack-a-mole.title: Gwack-a-mole
Gwack-a-mole.desc:
Welcome to Wacky Farms, home of the world largest pit-less avocados! 

On the farm your job is to smash the avocados as quickly as they appear.  You keep smashing and they keep coming. And at all cost avoid smashing the rotten avocados.

Game Features:
Timer Mode:  Just like the classic arcade game Whac-a-Mole, get as many as possible within the time limit.
Survival Mode:  Continuous play, but miss enough avocados in a row and you will be eliminated!
Three playable game boards, each with its own level of difficulty/skill.
Up to 8 players can compete using one headset.
Left handed smashers compatible.
Dual wield feature, for extra smashability!

3dRudder Setup & Tutorial.title: 3dRudder Setup & Tutorial
3dRudder Setup & Tutorial.desc:
The 3dRudder Wireless is a foot motion controller, a new kind of peripheral designed for handling motion at the feet while seated:
- It offers 4 axes, all progressive and combinable: forward/backward, left/right strafe, left/right turn, up/down,
- It enables 3 types of locomotion: flat, 3D (ex. Helicopter), and Steering (ex. Airplane piloting),
- Super intuitive, it lets you achieve in seconds impossible movements like orbiting around a target while shooting at it,
- It is used seated, providing a relaxing, effortless and secure experience to the user,
- Anyone can use it, even non gamers, in a matter of seconds,
- Finally, combined with the hand-tracking features of the Quest, it’s a game changer as the combination provides the users with an experience incredibly close to reality.

This setup and tutorial app will let you:
- Pair your 3dRudder with your Quest / Quest 2,
- Discover each of the 4 individual axis,
- Use those axes together in 2 experiences.

CoVince.title: CoVince
CoVince.desc: CoVince makes Learning and Collaborating adventure: more fun and more effective. Combining psychology and technology (Mobile / Virtual Reality / Augmented Reality / Artificial Intelligence / Smart Sensoring) into experiences you’ll never forget. CoVince is scientifically based and accessible for all.

Crawlspace.title: Crawlspace
Crawlspace.desc:
You saw an Ad about someone needing help with an odd job, retrieving his daughters missing dolls. Sounding like easy cash, you leave a message telling him you are interested. but as the nights progress, you realize why nobody else wanted to take this job.

----

Main Objective - Collect and return each missing doll from the crawlspace over 5 nights using a unique VR crawling mechanic.
Figure out how to stay safe from each doll with different attacks.
Relax at your home and enjoy some TV.


This game includes jumpscares.

Vinyl Reality Lite.title: Vinyl Reality Lite
Vinyl Reality Lite.desc:
Vinyl Reality Lite is a VR DJ application, simulating a traditional vinyl turntable setup, designed specifically for standalone headsets.

Load up your personal music collection and mix your favorite tracks using two accurately recreated vinyl turntables and a fully-featured 2-channel DJ mixer.

Key Features:
- Two accurately modeled turntables based on the iconic SL-1200 series
- Fully-featured 2-channel DJ mixer with per channel EQ, Filters, PFL and gain
- Record case to easily browse and load your personal music collection
- Separate master audio output which can be streamed over WiFi or recorded to a wave file
- Vinyl records with grooves that correspond to the track’s structure
- Support for all common audio file formats: mp3, flac, wav, ogg, aif, wma
- Unique and hands-free virtual headphones system to monitor cued channels
- Optional BPM (Beats per Minute) and Key displays

Z-Race.title: Z-Race
Z-Race.desc: Z-Race is a fresh take on the concept of VR racing, complete with high-quality graphics, unique track design, and our very own “Formula Z” racing ships. With 15 tracks of varying difficulty and creative lore, prepare to be immersed in a high-tech futuristic universe. Compete by flying 13 Formula Z ships across three different speed classes, each equipped with your own companion coach, voiced by your favorite members of the VR community. Intuitive controls and motion design create a game that provides the racer with little-to-no motion sickness, allowing absolutely anyone to play. The multiplayer experience in Z-Race is designed to assure you’ll always have competitive opponents to play against, and not be stuck with ones that are too slow—or too fast—for your skill level. No matter how good you get at flying Formula Z, you’ll never be alone. The faster you are, the more competitive your rivals will become.

Meteoric VR - Demo.title: Meteoric VR - Demo
Meteoric VR - Demo.desc:
Welcome to Meteoric VR DEMO! You can now play 2 levels completely for free. Do you want to play more? Join our Discord to get exclusive access to closed beta! Join link is down below.

Meteoric VR is a first-person space shooter where the objective is to defend the planet on top of which you're standing from flying meteors. One hit is enough to lose it all. Our signature feature is a unique movement that you have to make with your hands to achieve successful shooting.

Key features:
- Fully implemented hand tracking
- Fitness element
- Addictive gameplay supported by adaptive music

We created Discord as the main platform to interact with the community and beta testers. We share sneak peaks, hottest news, behind the scenes content and answer questions on a daily basis. If you are interested in the game or want to help us out by giving constructive feedback, please feel free to join the server.

JOIN US → https://discord.gg/VjgDjR5rkD

Atmos Arena.title: Atmos Arena
Atmos Arena.desc:
We’re the indie studio that made Swarm and since day 1, you’ve all been asking us for multiplayer…

Well here it is!

This is a PROTOTYPE, that we're using to explore concepts and gauge feedback, so all the core fun and movement mechanics are there but expect unfinished assets, and the occasional bug/networking issue.

Atmos Arena is now FREE for a limited time on App Lab:

_Race through a massive city environment, with multiple courses

_Swing with grappling hooks

_Fly with rocket boosters

_Currently supports up to 10 players, with voice chat

_Use grav boosts to scale soaring skyscrapers and explore the underground caves

_Deathmatch

*Quest 2 only for now

Gravity.title: Gravity
Gravity.desc:
Gravity is a virtual reality music visualizer. As soon as you start, you will find yourself in the middle of an audio-reactive environment where you can switch visual themes and backgrounds, walk around and jump with the teleport. It is a VR version of the same-named audio-reactive app for Windows and Mac desktops.
Oculus version looks like a cube, the same as the Gravity concept. You are standing inside. You can switch between different minimalistic sound-reactive themes surrounding you.
Another thing you have control of is an audio-reactive geometric form in the middle. Press triggers on both hand controllers to switch between different types of inner and outer things. Press both triggers quickly to get the metamorphosis effect.

Platformer Prototype.title: Platformer Prototype
Platformer Prototype.desc: Challenge yourself in this VR obstacle course. Walk on you hands and take on over X levels of pure joy.

Shotwood.title: Shotwood
Shotwood.desc:
Shotwood is a single player shooting game, with realistic guns and full reload mechanics. Duck and dodge between cover in full roomscale VR!

Welcome to the facility. Here you'll complete combat assessments - killhouse scenarios - clearing floors of deadly wooden targets.

Beat challenges to earn credits. Spend them on different firearms, attachments, and ammo. You'll need to buy LOTS of bullets!

Use the gun range to toy with each weapon simulation, or dive into a shoothouse floor and blast away. Tactical shooter or action hero, it's up to you.

Nasty case of shell-shock coming on? Take a break and enjoy the minigames! Balloon Stabber and Brick Shield. Or gamble away your earnings playing cards, with the Simple Jack arcade game.

Ace every challenge in an intense action-packed weekend, or duck in for 10 minutes to smash an assessment, and bail back out with time left for lunch.

Shotwood VR is the casual, offline, FPS game that you can play your own way.

Absolute Gravity.title: Absolute Gravity
Absolute Gravity.desc:
Participate in the space race championship to unlock all 37 circuits and 3 difficulty levels.
Possibility to design your ships with an infinite number of colors and a choice of 100 combinations of different models that you can acquire over the course of the races by increasing their powers.
90 FPS mode for the Quest 2.
Good game !

Bionic Hunter : The Ancient Sword.title: Bionic Hunter : The Ancient Sword
Bionic Hunter : The Ancient Sword.desc:
It's an open world Sci-Fi first person survival shooter with Story And Missions! Unlock New Weapons! Hunt down diverse amazing monsters and kill towering giants! Upgrade your weapons!Use your weapons, your Friendly Compact robots and Drones cleverly! Complete your Missions to unlock New functions that will help you survive longer and conquer the top slots of the worldwide Leaderboards.
 
 - Smooth motion and framerate
 - Οfficially Support  90HZ
 - Free Movement
 - Worldwide Leaderboards
 - Friendly Compact robots and Drones help you in the Battle
 - Bionic Punches
 - Melee weapons
 - Story
 - Missions
 - Dual Weapons
 - Hand Rockets
 - Snap turning and Smooth Turn
 - 14 Sci-Fi Weapons to choose 
 - 25 Gigantic Monsters
 - 4 Planet size Maps! 
 - Latest Gen Graphics (4 GEN)
 - Tons of PowerUps to choose 
 - Open world Maps
 - Over 10 Hours of GamePlay
 - Support Standing and Seated!

NOTE: You can play the Game offline but Internet connection required
to Submit your Score.

Cessation.title: Cessation
Cessation.desc:
Whether your toughest times are waking up and going through your morning routine, going through frustrations in your workday, or winding down at the end of the day without smoking, use 
CESSATION to practice your skills to resist cravings and deal with stress.

Fectar.title: Fectar
Fectar.desc:
HUGE LIBRARY WITH BRAND NEW VR CONTENT 
Experience the impact of a holographic presenter; Go to the 360 Degree Bubble to visit places you’ve never been before; View and interact with objects in 3D; Explore images and videos from different views; Host a Q&A, and so much more! 

LET’S GET STARTED! 
Learn more on our website: www.Fectar.com

additional_data.Languages: English, English (Australia), English (UK), English (US), English (Canada), English (South Africa), Arabic, Chinese (China), Dutch, Dutch (Belgium), French (Belgium), French (Canada), French (France), Portuguese (Brazil), Spanish (Argentina), Spanish (Chile), Spanish (Colombia), Spanish (Mexico), Spanish (Peru), Spanish (Puerto Rico), Spanish (Spain), Spanish (Venezuela)

IRON GUARD.title: IRON GUARD
IRON GUARD.desc:
IRON GUARD VR is a sci-fi tower defense game made in the spirit of classic RTS games. Lives of the surviving crew members are in your hands. Find out why the terraformer robots have rebelled and help evacuate your crew from an unknown planet, where survival is the new frontier.


FEATURES:

• A complete 360 degrees immersive gameplay.

• Different game modes and styles.

• Multiple upgradeable turrets, path blockers, mining harvesters.

• Possibility of non-linear equipment upgrade between missions.

• Arcade style shooting from an upgradeable drone using conventional or super weapons.

• A unique storyline revealed through cutscenes and dialogues.

• Amazing voice acting and music which adds to the gameplay in the true style of classic RTS games.

• Beautiful and stylized environments with mysterious atmosphere of an unknown planet, showcasing various biomes where battles ensue.

RVMX Arcade Game.title: RVMX Arcade Game
RVMX Arcade Game.desc:
-Compete to earn the highest score in Bowling, Basketball, Alien Shoot, whack a mole, skee ball,  button wall. 

-Decide how long you want to play bowling

-Choose the difficulty in alien shoot, whack a mole and button wall.

-Score extra points with yellow balls in Basketball and skeeball.

 -English and spanish language support

Green Beret.title: Green Beret
Green Beret.desc:
Green Beret: Rebels Operation is a virtual reality shooting 
game inspired in the great classic shooters that we have
enjoyed so many hours.

Play the role of a green beret infiltrated on an island taken
by a group of rebel soldiers.

Intro:

A group of rebel soldiers under Colonel Walker have taken a 
remote island located in the Pacific Ocean and formed their 
operations center there.

On the island there is an ancient castle that they are using as
a base of operations and use their underground dungeons as
cells.

The only way to enter the island is to be captured. In your
mission you have let yourself be captured and you have been
locked in one of the castle's cells.


Your next mission is to escape from your cell, annihilate all
the enemies to end the organization and get away from the 
island.

Are you ready to DIE?

IgKnight Strongholds.title: IgKnight Strongholds
IgKnight Strongholds.desc:
Tired of being trapped in your house due to the ravages of the plague? Why not fight back and turn your humble abode into a glorious haven! 

Gather resources by putting in hard work in chopping wood, mining stone etc. 
Build your new home to live in however you like.
Eventually become a stronghold so prosperous that you'll have to defend it from creatures raiding you for riches!
Be a hero in VR and you'll be as fit as one in real life!

If you're interested in keeping fit and diving into a fantasy world as a hero, check out our upcoming VR game IgKnight Stongholds! 

If you'd like to know more, join our discord channel and chat with us! Join early and be part of the development!

Discord: https://discord.gg/J6atgX6GxS
Follow our development: https://trello.com/b/YcOogQLg/igknight-strongholds

Learning Life - Mysteeri 24/7.title: Learning Life - Mysteeri 24/7
Learning Life - Mysteeri 24/7.desc:
Learning Life - Mysteeri 24/7 is an immersive escape game for vocational rehabilitation and youth work. Learning Life is a single-player game with linear gameplay with varying tasks and puzzles. 

In Learning Life – Mysteeri 24/7 the player adapts a role of a youth facing everyday challenges. Game is presented in first-person view and players are tasked to solve different issues and problems. The game has three levels: finding and moving to a new home, applying for a job or a place of study, and managing the chaos of everyday life.

The game was created in cooperation with Kajaani University of Applied Sciences, Laurea University of Applied Sciences and Häme University of Applied Sciences. Development was funded by Kela.

Tennis Fiction.title: Tennis Fiction
Tennis Fiction.desc:
The game consists of putting the colored balls into the containers of the same color using a tennis or paddle racket or by hand.
It is structured in levels that you must overcome, obtaining at least the minimum score. The game becomes more complicated with balls and containers of different types, different scenarios, varied music, colors, light, ..
Each level has “World Records” (record of all “Tennis Fiction” players) and its “Profile Record” (best score of players with profile in glasses, to play as a family). You can always repeat a level to try to break the record. All levels have a certain randomness, even if you repeat a level something will always change: colors, position of the objectives, ..
The game uses an artificial intelligence system to create a new level as soon as someone exceeds the maximum level. The new level will be more demanding, modifying the environment, colors, objectives, music, ... and calculating the minimum value to overcome it according to its difficulty.

Oculus Hand Gameplay Showcase for Unreal.title: Oculus Hand Gameplay Showcase for Unreal
Oculus Hand Gameplay Showcase for Unreal.desc: This demo contains reusable components for many robust hand tracking mechanics.

XR MANGA FIST OF THE NORTHSTAR\u3010The.title: XR MANGA FIST OF THE NORTHSTAR【The First Edition】Volume 1-6 Set
XR MANGA FIST OF THE NORTHSTAR\u3010The.desc:
The immortal masterpiece "Fist of the North Star", which has enthusiastic fans all over the world, is now available as the first installment of the XR Manga series!
You can read "Fist of the North Star" like never before in a VR space that perfectly reproduces the world view.
You can also enjoy the rhythm game "I am Kenshiro" where you can become Kenshiro yourself, and "VR Figure" where you can play with Kenshiro as a VR figure.

ANCIENT SOCCER.title: ANCIENT SOCCER
ANCIENT SOCCER.desc:
Welcome to the global VR tournament. Here you control soccer teams of special non-human players to complete various challenges. Tactical and fast-paced, this game is designed to be the arena of competition for VR players all over the world!

At the start of each challenge, huge balls fall from above. Score them into the goal as fast as you can! Your players kick the balls, attract the balls, shoot at the balls, explode the bombs near the balls and much more. There are a total of 18 player abilities in the game. Each challenge has a unique combination of them. Make smart decisions and act really fast to get the most out of your team!

After successful games, your global rating is updated. For example, you can be in the top 57% or the top 9% of all players around the world.

additional_data.Languages: English, French (France), German, Portuguese (Brazil), Russian, Spanish (Spain)

Hanna in a Choppa 3.title: Hanna in a Choppa 3
Hanna in a Choppa 3.desc:
Take flight in the latest instalment of the hugely popular Hanna in a Choppa series of games. This time, in fabulous 3D VR on the Rift and Quest, rather than crappy old 2D Flash. Guide Hanna through 10 bonkers levels, each with hidden secrets and achievements. Train your pet elephant Stompy, steal honey from pesky bees, humiliate upgraded OXOBot at his own game, and of course, The Button makes a spectacular return.

Join the Discord: https://discord.gg/cVw7frwNSk

As authentic to the original as possible! This game is a labour of love while also extending the core concept wildly. It's also very, very orange!

Includes over 60 unlockable Oculus achievements and 10 custom animated items for your Oculus Home. Can you get them all?

Plundering - the beginning of a genocide.title: Plundering - the beginning of a genocide
Plundering - the beginning of a genocide.desc:
From 1933 to 1945 the German Nazis performed the largest looting of cultural objects and personal belongings in history. Millions of artworks, antiques, and over 100 million books were stolen all over Europe. Special looting units were sent out to confiscate the most important and the most valuable art collections, libraries, and archives. Masterpieces by Rembrandt, Rubens, and van Gogh were stolen but also children’s books, pianos, jewelry, and personal letters.

The looting was a part of the Holocaust - A way to wipe out a people by depriving them of their history, culture, and humanity. Millions of items were never returned to their rightful owners after World War II. 

The exhibition Plundering – the beginning of a genocide is based on the award-winning books by author and journalist Anders Rydell about the German Nazi plunder of art and literature in Europe.

Plundering is produced by the Living History Forum in association with Folkets Hus och Parker and Immetropia.

RAV: Asteroids.title: RAV: Asteroids
RAV: Asteroids.desc:
Retro Arcade VR: Asteroids is a reconstruction of a brilliant game that conquered the reality of the 80s. Rediscover the possibilities of the game and experience it in a previously unknown form through the VR headsets. Move into the virtual world of the extraterrestrial universe, become captain of a spaceship and lead it. Face the lurking dangers in space. Immerse yourself in the atmosphere of arcade games, feel nostalgia and experience asteroids with modern technology. Don't let yourself be limited and go with times. Upgrade your ship, earn points, compete with friends and conquer the cosmos with RAV: Asteroids.

Expect:
- Unforgettable arcade experiences in VR
- Three game-changing control modes 
- Complex achivement system 
- Singleplayer and multiplayer modes

TunnelSkills - Access into Tunnels Under.title: TunnelSkills - Access into Tunnels Under Construction
TunnelSkills - Access into Tunnels Under.desc: This experience shows you the correct procedures to follow when entering a tunnel under construction. It also helps you to identify common hazards and safety features found in the pit bottom.

TunnelSkills - Emergency Response.title: TunnelSkills - Emergency Response
TunnelSkills - Emergency Response.desc: This experience guides you on the correct procedures you should follow in the event of fire in a tunnel.

TunnelSkills - Insights into Tunnelling.title: TunnelSkills - Insights into Tunnelling – Past and Present
TunnelSkills - Insights into Tunnelling.desc: This is an immersive 360 documentary where 12 tunnelling professionals share stories from their careers. These interviews are illustrated by photos and 360 video clips from tunnelling projects both past and present.

TunnelSkills - Shaft and Tunnel Construc.title: TunnelSkills - Shaft and Tunnel Construction
TunnelSkills - Shaft and Tunnel Construc.desc:
This experience takes you on 360 video walkthroughs of four different tunnelling methods:

· Tunnel Boring Machine
· Hand Mining
· Pipejacking
· Sprayed Concrete Lining

Downside Up.title: Downside Up
Downside Up.desc:
Welcome to the Downside Up room, where people walk upside-down, right-side-up and on their side. One person's wall is another person's floor, and yet another person's ceiling.

Build walkways and stairs so people can walk from one door in their dimension to another. But build fast! The people walk at the same time you're building! If they run out of walkway, they collapse.

You frantically scan the room. Behind you, a person walks towards the precipice. With seconds to spare, your mind races. What type of walkway do you build? How do you rotate it for a person who walks on his side? Can you avoid the other paths crisscrossing each other in all three dimensions?

The walkway just barely snaps into place before the person crosses the threshold. But there's no time to celebrate. People above and below you speed towards their demise. Can you save all of them?

Play the game using either Oculus Touch controllers or hand tracking. Hand tracking is in early access, so your results may vary.

Art Studio VR.title: Art Studio VR
Art Studio VR.desc:
Art Studio VR is an intuitive painting tool created for aspiring artists and visionary professionals. Create striking sketches, full-on paintings, and beautiful textures on your own 3D models. 

** The app is in development and currently in early access, get it with a discount price **

Highlights!

• Achieve different looks with a variety of tools that range in size, finish, and pressure.
• Import and texturize your 3D models with natural painting tools.
• Lifelike intuitive painting experience with a twist for the pros.
• Save your art as a .PNG or a .JPG.

Note: Some of these features will arrive in later updates. Leave us a comment saying what other features you would like to see!

Dance workout VR(Junior).title: Dance workout VR(Junior)
Dance workout VR(Junior).desc:
1.Song list: http://www.cqplanb.com/ccc/Danceworkout-songlist.html

2.We use microphone to react with rhythm, So If you refuse to open microphone permissions when first open app,there won't be reaction with rhythm. Never mind App still can work.

3.Make sure to review your surroundings and clear any obstacles in your play area before starting this game!

4.You 'd better have sweat proof sleeve on your Quest headset, you will sweat a lot happily when playing this.

5.Due to Copyright of music, we don't include music in this app. But we support custom import .mp3 into Quest and play. 
See how to https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=QfIdWHGalTY

6.If you can't keep up with the rhythm at first, please be patience to practice more times and also click 0.75X to slow down.

7.Will update new songs every month, If there are songs you wonder which are not in the list, Please don't hesitate to contact us immediately via E-Mail: 408077086@qq.com

MarsQuest.title: MarsQuest
MarsQuest.desc:
Welcome to Mars!

As premiered at World Expo 2020 (October 2021) in Dubai you and your friends now have the possibility to take your first steps on the surface of planet Mars!

Mars Quest is a "Party Challenge" app, a short experience, recommended for groups between 3 to 15 people.

Now tested and "approved" by no less than four astronauts: Marcos Pontes, Raja "Grinder" Chari, Nora Al Matrooshi and Christer Fuglesang.

You, as an Event Master, need to set up the environment so it becomes fun and safe for your group.
Observe that Mars Quest is a Room Scale experience which uses Hand Tracking and needs 10ft, or 3m, in one direction. We also recommend lowering the Guardian to a minimum (no quick moves).

Comments after the experience:
"Best experience I have had!"
"11 out of 10!"
"I have had many VR-experiences, but this is the best one so far..."

Hashtag #imiteraMarsQuest and @imitera on your social media channels when recording your friends seeing Mars for the first time :-)

Sharecare YOU Anatomy.title: Sharecare YOU Anatomy
Sharecare YOU Anatomy.desc:
Experience the human body like never before!

Sharecare YOU Anatomy is a larger-than-life exploration of the Human Body that allows viewers to visualize, understand and interact with their organs. This is not a boring anatomy app, nor simple 2D video demonstration–it is a fully immersive and interactive 360-degree experience you have to try for yourself!

Sharecare YOU Anatomy is the latest in the award-winning VR series from Sharecare, giving you an anatomical adventure like no other! It includes:

● Over a dozen organs to explore from all angles, both inside and out
● Informative labels and contextual information with voice-over pronunciations
● High quality textures and animations, showcasing the organs' functions in full detail
● Challenging self-quiz so you can test your knowledge
● Enhanced visual quality on Oculus Quest 2

Interested in more Sharecare products, including deeper looks into physiology, disease conditions and treatments? Find them here: https://www.sharecareyou.com

Shoot The Zombirds.title: Shoot The Zombirds
Shoot The Zombirds.desc:
A quiet evening on the cemetery finds you playing with your Pumpkin kids.
SUDDENLY, a horde of Zombirds clouds the sky! Those unprofessionally dead birds invaded your piece of Virtual Reality and will stop at nothing to kidnap your children.

NEVER GOING TO HAPPEN!

Play your role in the theatrical staging of these thrilling events!
Grab your ol' trusty crossbow and Shoot The Zombirds in this super immersive, endless gallery shooter. Destroy countless waves of dead birds, varied in shapes and sizes. Build your combos to increase the score or enter the Fury Mode! Collect and use power-ups to obliterate even the fiercest of the fowl.

FEATURES:
- Endless waves of Zombirds to slay!
- Diverse power-ups to aid you against the rotting fowl.
- Multiple difficulties appropriate for all skill levels.
- Local and on-line leaderboards.

Burning Shoes VR.title: Burning Shoes VR
Burning Shoes VR.desc:
1.Song list is here: 
http://www.cqplanb.com/ccc/burningshoes-songlist.html

2.We use microphone to react with rhythm, So If you refuse to open microphone permissions when first open app,there won't be reaction with rhythm. App still can work.

3.Make sure to review your surroundings and clear any obstacles in your play area before starting this game.
4.You 'd better have sweat proof sleeve on your Quest headset, you will sweat a lot happily when playing this.
5.Some actions are more suitable for people with basic dance foundation.More difficult for beginners. Search this "Dance workout VR(Junior)" for beginners.
6.Due to Copyright of music, we don't include music in this app. But we support custom import .mp3 into Quest and play. 
See how to: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ZGbSDxOCHMs

7.You can use touches in hands get scores, also you can drop them.

8.If there are songs you wonder which are not in list, Please don't hesitate to contact us immediately via E-Mail: 408077086@qq.com

Grapple Tournament.title: Grapple Tournament
Grapple Tournament.desc:
Grapple. Shoot. Score. Master the vertical combat.

Join Discord: https://discord.gg/A4fUKDC (you can notify others to play)

Grapple Tournament is an arcade shooter built from the ground up for virtual reality. You can enjoy complete 3D movement freedom by running, double jumping, wall jumping, climbing and using your grappling hook in an alluring stylized world.

Fight with more than 12 multifunctional weapons. Plasma pistols, revolvers, energy rifles, shotguns and rocket launchers await your command. Use them in one hand, two handed (with secondary fire) or dual wield for increased damage. What is your tactic? Mobility or firepower?

If all else fails you always have your energy blade and bow on your side.

Play multiplayer matches solo or with your friends. Party up and fight in various game modes on maps that were created with verticality in mind. Against players or bots.

To complete the experience prepare for a practice range, drone challenges, customizations and more.

Relaxteroids.title: Relaxteroids
Relaxteroids.desc: Lie back, relax, and shoot stuff. This game is designed to be played flat on your back. So chill and give it a shot!

Futuclass.title: Futuclass
Futuclass.desc:
Learn Chemistry through gamified experiences in Virtual Reality! Hold molecules in your hand in Reaction Balancing, shoot particles in Atom Structure, escape the room in Oxygen and experiment your way through Hydrogen VR lessons. Co-created with educational experts, the learning value of each VR lesson has been scientifically proven with real students in classroom and at home.

Each VR lesson comes with a lesson plan, downloadable at futuclass.com, including a link to an online quiz to test your knowledge before and after playing the VR lesson. Subscription also grants access to Teacher Portal, which contains invaluable resources for teaching in VR and soon will allow teachers to run classes with simultaneously connected headsets.

NOTE: Free version contains 3 demo lessons. To purchase subscription to access all content, please contact info@futuclass.com

Arabian Heroes.title: Arabian Heroes
Arabian Heroes.desc:
Let's ruffle some feathers!

In the beautiful Arabic desert one day everything changed – an evil sorcerer released his corrupted crows to invade the planet. Hopefully, the Arabian Heroes family is there to protect and have an unlimited supply of jelly to shoot the crows. But they are coming from everywhere and are harder to defeat!
Until now the Arabian Heroes receive help from their friends the white crows, who bring them coins to help in upgrading with accessories and make them stronger. 
The Arabian Heroes travel the worlds that are about to be destroyed. Although they fight hard, they need more people to join them. They won’t stand for long!

Join the Arabian Heroes in their battle to save the planet!

Fire Extinguisher Training VR.title: Fire Extinguisher Training VR
Fire Extinguisher Training VR.desc:
Our fire extinguisher training demo uses virtual reality for an immersive training experience. With hand tracking technology, users need to use the actual movements as they would in a real-world application making it far more realistic than other virtual training guides.

Users of the Robot Knight VR Fire Extinguisher Training app are taken through the steps required to safely put out a fire uing a fire extinguisher. They’re then put into a situation where they need to test those steps themselves. Users can pick up the fire extinguisher, pull the pin, aim at the fire and pull the trigger to spray.

Later versions of the fire extinguisher training will include different scenarios (testing each fire extinguisher type), timed trials and digital certification.

Hammer 2.title: Hammer 2
Hammer 2.desc:
Originally developed by XformGames and ported to VR by Lubos Vonasek Programmierung, Hammer 2 is an open-world shooter.

As a player you can board any vehicle, tank, helicopter and use them to your advantage when fighting against a huge army of enemies. The game is designed to bring the action to your VR headset regardless of whether you are standing or sitting.

Each of the 30 levels is a unique mission bringing more and more game logic for you to enjoy. From simple missions to the ultimate rocket shootout, this is what you can expect.

Kitesurfing VR.title: Kitesurfing VR
Kitesurfing VR.desc: Kitesurfing is an extreme sport. It is quite complex and requires some advanced skills to practice it. You can get impression of what it looks like, have some fun, face the obstacles, perform some jumps. The kite control is the key to this sport - it is required to be practiced, takes time to learn. With Kitesurfing VR you can develop some skills even at home.

BalloonWalker.title: BalloonWalker
BalloonWalker.desc: This game develops creativity. You can create the world using balloons in this game, and jump on balloons that are impossible in the real world.

Escape from Nefertiti's Tomb.title: Escape from Nefertiti's Tomb
Escape from Nefertiti's Tomb.desc:
Escape from Nefertiti's Tomb is a single player VR puzzle and adventure game that is fun and challenging for the whole family. You’ve fallen into the ancient tomb of the greatest Queen of Egypt. You’re trapped! It’s up to you as an explorer and archaeologist to uncover Nefertiti's secrets and escape your doom. With nothing but your brass lantern, your backpack, and your wits, you must solve the mysteries of the hidden temple.  Explore her tomb, find the exit and escape with your life to tell your tale of adventure, history, and fabulous jeweled riches.

Features:
- Experience a colorful, stylized re-imagining of an ancient Egyptian-themed tomb.
- Explore and make your way through several distinct puzzle rooms.
- Discover the solutions to puzzles specifically designed with the virtual reality experience in mind.
- Seek out Queen Nefertiti’s treasures by unlocking secret rooms and increasing your score.
- Avoid traps left behind to stop unwanted guests from stealing her treasures.

Rustavi Metallurgical Plant.title: Rustavi Metallurgical Plant
Rustavi Metallurgical Plant.desc: Rustavi Metallurgical Plant’s  Steel melting Workshop uses an electrical arc furnace and a continuous casting machine for producing square and round billets,  Rebar Rolling Workshop produces reinforcing bars and  Pipe Rolling Workshop produces hot-rolled large diameter seamless pipes.

Spring.title: Spring
Spring.desc:
Lose yourself in the simple pleasures of a mesmerizing experience.
Puzzles designed to help you enter a state of focused relaxation.
Go at your own pace. Solve the puzzles your own way.
Enjoy the moment. Find your focus. Feel different. Spring.

VR Advent Calendar.title: VR Advent Calendar
VR Advent Calendar.desc:
Come and visit this little Advent Calendar in Virtual Reailty.
Take a tour in Santa's Sleigh around the 24 doors, and take in the Christmas sights.

The controls are simple. You just need to find the next door and look at it for Rudolph and the other reindeer to transport you magically through the air to visit it and discover it's hidden secrets.

VR Balloon Battle.title: VR Balloon Battle
VR Balloon Battle.desc:
Ready to face a challenge up in the air??!!

In this multiplayer game you will have to prove your aiming skills by bursting your rival's balloons.

Create a local party or organize a remote one. Challenge your friends to a VR Balloon Battle!!!

DrumBeats VR.title: DrumBeats VR
DrumBeats VR.desc:
DrumBeatsVR is a VR drumming music game. You can drum to songs to unleash your inner drummer! In DrumBeatsVR you can practice on different drum kits, including Metallica and The Rolling Stones and you can play in three different environments (more to be added later). 

Epic Scenes:
Drum studio
Antarctica
Ocean Floor

Drum kits:
Basic Rock Kit
Metallica (sound and setup)
The Rolling Stones (sound and setup)

Free play
Play on the drum kits and environments listed above however you like

Arcade
Play along with our custom made songs

Escape From Dungeon.title: Escape From Dungeon
Escape From Dungeon.desc:
· In Escape From Dungeon you're one of heros who are sent to save the village. You are required to choose a proper roadmap from 30 different types of dungeons, and take the big boss down in the final level!
· Each adventure experience is different based on your option. Multiple choices of weapons and interactive traps are waiting for you.
· Player Number: 1 Player
· Standing Mode: Stand & play, no space requirement at all.
· Walking Mode: 1 player explore every unexpected dungeon free-roaming in a 4x8m space. You need to dodge attacks and find a proper angle to shoot down the monsters. 
· Features: Shift of multiple weapons brings you totally different free-roaming fight experience, intensive hit feedback + funny monster AI design, allows every player forget reality and totally being highly engaged in the adventure.
· Built-in level system, experience random 10 dungeons each adventure, feel more excitement & face more challenge combination each adventure! High playability!

Into The Now.title: Into The Now
Into The Now.desc:
Into The Now, is a heart-stopping, immersive dive into our Oceans. Michael Muller takes you on nine, inspiring, one-of-a-kind experiences. 

From the Galapagos Islands to the Arctic Circle, you will dive with pods of Killer Whales, Pregnant Whale Sharks, Manatees, schools of Hammerheads, 500+ Dolphins, swimming out of the cage with Great White Sharks and more. Each film not only highlights the many issues our Oceans are facing, but also aims to change perceptions about the many creatures that inhabit our Oceans. When you find yourself face to face with a Crocodile or swimming amongst half a dozen Great White sharks, you will see these animals in their true light and not the monsters you may have been taught they were. 

This is also a personal story about conquering fear. Muller confronts some of his deepest fears and see how these experiences changed his life. This is an extraordinary exploration into the Sea, and the closest you will ever get to these creatures without getting wet.

Paranormal Detective: Escape from the 80.title: Paranormal Detective: Escape from the 80's
Paranormal Detective: Escape from the 80.desc: As a detective specializing in unusual cases, you just found the cold case of the century!  Back in 1987, Corey Savage disappeared off the face of the earth. His parents noticed the TV and Game Glove buzzing with a strange electricity... Could these objects hold the keys to this mystery?  Can you solve the puzzles in this preserved game room to unlock the secret of Corey’s disappearance?  Will you be transported to a retro-futuristic cyber TV world to face off against an evil villain?

Retro Bricks 1982.title: Retro Bricks 1982
Retro Bricks 1982.desc:
When I bought the Oculus Quest, about a year after its release, my first goal was to create a game I would be proud of.

While digging into my memories, I remembered that I used to spend hours challenging a great classic from my childhood: MicroVision's Brick Breaker.

Since the original version in 1976, many variants have emerged. But I hope you'll enjoy mine, Retro Bricks 1982, both retro & modern.

The beta version here contains 15 test levels, some music and hopefully a lot of fun!

I wish to be able to offer the final version in the next few weeks. In the meantime, don't hesitate to send me your feedback!

NeoPunk

additional_data.Languages: English, English (Australia), English (UK), English (US), English (Canada), English (South Africa), French (Belgium), French (Canada), French (France), German, German (Switzerland), Italian, Spanish (Argentina), Spanish (Chile), Spanish (Colombia), Spanish (Mexico), Spanish (Peru), Spanish (Puerto Rico), Spanish (Spain), Spanish (Venezuela)

Teleport Scotland.title: Teleport Scotland
Teleport Scotland.desc:
Ever wanted to travel a whole country in a day? Explore vast locations across Scotland, from castle ruins to the beautiful beaches lining the north coast. See the famous Hogwarts Express chugging along the Glenfinnan Viaduct, escape to mysterious lochs, historical landmarks, and bustling cities. 

Immerse yourself in stereoscopic 360° videos and spatial audio. Take your own time as you jump from location to location.

Mailbox Baseball.title: Mailbox Baseball
Mailbox Baseball.desc:
The college rebels' favorite pastime comes to virtual reality - Mailbox Baseball will have you smashing the daily post right out of the park. Go for the highest score or longest combo as your buddy picks up the pace - but remember traditional Mailbox Baseball rules apply:

- Hit the box clean - no hacking the pole!
- Yes, your driver is your opposition, so look out for some jerky steering...
- 3 strikes and you’re out!

With a fun, retro arcade feel, its a smashing good time for all ages.

Little Island.title: Little Island
Little Island.desc:
Little Island offers you the experience of interacting with a variety of cute animals in a VR space. Dive into a world full of nature and adorable animal children. You will be healed by interacting with the lively animals. Help them in their time of need, play with them, and love them.

Features:
・Beautiful nature and interacting with lovely animals are healing you
・Beautiful nature and interacting with lovely animals are healing you
・A variety of 18 adorable animal children
・Five unique locations where animals live, including forests and ice fields.
・Various items for playing with animals
・Fishing and growing flowers for relaxation.

High Desert Eclipse.title: High Desert Eclipse
High Desert Eclipse.desc:
The entire scenic horizon becomes sunrise and sunset during the High Desert Eclipse. From your remote majestic hilltop, see the rapidly encroaching shadow of the Moon turn day into twilight. 

The heavens and earth had to move to capture and bring you this 360 documentary short film from its unique vantage point! 

Experience the 2017 great American total solar eclipse like no other, in 4k 360 video. Feature spans through 2 minutes each of pre-, full, and post-totality from its remote location in the Oregon desert. The “once-in-a-lifetime” experience that users at VR events and film festivals love. 

Brings back fond memories for anyone fortunate enough to have seen a full eclipse in their lifetime and a rare chance to see one for those unable to travel.

PNX Labs Mechanics Demo.title: PNX Labs Mechanics Demo
PNX Labs Mechanics Demo.desc:
Demo of Mechanics Virtual Labs developed by PNX Labs GmbH. Test different specimens in a tension universal test machine, visualize deformation of a simple supported beam and analyze the deformation of automotive springs. pnxlabs.com. Full version contains over 20 experiments with additional features such as real time CSV data recording and over 100 specimens and materials. Some of the Experiments in the full package are:

1. Virtual Lab Mechanics - Tension Test 
2. Virtual Lab Mechanics - Bending Test Simple Supported Beam 
3. Virtual Lab Mechanics - Bending test cantilever beam 
4. Virtual Lab Mechanics - Torsion Test 
5. Virtual Lab Mechanics - Brinell Hardness Test 
6. Virtual Lab Mechanics - Rockwell Hardness Test 
7. Virtual Lab Mechanics - Spring Test 
8. Virtual Lab Mechanics - Compression Test 
9. Virtual Lab Mechanics - Izod Impact Test 
10. Virtual Lab Mechanics - Charpy Impact Test 
11. Virtual Lab Mechanics - Fatigue Test

For full version contact us at pnxlabs.com

Body Charger VR.title: Body Charger VR
Body Charger VR.desc:
1.  Song list: 
http://www.cqplanb.com/ccc/Bodycharger-songlist.html

2.  We use microphone to react with rhythm, So If you refuse to open microphone permissions when first open app,there won't be reaction with rhythm. Never mind App still can work.

3.  Make sure to review your surroundings and clear any obstacles in your play area before starting this game.

4. You 'd better have sweat proof sleeve on your Quest headset, you will sweat a lot happily when playing this.

5.  Due to Copyright of music, we don't include music in this app. But we support custom import .mp3 into Quest and play. See how to https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=QfIdWHGalTY

6.  If you can't keep up with the rhythm at first, please be patience to practice more times and also click 0.75X to slow down.

7.  If there are songs you wonder which are not in the list, Please don't hesitate to contact us immediately via E-Mail: 408077086@qq.com

Komodo.title: Komodo
Komodo.desc:
Komodo: A Paradise Under Pressure'  is a 20-minute VR Nature documentary which takes you on an incredible journey through the waters and islands of Komodo National Park; a unique ecosystem situated in the Indonesian archipelago.  
 
World record freediver and Ocean Explorer William Winram, together with his protégé marine biologist Lukas Müller, go to extreme lengths to show you the beauty of the Park and some of its iconic inhabitants, including the deadly Komodo Dragon and the giant Reef Manta Ray.

During their dives they assist Nat Geo’s “Queen of Mantas” Andrea Marshall who is researching the manta ray population in the Park. Together, the three of them have some amazing encounters with the wildlife they are fighting to protect.  Sadly, it is not all beauty and wonder; the team is confronted with serious plastic pollution which is putting a growing strain on this magical place.

VR Gorilla,  Watermen Project and Blend Media have partnered to produce this long-form VR documentary.

additional_data.Supported Controllers: Oculus Touch, Gamepad, Touch (as Gamepad), Hand Tracking

VRpatients.title: VRpatients
VRpatients.desc: VR Patients is a medical simulation game that helps to reinforce core medical skills in a fun and engaging environment.

Blobby VR.title: Blobby VR
Blobby VR.desc:
Blobby VR is a casual arcade style and competitive multiplayer game for the oculus quest. Experience the thrilling joy of  a volleyball match in VR as a blob playing against another human or an Artificial Intelligence player. Practice in single player mode or play against your friends using Local Area Network or the Cloud. The game is created in the most accessible way, so starting your career is extremely easy.

In Blobby VR, you are a blob in a virtual beach scenario. A game lasts 90 seconds. Within this time, you have to use your head to bounce the ball back to the opponent - no hands involved. Practice tricky moves 
like smash balls or fool the other player with close hits. Once you've tried, you will immediately become addicted to this fast and fun to play game.

Dyson Demo VR.title: Dyson Demo VR
Dyson Demo VR.desc: Committed to solving problems others ignore, our newest Dyson Demo Store is now wherever you are.    Inspired by the same simulation tools Dyson engineers use to develop technologies, Dyson Demo VR gives you the freedom to discover, choose and learn through virtual reality.  Immerse yourself in a space where you can interact with Dyson machines and understand how they’ve been engineered to solve real world problems. All from the comfort of your own home.

Yet Another Sandbox Game VR.title: Yet Another Sandbox Game VR
Yet Another Sandbox Game VR.desc: This Game Has Multiplayer Mechanics that you can mess around with. there is a temporary horror minigame to celebrate Halloween with. this game is in beta so nothing will be an magnum opus. have a good time!

Space Salvage Demo.title: Space Salvage Demo
Space Salvage Demo.desc:
This is a one level demo for the up-coming game Space Salvage, release Q2 2022.

Space Salvage:

Fly your space-pod to salvage wreckage, avoid hazards and fight droids and pirates to earn credits, upgrade your pod and get promoted to higher ranks.

30+ environments, 30+ pod upgrades, multiple mission types, and an unfolding story

Sucker Punch VR.title: Sucker Punch VR
Sucker Punch VR.desc:
Sucker Punch VR is a heart-pounding single and multiplayer experience! Battle your opponents in a variety of diverse arenas using an arsenal of power-ups! Punch point cubes as they come at you to send them flying back at your opponent. Unleash power-ups to overwhelm your opposition and defend your goal!

UNLEASH YOUR POWERS - YOUR WAY
Gain access to an arsenal of gloves and equipment, each with their own powers. Mix and match to find your perfect playing style.

SINGLE AND MULTIPLAYER
Play a single match versus AI, or grab a friend and go head-to-head via multiplayer. Need a bigger challenge? Play a season and climb the league tables for trophies and ultimate glory!

X\uff08Kai\uff09-HouteishikiX-.title: X（Kai）-HouteishikiX-
X\uff08Kai\uff09-HouteishikiX-.desc:
Japanese-style command-type action game.
You will command the two Shikigami.
The coalescing attack is exhilarating.
Please experience the Youkai tale!

• Method of operation
For hand tracking only.
The move is automatic.
Although it is a command button format, some operations are also performed by gestures:
1.Turn your palm up
The menu screen for each Shikigami is displayed.
2.Turn both hands forward(Both hands are Paper)
If the item appears, you can collect it.
3.Hold your fist with the palms of both hands facing up and accumulate power
If you have a Ofuda-item, you can use the combined attack.

• How to proceed with the game
1.Start
Press the[Start]button -> [Beginning]button with your index finger to start.
(You can skip the opening by selecting the[Start]button -> [Battle]button)
2.GamePlay
Once started, the move is automatic.
We will command the two Shikigami.
3.GameOver
If both Shikigami are defeated, the game is over.
4.GameClear
The game is cleared when the boss is defeated.

Climate Change Pinball.title: Climate Change Pinball
Climate Change Pinball.desc: Climate Pinball is a pinball game about climate adaptation and resilience. You play the game to save the planet, and the goal of the experience is to encourage behavior change and climate education in a fun and interactive manner. The overall message of the experience is that positive change and to help remind us that climate change is not a lost cause. This is not the first crisis humans have encountered, and it won't be the last. If everyone does their part to push for good habits, reduce consumption, and demand policy change we can turn this around. And remember, don't drop the ball on Climate Change!

Pets VR.title: Pets VR
Pets VR.desc:
Some charming pets are waiting for you to play with them - come and see what they’re up to in Pets VR! 
There is a lot to do in Pets Resort, some of your duties will include: Petting cute doggo, playing with adorable Cat, making sure that they both have something to snack on and are well rested, walking without a care in the world through beautiful park, playing one of multiple mini games in which you can win special points! 
Ready for some challenges? Time for some training! Learn special gestures and instruct your pet to perform different tricks - if you’re consistent it gets easier in time but be aware the pet can also forget some lessons! Reward yourself and your pupil and make it fancy! Exchange points to create your own collection of fun accessories for you and your pet to enjoy. Discover everything Pets VR can offer and most importantly, have fun!

The VR Chemistry Lab.title: The VR Chemistry Lab
The VR Chemistry Lab.desc:
The VR Chemistry Lab was originally designed to be a research tool where studies of VR learning environments could be explored. Currently, it is still being used in research but has potential for student use as a hands-on science lab experience at home or at school. It also contains experiences where players can explore molecule creation in an immersive environment as well as play a game of catalyzing a chemical reaction. 

This is still a work in progress and there are many possibilities with its potential for education. Any encouragement, advice, and support is much appreciated. For more details, pictures, etc. please go to https://virtualrealityforeducation.com/the-vr-chemistry-lab-is-now-on-the-oculus-app-lab/

Creator: Elliot Hu-Au

Viking Days Remaster.title: Viking Days Remaster
Viking Days Remaster.desc:
Face the domestic life of the fine upstanding viking in more than 15 mini challenges!

Invite your newbie friends to compete with you in a EASY TO PLAY, HARD TO MASTER series of mini-games and show them who is the true Viking Master!

Viking Days is a game born to show the amazing and easy aspects of nowadays Virtual Reality! After the success of the game for old 3DOF platforms we bring a renew version for 6DOF exploring more of the freedom we have with 2 controllers and being able to move around the space.

With extra 5 days from the original game (total of 15), you will now be able to go down mountains skiing, enjoy the peace of fishing, compete in a target practice with arrow and bow and climb your way to obstacles and more!

BF Super Player Demo.title: BF Super Player Demo
BF Super Player Demo.desc:
In BeFootball - SuperPlayer full version, football fans will be able to participate in a frenetic game of stopping penalties or heading balls, being the super stars of the beautiful game and achieving success thanks to their shooting or stopping skills, speed, power, precision ... to reach the maximum score and come out victorious.

Welcome a frenetic soccer virtual reality experience to test your best moves and sports skills while being in a breath-taking stadium. 

Featured in the DEMO version:
 - Goalkeeper Mode:  become a goalkeeper and stop as many balls as possible
 - Header Mode: become a striker and head the ball to hit the scoring panels and test your header accuracy.

Get ready for the match!

  Full game coming soon, with:
     - New Keeper game modes
     - New Kicker game modes
     - New Rhythm Fitness mode
     - More stadiums
     - More challenges
     - And more ...

Couch.title: Couch
Couch.desc:
Watch YouTube™️ together in VR!

Meet new people in the lobby
Watch videos with friends
Watch a movie with your crush

On Couch, you can watch any YouTube video in a public or private room. It’s a great way to watch tv with someone on the other side of the world.

Neon Kite.title: Neon Kite
Neon Kite.desc:
Neon Kite is a VR Arcade Kiteboarding Game inspired by the Synthwave genre.

There are 4 game modes available so far:
Tutorial: Learn the basics.
Chill: Free Play mode with no goal.
Arcade: Hit the goals with the matching color of the board.
Survival: Don't get eaten...

Enable Pro Mode for more realistic control.

Music: 
ESCP - https://escp-music.bandcamp.com
Music promoted by https://www.free-stock-music.com
Attribution 4.0 International (CC BY 4.0)
https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/4.0/

And Karl Casey @ White Bat Audio

More details on https://www.neonkitevr.com/music

** Neon Kite may contain flashing imagery. Use the "Light Mode" at the beginning of the game for the same experience without flashes.

** This game is still in development and the upcoming updates are included.
Your support is greatly appreciated!

Who Do You Voo Doo.title: Who Do You Voo Doo
Who Do You Voo Doo.desc:
Ever wish you had a Voo Doo doll of your enemies?  Well, now you can!  Who Do You Voo Doo makes you the Voo Doo Master.  Name your doll, take aim & fire your Voo Doo arrows at the doll.  But be careful, if you hit another arrow, your enemy will live to terrorize again!

Who Do You Voo Doo is a fun and therapeutic game that lets you release the pressures of your day by shooting arrows into the Voo Doo doll of your choice.

The premise is simple, but the challenge is high.

Can you land each arrow precisely enough in your doll as to not touch another arrow?  Join the challenge and the fun...

Add Who Do You Voo Doo to your collection today.

DIVE: An Inspiring Journey through Calif.title: DIVE: An Inspiring Journey through California's Marine Protected Areas
DIVE: An Inspiring Journey through Calif.desc: An Inspiring Journey through California's Marine Protected Areas

LooseBall.title: LooseBall
LooseBall.desc: Games have always made us smile and bring our friends closer together. We want to build a free and fun experience playing VR online. With old friends and new ones!

KAIJU DECODE -first contact-.title: KAIJU DECODE -first contact-
KAIJU DECODE -first contact-.desc: This virtual reality animation work is about a girl, Mil, who encounters, plays and interacts with a Kaiju. This VR film can be watched from three different viewpoints: the audience's perspective(default), the Kaiju's perspective, and Mil's perspective.

Fit Immersion.title: Fit Immersion
Fit Immersion.desc:
Fit Immersion transforms your cardio sessions in an immersive and interactive experience. Our goal is to simulate an outdoor ride from your stationary bike. You can discover touristic and cyclist tracks mostly filmed in 360° in different countries or made in 3D. To make it more realistic the app synchronizes movement speed with pedaling frequency and even difficulty if you have a compatible smart trainer (BLE FTMS). 
Tested some tracks and convinced? Then grab some credits and download tracks of your choice. 
Note: The app iscapable to communicate with Bluetooth cadence sensors, smart bikes and pedals in official version since v1.4 (needs Oculus v37 update).

Oculus SharedSpaces for Unity.title: Oculus SharedSpaces for Unity
Oculus SharedSpaces for Unity.desc:
Travel to diverse worlds such as the Red Room, Blue Room, and even Green Room!
Cutting edge character customization with our one button color randomizer.
Make new friends in the Purple Room! No invite required.

Oculus multiplayer showcase demonstrates basic multiplayer functionality in Unity. Including:
- Oculus Social APIs
- Oculus Platform authentication
- Photon NetDriver
- Photon VOIP with Oculus spatializer

Oculus SharedSpaces for Unreal.title: Oculus SharedSpaces for Unreal
Oculus SharedSpaces for Unreal.desc:
Travel to diverse worlds such as the Red Room, Blue Room, and even Green Room!
Cutting edge character customization with our one button color randomizer.
Make new friends in the Purple Room! No invite required.

Oculus multiplayer showcase demonstrates basic multiplayer functionality in Unreal. Including:
- Oculus Social APIs
- Oculus Platform authentication
- Photon NetDriver

Uni Live Viewer.title: Uni Live Viewer
Uni Live Viewer.desc:
This is a VR live viewer application that allows you to easily check out dance performances by anime-style characters.
You can decorate items and enjoy double speed dancing.

If you have a PC, you can further customize the live performance by loading VRM models, VMD dances, and music files.
→For detailed instructions, please check the official website or readme.txt in the app's dedicated folder.

The app is still under development, various updates are planned at irregular intervals.

Translated with www.DeepL.com/Translator (free version)

Cybrix.title: Cybrix
Cybrix.desc: The Sportif Arcade Style Workout Application. Your goal is to destroy every single brick by swinging the rackets, shooting with laser guns and detonating the explosive ball all while dodging shrapnel, mines, charging up the piercing ball and collecting power-ups. Compete against your friends on the global leaderboard in 50 different levels or try to get as far as you can in the endless mode.

StrikeCloud 360.title: StrikeCloud 360
StrikeCloud 360.desc:
Live from Dubai, immerse yourself into the finals of the IBF Super World Championships between 12-15th November 2021. Stand next to the best players in the world as they seek  glory for their country in what will be the most exciting World Championships in the history of the sport. 

Included on Oculus will be Semi-final and Finals for Singles, Doubles, Trios, Mixed Teams, and Team (Four Athletes).

Curatours.title: Curatours
Curatours.desc:
Museum of Plastic 2121 is the first museum tour available on Curatours!

Built 100 years from now in an imagined future where things have worked out well for both the planet and humanity. Visitors can uncover the story of plastic - its history, science, industry, and impact on our environment. They will learn the importance of establishing a circular economy and find out how activism and individual action happening now will lead to positive change in the future. 

Every Thursday in November 2021 we will be opening a new wing of the Museum of Plastic. 

Curatours is a social virtual tour platform for culture and heritage. Visit incredible places filled with art, artefacts, stories and friends. Visitors can access tours of museums around the world from desktop, phones or VR headsets. In VR it's an incredibly immersive experience and on other devices it feels like a cross between a video call and playing a multiplayer game.

Retroline.title: Retroline
Retroline.desc: Retroline is an "outrun" inspired shooter spiced with synthwave music and 8-bit tunes. Ride your RetroNet hoverboard through 12 levels all with different themes. Also, don't forger to feed Hank.

Rock a Block.title: Rock a Block
Rock a Block.desc: Rock a Block is a life-size tower-building game with one goal: Build the highest tower! You build the tower with various shaped building blocks. With each block you place down in the 3x3 grid, you earn points. To build a new layer, choose out of 2 random blocks and place it. But choose wisely; if your tower falls over, it's GAME OVER!

8-Bricks.title: 8-Bricks
8-Bricks.desc:
Now your conscience is confined in a digital world specifically created for you.

Your body is keep secure in a safe place during the time of your sentence.

Please, do not try to escape.

Thank you for your cooperation.

-DIGITAL PRISONS-

Tower Of London: A talented professional like you should beat it in no time.

Alcatraz: The infamous prison has a digital version.

Chatou d'If: Edmond Dantes has been the only one to escape from this hellish prison stranded in the middle of the digital sea.

Disc Benders: Ace Run (DEMO).title: Disc Benders: Ace Run (DEMO)
Disc Benders: Ace Run (DEMO).desc:
Hone your disc throwing skills in challenging courses and relaxing environments.

If you enjoy the demo, check out the full version here
https://www.oculus.com/experiences/quest/3659925840767901/

LoveSweet.title: LoveSweet
LoveSweet.desc:
Introduction：
The goal is to create a dreamland that allows players to enter the game characters, selectively implant emotional seeds, and then harvest the energy of the dream, and finally turn the dream into reality, allowing the player to experience the game, mentally and in the game A VR game where the player characters grow together。

Background：
The background of the game is set in the virtual dream created by the player wearing the VR headset

Description：
In this dream world, there are many trees of hope that have been cut down and destroyed, which is the dream that the owner of this dream has once had.

In this dream world, a new seed of hope appears, players need to plant this seed to help and protect its growth.

In the game, you can explore the dreams of other game characters.

Can drive the spacecraft to sail in the subconscious mind, collect, fight, and implant hope.

You can interact with the environment and residents in your dreams.
Complete variou；

Pandora.title: Pandora
Pandora.desc:
Open the box and gain the powers that reside within. Open the box and interrupt their slumber ... if you dare.

Pandora is a retro-style arcade shooter infused with the haptics and the scale of VR. Face hordes of demons and beat your highscores - or try your luck in various short but demanding challenge scenarios. Let them drown in a barrage of magic, manipulate time and collect crystals for upgrades and to unleash your most powerful attacks! 

Use headphones for better experience.

Bubble Boogie.title: Bubble Boogie
Bubble Boogie.desc:
This first release features 15 unique songs to get your body moving. Once you have mastered all the moves in Casual Mode, you can then move on to Pro mode and REALLY test your skills (Awesome dancers only).

If you look really hard, you may be able to spot the secret dance instructor, who will show you all the moves!

Just follow the Boogie moves...and your Bubble score will improve!

♪┏(・o･)┛♪┗ ( ･o･) ┓♪

Our game features the smash 70s hit song 'Boogie Oogie Oogie' to give you a taster of what Bubble Boogie is all about. It also features;

-Scoring system
-One virtual club – 'The Boogie Dome'
-Dance move instructor
-Crowd to cheer you on
-Casual & Pro mode
-Local leaderboard
-15 Unique Songs

Tennis Esports Demo.title: Tennis Esports Demo
Tennis Esports Demo.desc:
Tennis Esports is an authentic VR tennis simulation and training ecosystem based on scientific research that helps you to improve your tennis skills. Play authentic tennis from home on a virtual court, with virtual balls, against real opponents at any time.

As long as Tennis Esports Demo is available you will have access to our full feature set.

* Play training sessions at different levels of difficulty to increase your skills.
* Mirrorplay will let you play against yourself on a full court in a new and innovative way. Experience your own playing style from the other court side!
* Create real matches with opponents and challenge your friends online.

additional_data.Publisher: VR Motion Learning GmbH & Co KG

Absolute Gravity - Demo.title: Absolute Gravity - Demo
Absolute Gravity - Demo.desc:
Participate in the space race championship to unlock all 37 circuits and 3 difficulty levels.
Possibility to design your ships with an infinite number of colors and a choice of 100 combinations of different models that you can acquire over the course of the races by increasing their powers.
90 FPS mode for Quest 2. 
The demo version gives access to the first 7 circuits. 
Good game !

Beers And Boomerangs Demo.title: Beers And Boomerangs Demo
Beers And Boomerangs Demo.desc:
Kangaroos are trying to steal your beer! Throw boomerangs in VR to survive the wildlife chaos. Cook for your mates, and save your Aussie BBQ!

Have increasingly perilous BBQs where you survive against different animals, in different scenarios and cook different food!

Full game Features:

Physics-based
+6 types of enemies
Very satisfying boomerang trajectories
+4 recipes (and Vegetarian options)

Digital Campfire.title: Digital Campfire
Digital Campfire.desc:
🏕Easy for VR beginners!
The functions are focused on a few, making it simple to operate. Even those who are not familiar with VR can immediately focus on communication.

🏕Small space for your acquaintances
This place can hold up to 10 people at the same time. This version is open-space as a demo version, but the regular version can be used closed. So, you can relax and enjoy conversation with your friends, families, or team mates.

🏕Bonding in a warm & cozy space
Most of the time, it takes active engagements to create a bond. But maybe, sharing a starry sky and the crackling sound of firewoods could be enough for us to feel connection to the people next to you. Digital Campfire provides warm and comfortable space for every people!

■ Spec List
- 10 users at the same time (If there are more than 10 people in the room, the mode will switch to world browsing only. )
- Voice chat with spacial audio
- Full body avatar (2 types)
- Cave & campfire world

Driven - Demo.title: Driven - Demo
Driven - Demo.desc:
Experience real racing on the Oculus Quest!

Drive with automatic or manual gears
Steer using thumbstick or virtual hands
Drive from the driver seat or 3rd person drone cam

Drive amongst traffic!

The Demo contains
- 1 track
- 4 races
- 3 cars

Enjoy!

Tracing Paint - The Pollock Krasner Stud.title: Tracing Paint - The Pollock Krasner Studio in Virtual Reality
Tracing Paint - The Pollock Krasner Stud.desc:
Jackson Pollock and Lee Krasner were two of the most influential artists of the 20th Century whose bold Abstract Expressionist paintings helped to shift the center of the art world from Europe to America.

Tracing Paint recreates the studio where they painted. Restoring it to the way it looked when each artist worked there. With a Quest headset, visitors are able to explore the studios by teleporting or walking around them, in a room scale environment, to examine the paintings, inspect the paints and tools the artists used to create their masterpieces.

Visitors will hear the artists describe their work their own words and hear what critics thought about their paintings at the time.

Because of the large gestures they both used it’s possible to discover precisely where Pollock and Krasner painted some of their most iconic works on the floor and walls of the studio.

additional_data.Publisher: The Pollock Krasner House and Study Center

Yue's VR-FPV-Sim.title: Yue's VR-FPV-Sim
Yue's VR-FPV-Sim.desc:
This an easy way to experience FPV and Drone Flights in Virtual Reality with Oculus Quest.

Flying FPV is not easy and especially for beginners very challenging. So it makes sense learning to fly in the Simulator first, before crashing hundreds of Dollars of Equipment in to the ground.

Fly Drones with or without FPV Goggles!

Compatible with a Gamepad.              

This Simuator has a total 7 Scenes including

    Game Play Tutorial
    4 Multiplayer Rooms - Freestyle and Racing
    2 Maps that include Pylon Races
    2 Arcade Minigames
    2 Training Maps
    Experimental LAN Multiplayer
    2D or 3D FPV Screen

                                                                           
Entirely Physics based Simulation

    PID regulated Simulation that can be tuned
    Bahaves as a Physics Object
    Hovereffect

ARK-ADE.title: ARK-ADE
ARK-ADE.desc:
Have you ever dreamt about being inside an old Arcade Machine?

Inspired by the major 80’s Pop Culture references, ARK-ADE harmonizes the old fast-paced Run ‘n’ Gun games with the new era of VR technology, diving you into an iconic setting to strafe enemies, protect ARK and defeat ADE.

FEATURES
Choose between Free Locomotion and Teleport Movement to enjoy the game without the risk of motion sickness
Protect ARK from ADE’s army
Morphing weapon
Enjoy destructible environment and covers
Collect all the secrets and defeat ADE for good
Immerse into the nostalgic 80’s Low-poly Sci-Fi setting
Shoot to the beat of our original soundtrack

Medical Assisting Clinical Suite (Profes.title: Medical Assisting Clinical Suite (Professional)
Medical Assisting Clinical Suite (Profes.desc:
Intended for medical assisting students and working professionals seeking a skills refresher, the Medical Assisting Clinical Suite (Professional) is clinical training in an immersive health care setting that teaches you how to prepare for, setup, document, and perform 33 clinical skills procedures common to the CMA/RMA/NCMA/CCMA/CMAC Certification Exams.  This is a permanent education license, providing unlimited practice ‘anytime-anywhere’, immediate feedback, analytics, and guided, expert, and exam modes to check progress and build confidence.
A certificate of completion is available upon successful completion of all exam modes.
Immersive learning is a paradigm shift that is already underway in healthcare education, where leading research shows that learners acquire clinical skills more rapidly, with fewer errors, and retain learned skills longer through immersive learning experiences.

Grid Ball.title: Grid Ball
Grid Ball.desc:
Destroy all the tile-shaped targets (BITs) floating in the cubic space named "GRID".
To break a BIT, shoot it using your Grid Gun.
However, conquering the innumerable Grids in the digital space will not be straight forward as there are multiple obstacles that will hinder your progress.
Use the Grid Gun and its four functions "Shoot", "Pull", "Return" and "Bomb" to help you overcome these obstacles. Conquer all the grids and become the grid master!

Home YogaVR.title: Home YogaVR
Home YogaVR.desc:
1. Suggest you use Quest2 headset. Quest still can work. 
2. Make sure you are in a place with no objects close to you!  It requires a playspace of at least 6'6''x4'11'' (2x1.5m).
3. We have teachers team who teach people Yoga for almost 8+ years. Our courses we’ve built is suitable for everyone, both beginners and those already on the yoga path.
4. Everyone is busy.Getting motivated to go to the gym was always hard for most people. Compare to the long way drive to gym and back,and also bring a lot of things,only 10mins everyday in your spare time, you can finish.
5. Now there are 51 Yoga workouts in it. Update time and time with new courses.You can use it for a long time.
6.Please e-mail us if you have any suggestion or cooperation idea. 
e-mail: 408077086@qq.com

Updated 2022/01/10

Zombie Baseball 3D.title: Zombie Baseball 3D
Zombie Baseball 3D.desc:
Welcome back Baseball Hero!!! This Halloween we have a mission for you: To save our country.

We have your favourite weapons ready to strike the enemy. So get your things together and hit the road.

No matter the monsters you face off in your way... YOU NEVER SURRENDER!!!

Show the world who is a real hero.

STORY MODE:

-You will be traveling between 20 cities of East Coast to erase the zombie infestation
-As you progress you will unlock more powerful bats.
-You can upgrade the bat's power and delay penalty with the accumulated score.
-The zombies will have a life bar over their head to show how much life they have.

SURVIVAL MODE:

-In this mode you have to do the longest consecutive combo possible.
-The enemies will die in 1 hit.
-Every 5 consecutive hits the game will level up and the balls will be thrown faster.
-The game will finish once you fail one time. That will be your top combo score.

MULTIPLAYER:

You can either organize a LAN party or a remote multiplayer party.

Hordz.title: Hordz
Hordz.desc:
Battle for survival against the mysterious Hordz!

Test your dexterity to your puny human limits, unleashing your twin lightning wands to defend against waves of unforgiving foes. Battle witches, goblins, vampires, skeleton bikers and other evil-but-fun dead guys. Can you perform intricate monster kill-moves under unrelenting pressure? Probably not, but you should give it a try anyway!

FEATURES:
- A defense game that's as first-person as you can get.
- Over 50 levels of wand-twirling VR horror action.
- Perform simultaneous kills for higher scores.
- Silly monster sound effects and pumping original tunez.
- Zombie-free zone! Aren’t you a bit tired of them?

This is an App Lab game, and as such is IN-DEVELOPMENT, so we have a ton of new features ready to be added, plus more in the pipeline.

COMING SOON:
- 360 mode with multiple fogs.
- Projectile weapons.
- Melee weapons.

COMING LATER (HOPEFULLY - but not guaranteed):
- Level editor.
- Movement within levels.

additional_data.Languages: English, Spanish (Argentina), Spanish (Chile), Spanish (Colombia), Spanish (Mexico), Spanish (Peru), Spanish (Puerto Rico), Spanish (Spain), Spanish (Venezuela)

Sea Level Rise Explorer Santa Cruz.title: Sea Level Rise Explorer Santa Cruz
Sea Level Rise Explorer Santa Cruz.desc: As coastal communities contend with sea-level rise, coastal erosion, and other impacts of climate change, public education has become a critical piece of the puzzle. Virtual Planet Technologies produces insightful and immersive experiences that communities can use to better understand the impacts of climate change and explore emerging adaptation solutions. Our team has a range of expertise from climate scientists, city planners, communications experts, filmmakers, 3D animators, and Unity (software) developers. In our Sea Level Rise Explorer, users interact with 3D models and can raise sea levels to observe potential flooding in real-time. Adaptation scenarios can also be displayed.

additional_data.Languages: English, Spanish (Argentina), Spanish (Chile), Spanish (Colombia), Spanish (Mexico), Spanish (Peru), Spanish (Puerto Rico), Spanish (Spain), Spanish (Venezuela)

Gamerz Lab.title: Gamerz Lab
Gamerz Lab.desc:
Gamerz Lab is a multi-activity, sci-fi themed playground designed to give the users a holistic gaming experience like never before.

There are two separate zones. The Game Zone offers a virtual game booth featuring a wave based shooting game. Over time more and more game booths will be added, each with exciting new games. With every new game Gamerz Lab will become a completely new experience to explore!
