Whenever you want to take a break from Game Zone you can move over to the Relax Zone and chill out. With amazing visuals and micro-activity corners like boxing corner and many more to come with every update will make the Gamerz Lab an unforgettable gaming experience for gamers.
Relax in the lobby or use the boxing corner to release your inner Mike Tyson.
Game booths offering different experiences (Shooters etc)
Breathtaking visuals and amazing gameplay.

Jogja Gamelan Virtual.title: Jogja Gamelan Virtual
Jogja Gamelan Virtual.desc:
Gamelan VR is the futuristic instrument music gamelan for everyone from beginners to professionals who want to enrich their musical experience. Lets you hit the instrument in VR without the limitations of the real world. It also opens up many possibilities for learning how to play gamelan (through an intuitive interface) with a realistic sound experience and bring traditional dan futuristic atmosphere into one musical experience. Happy Playing Gamelan!

Key feature:
- Responsive and realistic sounds
- Futuristic environment stage
- Unable to play multiplayer in the future"

Reflections of Iwanoff.title: Reflections of Iwanoff
Reflections of Iwanoff.desc: If you are a fan of modernist architecture, in particular post war brutalism then this is the app for you! Reflections of Iwanoff rebuilds a long lost post modern house designed by Iwan Iwanoff. Iwanoff was a Bulgarian avant garde architect who operated in Australia from the early 1950's to the late 1980's. In Reflections of Iwanoff you will be guided on a personal tour with award winning Australian architectural historian Stuart Harrison, on the tour you will learn about the principles of modernist architecture and then get to experience what living in the house would have been like.

additional_data.Publisher: Frame Mixed Reality Labs Pty Ltd

SHIPS.title: SHIPS
SHIPS.desc:
Aspiring to create a unique yet simple concept in VR, Utopia Immersive designed boat locomotion with an emphasis on leisure and environment immersion.

SHIPS(as of September 2021) features 7 ships, 2 docks(maps), 21 customizable ship colorways, 3 hours of varied music genres, and sitting or standing preferences. To prevent discomfort or confusion regularly attributed to Virtual Reality, the design of ships accomplished only using two buttons on each controller(grab and trigger). This design guarantees that the boat movement is successful in preventing unwanted motion sickness and excessive control related confusion.

The potential of SHIPS is far beyond what is shown in this build. With time, honest reviews, and increased exposure, SHIPS will look to include more ships, larger/more docks, multiplayer modes, racing, and so much more.

Cosmic Storm Attack.title: Cosmic Storm Attack
Cosmic Storm Attack.desc:
There's an asteroid storm coming for the space station, you're going to have to protect the space station as best you can. 

Use your pistol to shoot the asteroids, to keep as much of the space station intact as you can. On the left side of your gun there's a reading of the percentage of the space station still left. If it hits 0% - it's game over.

Electronic Universe.title: Electronic Universe
Electronic Universe.desc:
Electronic Universe is a complete electronic musical shooter game.
The worlds were designed to fit with the electronic music created specifically for the game.
- 3 Levels of difficulty (Easy, Medium, Hard).
- 6 Fantasy Musical Worlds.
- Shoot the obstacles to keep going on the game levels.
- Charge your weapon with ammo that you find over the levels to be stronger.
- Use your powers to destroy more obstacles at the same time.
- Enjoy electronic music and rythmic decorations of the game.

AlienAttack2.title: AlienAttack2
AlienAttack2.desc:
# SINGLE PLAYER CAMPAIGN
This beta version only include 4 aliens, 5 weapons.

The final version will include 5 levels with 20 aliens. and 10 weapons.


# CO-OPERATIVE MODE
Will be available in November

Piano VR.title: Piano VR
Piano VR.desc: You want to play piano but do not have one? Play piano in virtual reality anywhere you want, without using any cables or controllers, only using your hands, like in real world. With the upgraded hand tracking system, now it is more than possible to do it.

VIVE Sync.title: VIVE Sync
VIVE Sync.desc:
VIVE Sync serves as a secure and flexible space where business professionals can discuss, collaborate, and share ideas seamlessly regardless of time and locations.  A custom avatar solution coupled with a full body avatar simulation, a virtual 3D environment, and many more features makes working remotely as effective as working in shared office.
Visit our website: https://sync.vive.com/ to book your meeting.

additional_data.Languages: English, Chinese (China), Chinese (Taiwan), Czech, Danish, Dutch, Finnish, French (France), German, Italian, Japanese, Korean, Norwegian (Nynorsk), Polish, Russian, Spanish (Spain), Swedish

VRflow B737NG.title: VRflow B737NG
VRflow B737NG.desc:
- This is the individual/student version of VRflow -

VRflow B737NG is the interactive cockpit procedure trainer for pilots. Train procedures in training scenarios that incorporate detailed aircraft behavior including sounds, instruments and cockpit layout.

VRflow incorporates numerous features for efficient learning and aircraft familiarization, ideal for type ratings. Train with or without visual help, track your errors, see your training time, train with an automatic crewmember and much more.

The following procedures are included: Electrical Power Up, Preliminary Preflight, Preflight Procedure (F/O), Preflight Procedure (CPT), Before Start, Pushback, Engine Start, Before Taxi, Before Takeoff, Takeoff, After Landing, Shutdown, Secure and Electrical Power Down.

VRflow also contains Explore Mode, where you can explore the cockpit and learn about systems.

The individual/student version does not include multi-crew functionality.

VRflow B737NG Demo.title: VRflow B737NG Demo
VRflow B737NG Demo.desc:
VRflow B737NG is the interactive cockpit procedure trainer for pilots. Train procedures in training scenarios that incorporate detailed aircraft behavior including sounds, instruments and cockpit layout.

VRflow incorporates numerous features for efficient learning and aircraft familiarization, ideal for type ratings. Train with or without visual help, track your errors, see your training time, train with an automatic crewmember and much more.

This demo version includes the Preflight Procedure – First Officer procedure.

Buy the full version for access to the following procedures:
Electrical Power Up, Preliminary Preflight, Preflight Procedure (F/O), Preflight Procedure (CPT), Before Start, Pushback, Engine Start, Before Taxi, Before Takeoff, Takeoff, After Landing, Shutdown, Secure and Electrical Power Down. Explore Mode, where you can explore the cockpit and learn about systems, is also included in the full version.

Kauri Classroom.title: Kauri Classroom
Kauri Classroom.desc: Kauri trees are treasured, iconic giants of the New Zealand forest. They are among the largest and longest-lived trees in the world. The largest of all, Tāne Mahuta, is about 2,000 years old and hosts an entire ecosystem of more than 100 species in his canopy. However, the kauri are currently threatened by a tiny microbe causing kauri dieback disease. This VR experience teaches you about the kauri tree and its connectedness with the surrounding forest. It also introduces the microbe causing kauri dieback disease, and what you can do to help keep the forest healthy. By using VR to encourage your curiosity about the forest, this experience aims to set you on the path to a lifelong interest in kaitiakitanga (guardianship of your natural environment)

Angry Pigs.title: Angry Pigs
Angry Pigs.desc:
Fight for your life and defend your precious crops in this action-packed shooter.

Uncle Frank went to visit his daughter in the city for the weekend. He accidentally forgot to feed his pigs. Pigs are hungry and are now running around the farm eating everything they find. 
Help uncle Frank keep his crops by shooting piggies back to the barn. When you shoot a piggy, it returns to the barn, but be fast, there’s hundreds of them coming back to eat your precious crops. Watch out because they bite too. Keep away from those angry ones :)

You got three lives to begin with! Each piggy bite you lose a life. To restore life you can eat a donut. To eat it, just pick it up and place it in front of your mouth to eat.
If you're a beginner you might want to choose a difficulty level 1 where pigs are a bit slower and you have unlimited bullets.

Hockey Bockey.title: Hockey Bockey
Hockey Bockey.desc:
Hockey Bockey is a fluid and fun VR Sport played on a seamless rink with curved boards. Every aspect of the arena is designed to keep the play moving and to allow the players to make spectacular moves and plays with their friends. AI bots are there to insure you never have an empty game, even when you are playing alone!

Features:
- Features 3v3, 2v2, and 1v1 full multiplayer game modes
- Dynamic AI Bots that can pass, shoot and check will make sure you always have a full game 
- AI goalies that keep the ball moving and out of your net 
- Curved arena walls allow for astounding trick passes and moves
- Matches are easy to start and join 
- Practice your moves on a goalie in your private practice rink
- Customize your player, helmet, pads and stick

Language Lab.title: Language Lab
Language Lab.desc:
Learn language the same way children learn - the same way humans have been wired to learn languages for thousands of years: in an environment where you are 100% immersed in the target language. Choose from over 20 different languages, and enter a house where you only hear that language. Hear the names of everything you touch in the house, follow your teacher's instructions, and acquire language through comprehensible input.

Our languages currently include: English, Spanish (Mexico), Spanish (Spain), Catalan, Arabic, Chinese, Finnish, French, German, Greek, Hebrew, Hindi, Indonesian, Italian, Japanese, Korean, Polish, Portuguese, Romanian, Russian, Swedish, Turkish, Ukrainian, and Vietnamese. Thai, Dutch, Swahili, and Persian coming soon! Please let us know if you'd like more!

additional_data.Languages: English, English (Australia), English (UK), English (US), English (Canada), English (South Africa), Arabic, Catalan, Catalan (Balear), Chinese (China), Chinese (Taiwan), Dutch, Dutch (Belgium), Finnish, French (Belgium), French (Canada), French (France), German, German (Switzerland), Greek, Hebrew, Hindi, Indonesian, Italian, Japanese, Korean, Persian, Persian (Afghanistan), Polish, Portuguese (Brazil), Portuguese (Portugal), Romanian, Russian, Russian (Ukraine), Spanish (Argentina), Spanish (Chile), Spanish (Colombia), Spanish (Mexico), Spanish (Peru), Spanish (Puerto Rico), Spanish (Spain), Spanish (Venezuela), Swahili, Swedish, Thai, Turkish, Ukrainian, Vietnamese

TrainerVR.title: TrainerVR
TrainerVR.desc:
TrainerVR is a unique physics-based VR train construction game.
In TrainerVR you can create from simple tracks to an elaborate rail network, just like the wooden piece game, but to the infinity and beyond, and drive the trains inside your creations!

Have you ever feel the despair of running out of tracks just when the fun was sparkling?
Have you ever dreamed about a huge train network connecting towns, going  up and down, intersecting and looping?
If you liked building with your own bare hands, you’ll feel the same in our limitless VR world and see your dreams come true.

But this is not only about the destination; it's also about the journey. Enjoy building your structures, growing more complex, while fighting against Newton’s laws.

Once the job is done you can place as many trains as you want and ensure everyone’s safety avoiding crashes acting like a profesional train traffic controller.

Once you go track you can't go back. Come aboard!

COMIXV EDITION - ROMANCE FANTASY.title: COMIXV EDITION - ROMANCE FANTASY
COMIXV EDITION - ROMANCE FANTASY.desc:
This is COMIXV EDITION Package for Romance Fantasy. You can experience 6 webtoons about sweet love and sorrow fantasy. 

· Romance Fantasy Pack LIST ·
<Tears, the glare>, <Golden Dokkaebi Cubee- Wish of a mysterious butterfly>, <Love Monorail>, <The Wizard Living Next Door>, <See you in Baa Dream>, <4542>

New Species Found.title: New Species Found
New Species Found.desc:
Dive! Your mission is to investigate reports of unclassified sea life in an underwater biome. Get ready to explore the mysteries of the ocean as you take the control of the OE-Mk IV submarine.

You have arrived at your oceanic laboratory which is your homebase for species classification and refueling. The Mk IV submarine has limited fuel and oxygen. Fuel and oxygen consumption is increased by high speeds and excessive spotlight and instrument use. You will need to collect information about sea life and return to the laboratory before exhausting your resources to complete a successful mission. If you run out of fuel or oxygen before returning to your homebase your research will be lost at sea.

New Species Found! Combines action and adventure while exploring and learning about the undersea world and the amazing animals that live there.

OceanRoute.title: OceanRoute
OceanRoute.desc:
This app is designed for healing and relaxation.

In this app, you will experience "
just keep running along the Ocean road".

This experience,
 which may seem monotonous in some ways, 
may give your tired brain a break.

If you have trouble sleeping 
or 
if your brain is tired, try using this app.

This app also includes a rotating view function so that 
you can experience the app while lying down.

Operation Description

Left stick (up/down) (vertical rotation of viewpoint)
Right stick (up/down) (Speed Change)
LR Trigger(Brightness change)


A button （decision / BGM change)
B button （decision / Description On/Off)
X or Y Button (BGM volume change)

Mutated Virus.title: Mutated Virus
Mutated Virus.desc:
In the near future the Earth is ruined and undead corpses
is the only thing walking the streets that were populated by
living humans in the past. 
Survive in a post-apocalyptic Earth and destroy 
as many undead as you can before they take you down!!

---Mutated Virus has the best graphics you have ever seen on Quest---
---Official support on Quest 2 (72FPS  80 FPS 90 FPS)-----

- Exploits to the fullest the hardware capabilities of the Oculus Quest. 
The experience from the game mechanics and graphics feels 
just like playing the game in Oculus Rift. 
A full PC-VR experience compacted into the Oculus Quest platform! 

- Smooth motion and framerate
- Official support on Quest 2 (72FPS  80 FPS 90 FPS)
- Free Movement
- 14 Weapons
- 3 Maps
- 16 Zombies
- Wordwide Leaderboards
- Survival mode
- Latest Gen Graphics and FX (4 GEN) 
- Snap turning
- Smooth Turning
- Movable lights
- Dual Weapons

NOTE: You can play the Game offline but Internet connection required
to Submit your Score.

Cricketr.title: Cricketr
Cricketr.desc:
Have you ever dreamt of playing cricket as a Cricketer? CricketR is a Game for you to be the star cricketer.
Feel The Crowd, the cheers, the vibe of playing with pro players wearing your favorite jersey.
CricketR is an immersive cricket game created just for the cricket lovers to make them experience what it is like to be a Star. Enjoy the crowds roar and cheer leaders dance to your epic shots. Teleport yourself into the shoes of you favirote cricketer and bat your best shorts.

Cyber Defense 2088 Demo.title: Cyber Defense 2088 Demo
Cyber Defense 2088 Demo.desc:
Its the 80s again, the 2080s, and your mainframe is under attack from rival factions who want to take our city and all we have achieved. Multiple generations of people have settled here since 1986 and called this place their home. They are in trouble and you decide the best defense is a good offence and allow yourself to be transformed into pure energy. You leave behind the physical world and enter this new virtual reality world called cyberspace! Your first priority is New Zylon, save it from these attacks, capture the enemy's code and use it unlock more weapons, turrets, and powerful AI bots in this epic tower defense shooter!

See you in Cyberspace!

Pocket Racer : Sandbox Engine.title: Pocket Racer : Sandbox Engine
Pocket Racer : Sandbox Engine.desc:
A CREATIVE SANDBOX TO CREATE

Pocket Racer : Sandbox Edition give you the freedom to:

- Create your own tracks from 100 prefab sections
- Choose from 8 different vehicles, including monster trucks, indy cars and motorbikes
- Race in first-person (grab the virtual wheel) or miniature (micromachine, Hot Wheel or RC Car scale) 
- Publish your own tracks online for others to race and compete for lap records
- View replays of all other racers who have completed a race on your tracks.


Imagine your wildest driving fantasy... build whatever you want with a large selection of track pieces, ramps, half pipes, portals, speed boosters, ice tracks and more!  Experiment with your own creations using the 5 default save slots and when you are ready you can publish your track online. Invite other players and compete to be the king of your own creation!

CuriousVR is a solo gamedev and this project is in active development. Feel free to reach out with feature request, comments and concerns.

V20 Cricket.title: V20 Cricket
V20 Cricket.desc:
V20 Cricket is the best Virtual reality cricket game for all ages! 

Welcome to the future of cricket. In this immersive Virtual cricket simulator, you can bat in different match scenarios, chase down targets and be the master of your own stadium! 

You’re front and centre, in a true to life stadium with panoramic 360 degree views. World-class bowling, phenomenal fielding and a 100,000 roaring fans with just two overs to go ⁃ Are you up for it? Of course you are, the virtual world is your oyster!

Features: 

 ⁃ 3600 immersive virtual environments
 ⁃ Various difficulty levels - Beginner, Intermediate, Semi-Pro, Professional along with a Practise Mode to get you on your way
 ⁃ 5 leagues - Face Pacers, Leg Spinners, Off Spinners, Swing bowlers & even Mystery spinners 
 ⁃ State of the art graphics & animation
⁃  Professional Commentary

Clay Hunt VR.title: Clay Hunt VR
Clay Hunt VR.desc:
#1 shotgun shooting simulator from mobile is now available in amazing Oculus Quest experience! Bust clay pigeons in skeet, trap, double trap and sporting clays. Go hunting pigeons with your trusty pump action shotgun or participate on a pheasant drive!

Features:
-Shot string physics are accurately simulated so that you can practice your leads and target acquisition with this game.
-SKEET: shoot single targets rounds, international skeet with double targets, practice a specific station and all new infinite skeet mode with leaderboards!
-TRAP: Olympic trap and Double Trap are supported along with infinite game mode.
-SPORTING CLAYS: 20 quick challenges to beat and a full course with 60 targets. 
-PIGEON HUNT: Super popular pigeon hunt from Clay Hunt PRO is now in VR!
-PHEASANT DRIVE: Challenge yourself with the high flying birds!
-GUN RANGE: Practise shotgun handling with stationary targets.
-UNLOCK NEW GUNS AND MODS: New guns and mods are unlocked as you gain experience.

More to come!

EC ARMS.title: EC ARMS
EC ARMS.desc:
An energy-collecting shooting game.
You collect energy from enemies that block your path.
We aimed for a feeling of exhilaration when absorbing energy.
Please experience the comfort of absorbing energy!

• Method of operation
For hand tracking only.
The move is automatic.
Aim to escape from the base with two operations:
1.Attack mode - Either hand is a Paper
The pointer will come out. You can start or attack the enemy by hitting the pointer. Attack and get energy from your enemies.
2.Absorption mode - Both hands are Paper
If there is energy in the scene, it will absorb the energy. Collect a lot of energy.
(It cannot be absorbed after a certain distance.)

• How to proceed with the game:
1.Start
Start when the gauge of the START icon is full.
2.GamePlay
Once started, the move is automatic. When hit by an enemy bullet, the energy is reduced.
3.GameOver
If you cannot escape by the time limit, the game is over.
4.GameClear
The game is cleared if you pass through the door by the time limit.

J\u00e4mtland Tent Experience (Adventure.title: Jämtland Tent Experience (Adventure 63)
J\u00e4mtland Tent Experience (Adventure.desc:
Experience how it would be like to wake up in a tent and see the nature outside in Jämtland Sweden.
The available locations are Åreskutan, Ånn Lake, Storulvån and Gustavsbergsbacken in Östersund.
Feel the peacefulness of living in nature and admire the environment.

LFF EXPANSE 2021.title: LFF EXPANSE 2021
LFF EXPANSE 2021.desc:
Welcome to LFF Expanded, part of BFI London Film Festival.
 
Venture below the Thames to visit The Expanse, BFI London Film Festival’s XR and immersive showcase.
 
Featuring over 15 different experiences alongside live events and short film screenings, talks, and even a few live shows!
 
The LFF Expanded programme features 360 videos and fully immersive, interactive experiences. 
 
The 65th BFI London Film Festival runs 6-17 October 2021. Book tickets and find out about other free events here: https://www.bfi.org.uk/london-film-festival

Red Light Green Light.title: Red Light Green Light
Red Light Green Light.desc: A simple game played with other, nameless players. Move your hands to run forward and cross the finish line. You gain points for successful runs, and you lose points for getting caught.

NO TIME TO PARTY.title: NO TIME TO PARTY
NO TIME TO PARTY.desc:
"USE YOUR REAL HANDS AND INTERACT WITH THE WORLD"

It's a quiet evening with your friends...

Your friend pulls out his VR headset...."Have you guys played No Time To Party?"

Only one VR is needed! The rest have to challenge the wearer to solve the easy to difficult puzzles!

This is a team game, while one person wears the headset the party reads off challenges. 

The party will have to communicate with the player in order to solve the time-sensitive puzzles.

The VR player is the hands and your party is the mind! 

It's time to have fun with your friends! What are you waiting for? THERE IS NO TIME.

Don't miss the opportunity to bond and have fun LIKE NEVER BEFORE.

*** IMPORTANT: Remember to download your version of the manual on caosvr.com/deck***

Theme Park Simulator: Rollercoaster para.title: Theme Park Simulator: Rollercoaster paradise
Theme Park Simulator: Rollercoaster para.desc:
Do you love theme parks?

Discover a fun world with "Theme Park Simulator" and enjoy with our amazing rides. 

Get it now!

- Bumper Cars
- Inverter
- Tagada
- Roller Coaster Wild Mouse
- Techno Jump
- Twister
- Kamikaze
- Roller Coaster Tokaido
- Viking ship
- Kamikaze
- Amor Express

And soon new simulators... !

Voices of Inspiration.title: Voices of Inspiration
Voices of Inspiration.desc:
Voices of Inspiration is an experience that immerses you in the audio stories, aspirations, and artwork of children at St. Jude as you journey to the stars in a futuristic space elevator.

Built in collaboration with the astronauts of the Inspiration4 SpaceX mission, explore beautiful virtual worlds as you awaken small creatures to reveal voice messages left by St. Judes patients... and reflect on their stories as you ascend into the stars.

Nocturne.title: Nocturne
Nocturne.desc:
The magic of making music doesn't require years of practice anymore. Nocturne is a virtual reality music game that allows players to perform a variety of enchanting melodies with the wave of their wand. Inspired by the theremin, Nocturne provides the challenge of rhythm & beat games in Play Along, while encouraging musical expression in Improvise.

• Play Along: Train your ear with a library of songs from beginner to expert
• Improvise: Explore the connection between music and emotion with your own compositions
• Voices: Play with different sounds from strings to brass

Nocturne makes playing music fun, easy and magical. Start your Nocturne journey with a familiar classical composition, or try something new from the original soundtrack, specially composed to teach you how to play.

Join us on Discord to stay up to date on new versions, new songs and share your compositions
https://discord.gg/JGTuZcK7au

We’re still in beta! send us feedback or bug reports @
http://outpost4.net/feedback

Big Bat VR.title: Big Bat VR
Big Bat VR.desc:
In Big Bat VR, players are exposed to a highly personalized virtual environment.

You can create a private profile adjusted to your abilities and comfortable game options. 
- Big Bat VR includes multiple full-scale and life-size visuals, ranging from locker room and baseball stadium to cheering crowd and virtual pitcher.
- Learn how to hit the ball further and further away during a set amount of time. 
- Get inspired by the fireworks that appear in the background celebrating your victory each time you hit a home run. 
- Explore our new feature and track your score at Global Leaderboard to compare your performance with other players' scores and reach mastery!
Visual effects, sounds, and light – we managed to pay attention to every detail in order to provide you with the most realistic and engaging VR experience you have ever had. 

Do not hesitate and grab your chance to show off your baseball skills right now!

M-Care app.title: M-Care app
M-Care app.desc:
The virtual reality work experiences place the learner in real life scenarios where they can see how members of the health and social care sector spend part of their working day. 

Alex has broken his wrist at school. Follow his journey from his first visit to the doctor, through his radiology appointment where his arm is x-rayed, through to his arm being put in a cast.

Mrs Brown Sr. has experienced palpitations and has called an emergency paramedic who runs standard checks before taking her to the hospital in an ambulance where she undergoes an ECG test. Safely back home we meet Mrs Brown’s social carer and finally follow her to the pharmacy to collect her newly prescribed medication.

Mr Brown has recently been diagnosed with Type 2 Diabetes and is meeting a dietitian who will help him understand how simple lifestyle changes can help him. Watch as they discuss food groups and the benefits of a balanced diet and as the dietitian recommends exercise and staying active.

VRSOPS a320.title: VRSOPS a320
VRSOPS a320.desc:
This is a Virtual Reality Standard Operating Procedures Trainer. The user can practice step by step the checklist items of an a320 aircraft. With each update we will be adding more checklists. Starting at the gate with engines off and external power connected. Low visibility for taxi, takeoff and landing.
This app can help users memorizing the checklist and increase the motor skills. Each step requires the user to touch with the hand to reach the item. 
The app uses either hand tracking or controllers for interaction.

The following checklists are included in current version:
- Preliminary Cockpit Preparation
- Cockpit Preparation
- Before Pushback or Start
- Engine Start
- After Start
- Taxi
- Before Takeoff down to the line

We are working on more checklists and we will be adding more in future updates at no extra cost.

Please visit vrsops.com to order a license.

The Gift - Beta.title: The Gift - Beta
The Gift - Beta.desc:
Let go of negative thoughts with empowering self-guided coaching experiences.
Try the beta coaching experience: "The Gift" now.

“The Gift” is a powerful VR coaching experience based on the world renowned Dynamic Spin Release (TM) coaching process developed by two of the world's leading coaching experts: Tim & Kris Hallbom.

Benefits
- Release the source of your anxiety, fear and stress from your mind and body
- Release negative self talk that keeps you from having what you want
- Find answers to your own personal problems 
- Energize yourself when feeling tired
 
What people say
"I have been far more at peace about the path I am on and feel more “whole” despite the losses I have recently faced"
"I feel like it was a weight that lifted from me by the end of it"
"I truly feel both relaxed and invigorated"

VR MODE.jp.title: VR MODE.jp
VR MODE.jp.desc:
パブリックビューイングに次ぐ「新たなライブ体験」の実現。
高品質な180度立体視映像による「圧倒的な感動体験」の実現。
VR LIVE/VRシナリオ動画/VR写真集を中心に、VRコンテンツを集結させた唯一無二のプラットフォームです。

The Great Escape: Dragon\u2019s Dungeon.title: The Great Escape: Dragon’s Dungeon
The Great Escape: Dragon\u2019s Dungeon.desc: Explore, reason, and play your way through five challenging rooms to unravel the mystery behind the four warrior kings and their battle against evil.  Can you break out of Prison?  Can you master the Great Room?  Can you battle your way out of the War Room?  Can you reason through King's Quarters?  And can you make your Great Escape out of Dragon's Dungeon?

XR MANGA Fist of the North Star.title: XR MANGA Fist of the North Star
XR MANGA Fist of the North Star.desc:
The immortal masterpiece "Fist of the North Star", which has enthusiastic fans all over the world, is now available as the Ultimate Edition (complete set of 18 volumes with color at the beginning of each volume) as XR Manga! Fist of the North Star Ultimate Edition Volume 18 contains all the contents of the standard edition of 27 volumes, plus a large number of additional episodes written by Tetsuo Hara, the creator of the original work.

This is the first time in the world that the entire story has been released as an e-book in this "ultimate edition with color pages". 

There is also a game "Ore ga Kenshiro" where you can become Kenshiro, and a "VR figure" where you can play with Yuria Kenshiro in any pose you like.

More features are planned to be added to XR Manga in the future.

Badminton.title: Badminton
Badminton.desc:
Welcome to Badminton! Step into the court feel the immersion and enjoy the gameplay with the untethered freedom of Oculus Quest.

Badminton is a Virtual Reality(VR) game where you play against advanced AI and there are other amazing game modes. With physics design to be as real as ever and has been achieved in Badminton, don't worry you will forget that you are in VR.

SINGLE-PLAYER EXPERIENCE
In the single-player campaign always know that as you win the harder, demanding, and troublesome it gets!

MULTIPLAYER & ONLINE RANKINGS :
Multiplayer modes are officially now available modes are Ranked, Unranked, Into the Bucket Versus, Hangout, and Champions League.

PHYSICS:
We have been obsessed with creating the most realistic and futuristic Badminton the world has ever seen. We spent countless hours coding to make sure that you get a good experience, and we believe that we have accomplished that goal.

We hope that you enjoy playing Badminton!

additional_data.Languages: English, Chinese (China), French (France), Japanese, Portuguese (Portugal), Russian, Spanish (Spain)

Vetrix.title: Vetrix
Vetrix.desc:
Vetrix is a puzzle game inspired by Tetris, but with its own original mechanics built for virtual reality.

Immerse yourself in an 8-bit VR world and show dexterity, speed, and organization to achieve the best possible score.

> Place the shapes wherever you want
You can place shapes on the bottom, the sides, or even the top of the puzzle area. There's no gravity so make good use of the space.

> Special blocks
Special blocks will give you bonuses, make sure you collect them swiftly.

> Three game modes
Score mode - Reach the highest score possible in 300 seconds.
Time mode - Reach the target score as fast as possible.
Free mode – No time constraints, just relax.

> Eight Color Palettes
To better suit your mood.

> Online Leaderboards
So your friends know who's the best!

additional_data.Languages: English, Chinese (China), French (France), German, Italian, Japanese, Korean, Spanish (Spain)

Prospect by IrisVR - App Lab.title: Prospect by IrisVR - App Lab
Prospect by IrisVR - App Lab.desc:
Prospect is the leading VR platform for BIM & VDC teams and design firms to collaborate and perform model coordination. 

With one click, you and your team can instantly walk through 3D models from Revit, Navisworks, SketchUp, Rhino, and more in your Oculus Quest to perform QA/QC, design review, trade coordination, and more.

Prospect by IrisVR helps top ENR firms around the world instantly resolve model issues and catch errors that would have remained hidden using only 2D and traditional 3D methods, cutting down on rework costs and project delays. 

Our Quest app allows you to: 
- Sync models between your Prospect Desktop Library and the cloud with one click
- Inspect individual elements to view BIM in VR
- Measure, make markups, and capture Screenshots 
- Compile PDF Reports to capture feedback from VR meetings and track issues

Las Vegas.title: Las Vegas
Las Vegas.desc:
Take the helicopter and fly over the shiny illuminated famous Strip with its hotels and attractions.
Nice VR experience and beautiful memories if you already were there or if not, gain experience as if you are there.
You get the impression to really be over Las Vegas.
Take that crazy 360 degree real helicopter flight over Vegas by night without leaving your home, even without leaving your couch!
You can look in all directions during the flight. Turn your head, look up and down outside of the helicopter.  

You have never seen this before. 
This is the ultimate VR Experience ... frameless. 

Flight time: 14 minutes.

You fly an extraordinary route, directly over the Strip and over the hotel skyscrapers. The normal tourist sightseeing flight routes are always far from the Strip and cost many times more than that great app-flight experience. The normal tourist helicopter you can see on the horizon. If you have made such a tourist flight Las Vegas once, test the difference here.

TOKYO GAME SHOW VR 2021.title: TOKYO GAME SHOW VR 2021
TOKYO GAME SHOW VR 2021.desc:
This is the official VR application of TOKYO GAME SHOW VR 2021.

Celebrating the 25th anniversary of TOKYO GAME SHOW (TGS), the first virtual exhibition site in the history of TGS is now open!
Set in “GAME FLOAT” floating in the distant ocean somewhere in the real world, enjoy 20 exhibitors spaces, 2 official stores, 3 special video contents, and a theater where you can watch the official TGS2021 ONLINE program on a large screen!

In the unique virtual venue where famous characters welcome you, you’ll find a wealth of information about games, from the latest news to the history of TGS.
Moreover, visitors can enjoy communicating with each other through voice chat, text message display, replaceable avatar T-shirt, and a channel function that allows you to go around with your friends.

In addition, if everyone collects the “Fragments of Crystal” hidden in the venue, the power of connection among game fans will be united...!

Event dates: September 30th (Thur.) - October 3rd (Sun.), 2021

Andromeda Sports - DEMO.title: Andromeda Sports - DEMO
Andromeda Sports - DEMO.desc:
Andromeda Sports is the first sporty exercise game in VR created to use it with elastic bands providing haptic feedback and resistance.

Slide with your hoverboard to participate in obstacle courses with procedurally generated circuits capable of infinite combinations within the incredible worlds of Andromeda.

In it’s different modes you will be able to train according to your physical level and keep track of your performance in both cardio and strength training.

Train hard to reach the top of the Leaderboard.

Andromeda Sports is an experience in development to which we will be adding new game modes, new worlds to train and compete in and more sports using this same concept.

Help us to make it better! Join our discord:    discord.gg/WmrGX8KgcR

BookVAR Physics 10.title: BookVAR Physics 10
BookVAR Physics 10.desc: Learning physics has never been so fun because your school is in space! Use the holographic table to play simulations of different physics experiments. All experiments are interactive, you have to do the experiment yourself. In order for the user to know what exactly needs to be done in the laboratory there is a voice assistant and instructions on the screen.

Children of Fafnir.title: Children of Fafnir
Children of Fafnir.desc:
Children of Fafnir is a wholesome puzzle platformer where you must rescue a bunch of tiny dragons. Solve simple but satisfying puzzles by manipulating physics objects and controlling tiny dragons over a collection of fractured floating islands. Enjoy nice scenery, solve puzzles, save adorable dragons and experience a mysterious ending.

This is an early access demo version containing 7 levels, representing the first area of the game and accounting for roughly 45 minutes to 1 hour of gameplay.

The game is under active development and feedback is very welcome!

Monster Junction.title: Monster Junction
Monster Junction.desc:
Monsters are swarming the valley and the world is in danger! Only you can save the humans from the monster attacks and solve the mystery of the portals. 

Immerse yourself in this new world action adventure game, and use everything in your environment and magical powers to fight the monsters and smash them to bits. 

Enjoy dozens of levels, different sceneries and environments, multiple challenges and monster types.

With a wizard to guide you, explore magical gems that provide you with super powers and allow you to really smash some monsters. 

Complete the campaign or challenge yourself in Horde Mode (warning: Horde Mode is for experts only!).

Move through the world by walking or teleporting, great for playing sitting down or standing and for those who suffer from VR motion sickness.

This game offers a great low impact workout and gets your heart racing fast!

Get it now!

additional_data.Languages: English, English (US), English (Australia), English (Canada), English (South Africa), English (UK)

Newton's Cradle.title: Newton's Cradle
Newton's Cradle.desc:
The universe revolves at your command!  In Newton's Cradle, you create stylized planets, stars and black holes.  When you set objects loose into space they orbit around each-other governed by the laws of Newtonian gravity.   

Relax in a cosmic snow-globe of your own creation, or study complex systems of many stars.  
Customize the size and appearance of each object you create.  Set their speed and angular momentum to create orbits of varying shapes, then trace the curved paths your heavenly bodies take through space.  
Stop time to set up the perfect initial conditions.  Speed up time to watch your cosmos evolve quickly, or rewind the clock and retrace its steps.   
Move through space in any direction to observe your creations from any angle.
Set your stars in motion in Newton's Cradle!

AI Artathon Art Gallery.title: AI Artathon Art Gallery
AI Artathon Art Gallery.desc: . The place reprsent the mountains of Riyadh City This is the top 10 artworks in the AI Artathon 2020

Somewhere.title: Somewhere
Somewhere.desc:
Like Geoguessr, but in VR 🌎😎

Put your cultural knowledge to the test! This game drops you Somewhere in the world, and your job is to correctly identify where you are. The closer your guess = more points!

Explore thousands of locations 🗺
Compete with others in the community 🏆
Discover beautiful new places worldwide 🌋

A Little Planet Playground.title: A Little Planet Playground
A Little Planet Playground.desc:
# This is a multiplayer game, so to make sure you have a good multiplayer experience, we suggest you to join our Discord:discord.gg/9CTC9Bn7Zf

A Little Planet is a Japanese style social game. You can explore beautiful scenes, play multiplayer games, make friends. You will be able to build up your own planet in the future.

Features:
- Japanese Style Aesthetics: If you like watching anime or manga, you definitely don't want to miss this game!
- Party Games: If you are grown up with Mario Party, you might also like the fun and chaos in all the mini games here with a group of fun people laughing together
- Multiplayer and More: Of course, this is a multiplayer game, besides the party games, you will also play multiplayer board or chess-like games
- Chat with People: Hang out and chat with people in beautiful scenes, or chat around a tea table on fun topics
- Customize Your Look: There are different avatars with multiple hair styles, eyes, costumes, you must like them!

Journey to Alien Worlds.title: Journey to Alien Worlds
Journey to Alien Worlds.desc:
With this virtual reality experience, you don’t need a bulky spacesuit anymore to travel into outer space and land on planets, satellites or comets in our Solar System. Now you can experience how it feels to stand on the surface of these bodies, view the amazing scenery there, and get a better understanding of the differences between these heavenly bodies and the Earth. You can also bear witness to mankind’s great accomplishments in the exploration of outer space and get to know the landers and probes used and their designs. 

Currently you can experience the following sights:
1) The Moon and the Apollo Lunar Module
2) Venus and Venera 7
3) Mars and the Curiosity rover 
4) Mars and the Perseverance rover
5) Titan and the Huygens probe
6) 67P Comet, the Rosetta probe and the Philae lander
7) Saturn and the Cassini orbiter

Victoria VR - ESCAPE to Nature GALLERY.title: Victoria VR - ESCAPE to Nature GALLERY
Victoria VR - ESCAPE to Nature GALLERY.desc:
This is the first taste of amazing virtual word - Victoria VR.

Visit our virtual gallery to discover the exciting journey of Czech reapetedly rewarded photographs and cameramans Libor Spacek and Petra Dolezalova from Escape to Nature.

It was possible to discover distant worlds in documentaries produced by Escape to Nature. 
Here, you get a unique opportunity to have a look on projects aimed at saving the nature especially the underwater world thanks to work done by the team of filmmakers, photographers and scientists from around the world.

Warchasm.title: Warchasm
Warchasm.desc:
Rain down a deluge of droid destruction while avoiding the hazards of an alien world in this fast paced arcade shoot em up.

Pitted against an army of murderous mechs you must battle your way through a myriad of locales from overrun space ports to bubbling lava filled volcanoes in order to escape the Warchasm. To aid you in your fight against the alien onslaught you will have an array of weapons at your disposal from ray guns and blasters to devastating mortars and high tech, quad missile launchers.

You will need a cool head, a keen eye and razor sharp reflexes as you fight off the alien horde and make your way through this perilous VR adventure.

So grab your guns, dive in to the action and experience your first Warchasm!

Warp VR.title: Warp VR
Warp VR.desc:
Warp VR offers a unique story-based solution for immersive learning. Companies like Shell, KLM, NS, Tata Steel and Erste Bank use this approach to train their workforce in safety, security and soft skills in a realistic and personalized way.

VR training helps companies to upskill their employees up to 4x faster than classroom training and e-learning — even at a time when training budgets are shrinking and in-person training may be off the table. VR learners are significantly more confident to act on what they learned after training, and show a 75% increase in learning quality and retention, a 40% reduction in training time, and a 70% performance improvement.

Bullets 'n' Blades VR Demo.title: Bullets 'n' Blades VR Demo
Bullets 'n' Blades VR Demo.desc:
Bullets and Blades VR is an immersive rhythm experience inspired to action movies!  Dance your way against waves of enemies, dodging, shooting and slashing in freeform through the beat - every enemy requires skill, dedication and the correct attacks.

Features
- Movie-inspired combat in sync with the beat
- Handcrafted levels on unique tunes with different ranges of difficulty
- Easy to learn, freeform combat that requires dedication to reach the high scores
- Challenge yourself and try to score the highest ranks
- A fun way to exercise and keep a good cardio, with natural and personal style

CAT.title: CAT
CAT.desc:
CAT IS BACK TO MAKE ANOTHER MESS! BUT THIS TIME, IT'LL BE YOUR BLOOD.

FIND ALL 6 ITEMS, THEN GO INTO THE PENTAGRAM TO BANISH CAT BACK INTO THE BOX.
CAT WILL APPEAR AFTER FINDING THE FIRST ITEM AND WILL GET FASTER THE MORE YOU FIND.
DON'T LET HIM CATCH YOU!

Dancing Beat on Video.title: Dancing Beat on Video
Dancing Beat on Video.desc:
Dancing Beat on Video is a rhythm game base on your favorite YouTube music videos
.
How to play:
You can copy URL or ID of your favorite YouTube video (from a browser) and paste it in the game. Or just select a video in the list of trending videos in your selected location. The game will analyze and generate series of notes based on beats of the song. 
Dance and hit notes to get score and finish the video to win. Missing too many notes will lead to fail.
You have to hit the note with a moving controller. Touching the note in too low speed will miss the note.
.
NOTICE: 
The video will play online so it requires a high speed internet connection to avoid lagging streaming. Tip to solve lagging:  try to wait for loading, press "A" button to pause and press replay.
The videos have age restriction is not allowed to play.
.
Hope you enjoy your favorite videos in Dancing Beat!

Terragon: Symbol Of Magic.title: Terragon: Symbol Of Magic
Terragon: Symbol Of Magic.desc:
Terragon: Symbol Of Magic is a first person VR RPG, that lets you be a real magician by immersing you, as a player, in fast-paced magic combat against a variety of mighty monsters.
Choose your unique magic spells wisely and assign them your favorite hand gesture to cast against the evil in the fantastic realms of Terragon.

Join the quest to free Terragon from the evil possesing it, by joining the great Skyfer guild as a young, eager magician with hidden powerful magic.
Explore the vast and beautiful wilderness and realms of Terragon, gather incredible and powerful loot, 
find the legendary powerstones to increase your magic power, learn amazing spells and the secret gestures to cast them, and plenty more!

Features:
Fully immersive VR experience
Hand gesture based spell casting system
Amazing spells
Action packed magic combat
Randomly generated levels
Level progression
Inventory System
Tons of loot

Alien Squatters.title: Alien Squatters
Alien Squatters.desc:
The aliens have landed! And they've taken over our houses, buildings, and monuments.
Well, if we can't have 'em, neither can they!
Use your trusty rocket launcher to destroy the buildings they're squatting in.
When they try and fly away in their UFOs, blow them out of the sky!
There are five UFOs per level.
Once you've completed all the levels, play again, but now your rocket launcher will have increased fire rate, and the UFOs will be faster.
Quitting the game will reset your play-thru count.
Use the trigger to fire rockets - hold it down for maximum fire rate.
Use the menu button to reload a scene, quit the game, or switch handedness.
HEALTH NOTICE: This game requires substantial head and neck movement, especially when playing seated.

BlackCarbon.title: BlackCarbon
BlackCarbon.desc: An ecological catastrophe. Everything is black carbon. Is that all? There it is, a single plant fights and survives successfully … Which plant is it? How did it survive? Let’s see here, let’s get closer to it … However, it runs away … Runs away from me, away from the human, runs away to survive… Will it? Or maybe the plant that resists, that flees, is a symbol of life? The elixir of life? Hope for the future? Demonstration of the power of nature, survival … I am a being that has also survived the ecological catastrophe, which tries to attract the eluding tree, I am Übermensch, above death, above every devastation and catastrophe. Can we work together to rebuild the world which technology has destroyed? I try to approach the tree that is distrustfully fleeing, to cultivate and make our common future better.

ImmersiveLink Quest 2.title: ImmersiveLink Quest 2
ImmersiveLink Quest 2.desc:
ImmersiveLink Careers: is a virtual learning platform used to deliver fully immersive experiences in careers across Canada direct to students and job seekers.  ImmersiveLink Careers provides a multi-sensory experience to enhance the understanding of jobs and worksites; to create motivation, spark confidence and determine suitability/fit through an individual’s own lens.

ImmersiveLink Cultural: is a virtual learning platform used to deliver fully immersive Indigenous cultural experiences.  Featuring Indigenous knowledge keepers, ImmersiveLink Cultural provides Indigenous and non-Indigenous learners the ability to experience and increase their awareness of significant cultural protocols and activities, understand the love Indigenous people have for the land, and help communicate Indigenous world views from Nations across Canada.

Project Layer VR.title: Project Layer VR
Project Layer VR.desc:
"Project Layer VR" is Hacking 3D Platformer. 
Dive deep.
play time  : ~15 minutes

VOYRE.title: VOYRE
VOYRE.desc:
VOYRE is an XR Studio developing immersive and interactive content. Based out of Chicago, IL, our team uses the latest technology to push stories to the next level. We specialize in stereoscopic 360 video experiences and have filmed content all around the world. See our work here through the VOYRE app!

For more information you can reach us at hey@voyre.com.

VZplay.title: VZplay
VZplay.desc:
Say goodbye to your boring workout! VZplay is an add-on collection of arcade-style games for existing VZfit subscribers*.

Pedal faster to move faster in the game. Turn your head to aim your tank's cannon. Lean to weave between cyclists. Play with friends online, sync with Fitbit, and more.

Use with a number of smart bikes, trainers, and cadence sensors, available from online retailers.

*Requires a VZfit subscription.  Search for “VZfit” in the Oculus Store to get started.

Starfighter Arduxim.title: Starfighter Arduxim
Starfighter Arduxim.desc:
Strap into the cockpit of your Arduxim starfighter and take on enemy starships in this first-person tactical space shooter. Navigate through dangerous ice crystal fields, travel through hyper gates to other systems, take on enormous capital ships and more.

Control your ship using Touch controllers, a gamepad, or hand tracking. Players can use the thumb sticks on a physical controller, or for a more immersive experience grab virtual cockpit controls using the Touch controllers or your bare hands.

Includes:
* A fourteen mission story based campaign covering your first tour of duty on the front lines
* Multiplayer to test your skills against other pilots
* Survival/horde challenge mode with online leader board
* Tutorial
* Practice mode

additional_data.Supported Controllers: Oculus Touch, Gamepad, Touch (as Gamepad), Hand Tracking

3DVista VR.title: 3DVista VR
3DVista VR.desc:
Portfolio App and VR player to enjoy the tours created with 3DVista VT PRO.
Connect your Oculus headset to your computer and import your VR tours created with 3DVista VT PRO. When running the app on your Oculus headset, simply select from the list of available tours to run the experience in VR from anywhere and without an internet connection.
Some parts of the app are based on open source software covered by MPL 2.0:
https://www.3dvista.com/vrapp-ffr (repository)

PlayAniMaker Beta.title: PlayAniMaker Beta
PlayAniMaker Beta.desc: PlayAniMaker is a creative tool for creating "Anime". In the figure mode, you can manipulate and animate the character as if you were moving a doll.

A102.title: A102
A102.desc:
You are the first human to travel to the edge of a black hole without a return ticket, in this small space adventure you will face situations and dangers that no one has ever seen before.

Small space adventure where you will have to use your logic, skill with weapons and patience.

Your mission is to survive, an adventure not for those who look for easy things, you will find yourself in situations where your only weapon will be patience and attention to what happens in order to escape from certain death.

Jobbintervju VR.title: Jobbintervju VR
Jobbintervju VR.desc: The Job interview VR app provides an immersive experience of a job interview. The app can be used to train and prepare for a job interview.  The simulation is based on a scenario that contains 12 main questions and 14 additional comments or questions that appear optionally depending on the answers to the main questions. In the interview scenario, the user takes the role of the job candidate and goes through a typical job interview. The interviewer appears in a typical office room, captured in a 360-video format from the point of view of the user. The app does not provide much guidance and instruction on how to perform at a job interview. Instead, the user is immersed in this situation and must react to it by answering questions from the interviewer. It is possible to record the sound of the answers provided by the user, to make the experience of the situation more realistic and to allow self-assessment and reflection by enabling playback of the entire interview.

additional_data.Publisher: Norwegian University of Science and Technology

Pocket Racer : Demo.title: Pocket Racer : Demo
Pocket Racer : Demo.desc:
Race against other players to compete for the best time. All tracks created by the 'Pocket Racer : Sandbox Engine' community.

8 unique vehicles including Indy cars, Motorcycles and Monster trucks.

Use thumbstick controls to drive or grab the virtual wheel.

Bubbles Bubbles.title: Bubbles Bubbles
Bubbles Bubbles.desc: "Bubbles Bubbles" is a calming simple experience where you blow bubbles and watch them pop.

Espace V.title: Espace V
Espace V.desc:
Welcome to Espace V! The immersive space to connect, experience, and engage with Francophone cultures in a variety of digital media forms.
Inspired by the upcoming real-world building of Alliance Française Vancouver, Espace V is the permanent cultural gallery in the virtual world. 
We invite you to explore the modern space, socialize with other users, admire 2D art, photography, and dive into curated award-winning VR pieces of local and international artists.

Pierhead Arcade Quest.title: Pierhead Arcade Quest
Pierhead Arcade Quest.desc:
Pierhead Arcade 2 is the sequel to the popular indie Virtual Reality arcade simulator.
Relive your childhood spent at the arcade on the pier but this time with unlimited tokens!

Key Features
*30+ unique physics driven arcade games spread over several rooms
*Includes all DLC
*Single player and Online / LAN multiplayer
*Spend your hard earned tickets on 30+ toys in the gift shop
*Customise your avatar in one of 500+ combinations



Trailer Music by Dj Quads:
https://soundcloud.com/aka-dj-quads

RoboWreckersVR.title: RoboWreckersVR
RoboWreckersVR.desc:
You have just opened your hammer factory and the Robos want to sabotage it!
Defend against the waves of Robos by throwing the factory's various types of hammers at them!

Space Pilot Alliance.title: Space Pilot Alliance
Space Pilot Alliance.desc:
Space Pilot Alliance is a roomscale VR space flight and exploration game. Gameplay involves piloting your spaceship (pressing buttons / virtual flightstick) and ejecting from your ship to explore planet surfaces or underground bunkers with your blaster / grappling hook combo.

Game modes:

GALAXY AT WAR
Use your warp drive to explore the galaxy, land on different planets and help your army colonize different sectors of space. Help your armada fend off attacks from the 5 other alien species that are fighting for control over the same planets, and grow to become become the dominant force in the galaxy. This is the main mode of the game, and it includes ship upgrade vendors, ion bombs, melee weapon options, underground bunkers, and much more.

CAMPAIGN
Short series of dogfighting missions for each of the 5 different alien races. Complete the campaign to unlock access to different types of spacecraft.

QUICK MATCH
Choose your army sizes and jump into the action

TUTORIALS
Learn the basics

VRflow Airbus A320.title: VRflow Airbus A320
VRflow Airbus A320.desc:
- This is the individual/student version of VRflow -

VRflow A320 is the interactive cockpit procedure trainer for pilots. Train procedures in training scenarios that incorporate detailed aircraft behavior including sounds, instruments and cockpit layout.

VRflow incorporates numerous features for efficient learning and aircraft familiarization, ideal for type ratings. Train with or without visual help, track your errors, see your training time, train with an automatic crewmember and much more.

The following procedures are included: Preliminary Cockpit Preparation, Cockpit Preparation, Before Start, At Start Clearance, Engine Start, After Start, Taxi, Before Takeoff, Takeoff, After Takeoff, After Landing, Parking and Securing Aircraft.

VRflow also contains Explore Mode, where you can explore the cockpit and learn about systems.

The individual/student version does not include multi-crew functionality.

VRflow Airbus A320 Demo.title: VRflow Airbus A320 Demo
VRflow Airbus A320 Demo.desc:
VRflow A320 is the interactive cockpit procedure trainer for pilots. Train procedures in training scenarios that incorporate detailed aircraft behavior including sounds, instruments and cockpit layout.

VRflow incorporates numerous features for efficient learning and aircraft familiarization, ideal for type ratings. Train with or without visual help, track your errors, see your training time, train with an automatic crewmember and much more.

This demo version includes the Cockpit Preparation procedure.

Buy the full version for access to the following procedures:
Preliminary Cockpit Preparation, Cockpit Preparation, Before Start, At Start Clearance, Engine Start, After Start, Taxi, Before Takeoff, Takeoff, After Takeoff, After Landing, Parking and Securing Aircraft. Explore Mode, where you can explore the cockpit and learn about systems, is also included in the full version.

Baseball Practice.title: Baseball Practice
Baseball Practice.desc:
Automatic baseball pitching machine chucks a ball every 5 seconds or so. Try and knock it out of the park.

Play in 12 minute sessions. Enough time for a good workout. Receive stats such as number of home runs, longest hit, average flight distance, etc. 

Try to make the monthly leader board. Try to make the Wall of Champions. Try to be a Legend !!

Jam Studio VR.title: Jam Studio VR
Jam Studio VR.desc: Jam Studio VR immerses you in a world of music where you interact with virtual musical instruments pre-loaded with notes and riffs to play simply by touching the instruments. Jam Studio VR is made for everyone - no music experience required. Just play and enjoy – no scoring and no judgement. You play what you want, when you want to, cueing the instruments by playing them. It’s all harmonious and musically appropriate, paired and ready for play with dynamic background rhythm tracks adding to your experience with musical genres including EDM, Rock, Classical, Pop, Jazz, Hip-Hip, Country and World. Play instruments used in rock bands, symphony orchestras, jazz combos, country music, unique instruments from around the world, sound effects and beats for EDM music making. Jam Studio VR is NOT a game - it’s an experience that lets you jump right in with no technical rules to hold you back. Jam Studio VR - Experience it!

Plush Madness.title: Plush Madness
Plush Madness.desc:
A summoning has gone wrong.Now the house and all plushies are possessed.
Can you make it through the maze, activate all symbols and defeat the demon?

Plush Madness is a Horror Fighting Game optimized for VR and playable for Flatscreen too.

In every room, you'll see plushies trying to attack you.
You can pick them up, rip them apart or just hit them and make them fly.

You'll have to activate the symbols in the correct order to open the last door in the basement.

There is a Time Limit on your hands. Whenever you defeat a plushie, the timer is incremented.
Can you make it to the end without running out of time?

Space Walk.title: Space Walk
Space Walk.desc: The Aalto Virtual Planetarium is a tour of the inner Solar System, with the grand structures of planetary magnetospheres show through the eyes of a space physicist. Aimed at education and outreach, the immersive virtual reality experience demonstrates Aalto space research, including the plasma physics of the Sun, magnetosphere of inner planets, the Finland100 satellite and cometary environments. Complex structures and spatial scales of magnetospheric physics are intuitively presented, with plans for research tools of 3D simulation data based on the system.

Agent Simulation Demo.title: Agent Simulation Demo
Agent Simulation Demo.desc:
Agent Simulation is an action, simulation, and strategy game in which each player shows their targeting skills and agility against enemies in a virtual environment. At the end of each mission, you will collect medals and earn various certificates with these medals. At the end of the game, these certificates will prove your strength as an agent and help you to receive your agent license. 
In each level of the ‘Agent Simulation’, you will be evaluated according to your targeting skills. Before the limited time provided ends, you must kill all your enemies. Every successful head shot will get you more points! Sometimes you will be asked to complete the missions in such a limited time, you have to be fast and agile!
There will be three options offered in each level and those options will constantly change! For example, double bullets, double damage, slowing time down, blocking bullets or extra life, etc. You can strategize using any of these options!  
Fight to be the best!

Boule Petanque.title: Boule Petanque
Boule Petanque.desc:
BOULE PETANQUE is a VR sports game that makes you play boules or pétanque or boccia.
Petanque is a target sport that is played with steel boules and a jack (target ball). Get the boules as close as you can to the jack to score points. When you get to 13 points, you win.
No matter what the weather is like, the sun always shines on the square in the game. In the relaxed atmosphere of a square that could be like this in the south of France, you can throw the jack and the balls. In single player mode you learn how to do it, in multi-player mode you can compete against other players. These can be friends or random players all over the world.
Special is certainly the sound of the game: the cicadas buzz, the bullets bang and immediately you are in another world.

Join our discord: https://discord.gg/ZSrNdqDPbf

GAME CREDITS:
Frank Schönhofer - Lead Developer
Kai Kramhöft - Producer

Music/Sounds:
https://freesound.org/

CHESS.title: CHESS
CHESS.desc: Feel as if you can touch the pieces with this all new grabbable chess experience. Rack up wins against opponents to gain the highest rank of master. Easy to pick up, interactive and fun for everyone.

2DLike Adventure.title: 2DLike Adventure
2DLike Adventure.desc:
This game is
Use dash and jump to reach the goal.
to reach the goal of the stage.
jumping action game.


Operation Description
LStick(Left/Right)     
-Move　　

LStick(Left/Right) +Hold B
-Dash　

A Button
-Jump

------------------------

Story
The orb that brings peace to the world has been stolen by an evil dragon!

The heroes are now
To reclaim the orb!

2DLike Adventure Demo.title: 2DLike Adventure Demo
2DLike Adventure Demo.desc:
This game is
This is a trial version of "2DLike Adventure".

In the demo version
You can play some of the stages.
If you like it, please purchase the full version!

This game is
Use dash and jump to reach the goal.
to reach the goal of the stage.
jumping action game.


Operation Description
LStick(Left/Right)     
-Move　　

LStick(Left/Right) +Hold B
-Dash　

A Button
-Jump

------------------------

Story
The orb that brings peace to the world has been stolen by an evil dragon!

The heroes are now
To reclaim the orb!

360Channel.title: 360Channel
360Channel.desc:
360Channelは、360度動画のオリジナルコンテンツを配信するプラットフォームです。
バラエティ、ドキュメンタリー、音楽、観光など様々なジャンルで高品質な360度動画を無料で配信いたします。
360Channelの楽しみ方

・360Channelは、Rift 、スマートフォン、パソコンからご利用いただけます。その他HMDにも随時対応予定です。
・すきま時間にスマートフォンで動画をお気に入りボタンでストックして頂き、VRアプリで、ストックした動画をゆっくり楽しんでいただけます。もちろん、スマートフォンやパソコンでも再生可能です。（360Channelとしては、HMDを装着した上で視聴していただくことを推奨しております）

※一部機能は、アカウント登録が無ければご利用いただけません。アカウント登録は、スマートフォン、パソコンからおこなえます。

Look & Play.title: Look & Play
Look & Play.desc:
This app focusses on getting the VR Video to the user without any UI distractions. Perfect for events.

Look & Play supports
- Stereoscopic video playback and images
- Monoscopic video playback and images
- 2D video playback and images
- TBE audio files
- Custom branding
- Various playback settings like pausing or restarting the video when the headset is taken off

MAD DOG 2021.title: MAD DOG 2021
MAD DOG 2021.desc:
MADDOG MCGEE and his band of bandit kin have taken over the town of Sanguine Springs! Do you have what it takes to send 'em packin'?

Saddle up, Ranger! It's time to ride again!

CLASSIC quickdraw arcade action meets HOLOGRAPHIC video and VR! 

FREE forever! 

Comfort Warning: CHEESY ACTING

CLASHBOWL.title: CLASHBOWL
CLASHBOWL.desc:
Play bowling exactly like in real life right from the comfort of your own home!

Yeah, you heard it right!

Feel just like in a real bowling club due to our ultra realistic physics system and mind blowing graphics.

Freely move everywhere you want, not just on the bowling area!

Enjoy the amazing bowling venues!

See your score live on a huge TV (just like in real life)

Compete against other players and be in top 20 ranking!

Play multiplayer against your friends or family using the same headset.

Pick the pins style that you like the most.

Create up to 4 players accounts on your device.

Discover the secret hidden bowling balls!

Once you find them, your bowling game will never be the same!

All this without:

Spending a fortune for one hour of playing bowling

Crazy masks

Annoying commentators

Rude staff

Or weirdos from the hood

Btw, when you'll have your first 300 score game, email us to receive special gifts.

Anyway, good luck with the first strike!

See you inside!

HomeparxVR.title: HomeparxVR
HomeparxVR.desc: Experience your house before it is even built. homeparx is a platform that presents houses in 3D on the web and on the Oculus Quest. Let yourself be inspired by many different designs and have fun walking through your own future home.

HyperTunnel.title: HyperTunnel
HyperTunnel.desc:
HyperTunnel enables frontline workers to summon experts for side-by-side guidance and support through a shared immersive digital twin, providing a real-time avatar to mimic operations on site. This provides the supervisor the ability to observe and understand the actions performed by the frontline workers and provide feedback in spatial context.

The application provides the following capabilities:
- Generate and distribute immersive Digital Twins of remote worksites.
- Synchronize physical worksites with immersive Digital Twins.
- Augment the shared working space by leveraging Computer Vision

PLAGUE -KOU-GAI-.title: PLAGUE -KOU-GAI-
PLAGUE -KOU-GAI-.desc:
"PLAGUE -KOU-GAI-" is a first-person shooting action VR.

It is a story about a fierce battle with extraterrestrials that indiscriminately attack people at a future space exploration station, with the motif of "locust plague" in which a flock of locusts move and eat up plants.

Shooting at the constantly appearing enemies is a good way to get rid of your daily frustration.

◆◆◆◇◇◇◆◆◆◇◇◇

Collaboration with Japanese famous virtual YouTuber Otsuta L!

Life-sized Otsuta L will be the platoon leader of the troops you belong to, watching over you and encouraging you.


Audio is Japanese only

Skategirl Destroys the Universe (timed d.title: Skategirl Destroys the Universe (timed demo)
Skategirl Destroys the Universe (timed d.desc:
SKATEGIRL DESTROYS THE UNIVERSE is a game played on TV screens floating in a surreal 3D VR space. On the screens the player controls Skategirl, who just destroyed the universe. The player in VR must grab, move and fit together the TV screens like jigsaw pieces to create a path Skategirl can move through to escape the horrible consequences of her own actions.

SKATEGIRL will be available for sale in 2022. In the meantime, this time-limited demo will be available during Gamescom (Aug 23 - Aug 29, 2021).

Face Your Ears.title: Face Your Ears
Face Your Ears.desc:
Face your Ears is a set of experiences that will tickle your sense of hearing! It's also a fun App to share with family and friends who are new to VR.

Get chased by Bees! And just miss being hit by a Speeding Train!

Headphones recommend for total immersion.

We created several scenes that include 3D audio, environmental effects, and the Doppler effect. All the experiences support 6DoF, so feel free to move around, turn in different directions, and even close your eyes to see if you can guess exactly where a sound is coming from. You can also turn immersive sound off to hear the difference.

Go from a soothing piano experience to a dark and stormy night with flashes of lightning and roaring thunder. Step into a subway station with the echo of announcements and the sound of trains as they come and go. Even experience the surprising realism of bees buzzing all around you on a moonlit night.

MYX.title: MYX
MYX.desc:
Welcome to MYX Virtual Events Platform, a next-gen VR experience Exclusive to the Quest, 
MYX will take you on a night-out experience you will never forget.

Why Choose MYX? Why watch a YouTube Live Stream event, when you could virtually be there at it. 

MYX is currently in Early Access so some features and venues are still in development but we will release them as they become ready to share, ensuring this world will continuously unfold as you play over time. 

COMING SOON: 
MORE CLUBS: We are working with some of the Coolest real-world nightclubs to bring you live premium events from some of the world's hottest DJs. 
LIVE CHAT: coming and plenty more experiences that will blow your mind. 
SECRET STUFF: And heaps of secrets we can't share yet. Make sure you share, comment & review! 

but most of all Enjoy MYX - We made it with love for you. :) 

Us@funder.studio

Light Balance VR.title: Light Balance VR
Light Balance VR.desc:
Get an up-close look at all your favorite LIGHT BALANCE characters dancing in 360 3D Virtual Reality! 

Rising to global acclaim as the only 2-time Golden Buzzer award-winning dance troupe on "America's Got Talent," LIGHT BALANCE delivers ultramodern immersive neon LED light performances that intertwine with signature acrobatic dance choreography. 

Supporting playback at up to 6K resolution, purchase the app to get 6 songs in 3 separate experiences. Whether in VR or IRL, you've definitely never seen anything like it! 

Check out @lighbalance online: https://lightbalance.net/

Produced by @virtualityxr
Music by @justifiednoise
Edited by @channo.yoon
VFX by @art.and.al

Windlands.title: Windlands
Windlands.desc:
A first-person grappling hook exploration game.

Soar through the ruins of a fallen civilization and discover the secrets of the ancient world.

It appeals to those who want to explore the breathtaking vistas at a relaxing pace, while the challenging routes attract gamers who like to master the skill of soaring through the towering environments at top speed.

Gameplay Features

* Designed and built for Virtual Reality First.
* Grappling Hooks Focused Movement.
* Variety of expansive levels that reward exploration.
* Multiple routes provide a range of optional challenges.
* Optional Skill based Speed Runs and Time Trials
* Goal Driven Gameplay with Easy (Hook Anything), Normal and Hard Modes.

Color Connect.title: Color Connect
Color Connect.desc:
Color Connect - Lose yourself in space with over 50+ challenging puzzles, putting your gray matter to the test - Sit, Solve and Space Out!

*Sit* - Zero gravity and adaptive controls bring the puzzles to you. Kick back after a long day on your couch or dive right in for a 360 degree puzzle solving experience. 

*Solve* - You’ll be puzzling for hours with over 50 thoughtfully constructed levels. Logically connect all the colored nodes to progress and earn stars as you go. 

*Space Out* - Atop your very own platform surrounded by satellites and stars, the stunning visuals combined with our carefully selected soundtrack will transport you to another galaxy. 

*For the best audio experience we suggest using headphones*

*How to play* - Connect all ends of the colored nodes, strategically choosing your path with the fewest moves possible. There can be no overlapping of paths and every node must be used to successfully complete the puzzles. It's simple to learn but challenging to master!

Playing VR with Girl Friend.title: Playing VR with Girl Friend
Playing VR with Girl Friend.desc:
[Description]
Enjoy the conversation with your girl friend!
This is a strategy game.
Place the units in the map using your hand.
Destory the enemy's Base to win!
Defeat the enemies before they destroy your Base.

[How to Play]
Use your hand or a controller to play!
Press the button, pick up the units and release them in the map!
The left and right sticks allow you to move the user's position slightly.

[Type of Units]
-Base
This is the Base.
Build your Base stronger!!

-Fighter
A common flying unit.
Ground & Air Attack.

-Factory
A factory unit.
It generates cash.

-Bomber
A flying unit skilled for
bombing and ground attack.

-Tank
An anti-ground unit.
Attacks with rapid fire.

-Anti-aircraft Artillery
A placement unit using missles.
Effective to flying units.

-Sheild
A placement unit for defense.
It has high durability.

FitnessBird.title: FitnessBird
FitnessBird.desc:
Many of us are aware of the hyper-casual birdie game. The rules have changed. To manipulate the birdie, you must:
- move your arms up and down
- move your arms at your sides
- or crouch. 
The game has several difficulty modes. 
Test your endurance! 
It will be fun ;-)

Penguin.title: Penguin
Penguin.desc:
Including a variety of need to unlock the fight props:
Variety of penguins
Various terrain
A variety of special effects props
A variety of combat props
Shop trucks sell a variety of capacity props.

We Are Two.title: We Are Two
We Are Two.desc:
Rhythmic balls slashing game that will challenge your saber skills.
Welcome to the surreal world where you stand to defend your island surrounded by water in the company of your friendly AI companion. It dances, it smiles, it wants to see you win.

Boxed.title: Boxed
Boxed.desc: Boxed is your classic match 3 game taken to the virtual space. You enter in Boxed village and are quickly surrounded by rings of boxed that you must destroy in order to hit your targets and advance. Match 3 of the same color or eliminate massive amounts of boxes with special balls. Boxed will test your puzzle mind and your arm strength. Hop on in and get throwing

Dynamic Spanish Demo.title: Dynamic Spanish Demo
Dynamic Spanish Demo.desc:
Start speaking Spanish right now in Virtual Reality!

Conquer your fear of speaking Spanish through simulated interactions with virtual amigos in the Starter Pack.

Build your Spanish speaking confidence by experiencing and practising realistic scenarios, which simulate the emotions and nerves of speaking a foreign language.

Discover the culture, history, and language in immersive, interactive videos in Dynamic Spanish Trips.

Explore Spain in 20 Trips and feel like you’re on holiday, soaking up the sights and sounds of Spain.

Immerse yourself in guided tours around breathtaking sites.

DEMO version includes a great selection of 360 content and online materials so you can try Dynamic Spanish before you purchase. Thanks for supporting small independent VR creators.

SUITABLE FOR BEGINNERS AND ABOVE

GrooVR.title: GrooVR
GrooVR.desc:
Get ready to become the best Air Drummer in the galaxy! 

Are you tired of rhythm games that JUST DON'T MAKE SENSE? With GrooVR you will have the chance to learn how to play drums and have fun at the same time in an awesome sci-fi environment! 

You will have a close experience of playing real drums in VR!

- Genres: Punk, Metal, Pop-punk, Rock'n'roll, Industrial
- The game includes 38 songs
- Mixed Reality Capture Supported

PLAY AS YOU WILL! Change the position of the drums and make your own setup!

Our ultimate goal is to make players learn how to play drums. We are working towards this goal as we improve the experience, add new music, and introduce to the players different techniques used to play Rock'n'Roll music and its derivations. Also, players who do not know much about drums or Rock music can start the game on medium difficulty and increase it over time, playing more difficult songs and selecting the realistic version when they feel right.

Skybinder.title: Skybinder
Skybinder.desc:
Get in flow, unlock new creatures, and dive into the world of Skybinder.

Skybinder is a minimalist VR puzzle game. 

* Connect dots to solve increasingly detailed 3D puzzles
* Create an enormous whale and a cheeky chicken, triangle by triangle
* Discover which dots among dozens connect to reveal a king cobra

Activate your mind in this meditative game that soothes and stimulates. Skybinder is a puzzle anyone can play, but few can master. Can you become the Skybinder?

additional_data.Languages: English, English (UK), English (US), English (Australia), English (Canada), English (South Africa)

Tunnel Runner.title: Tunnel Runner
Tunnel Runner.desc:
Can you make it to the end of the tunnel? Got what it takes to be the ultimate tunnel runner? Race at incredible speeds through over 1000 varying tunnels avoiding anything that gets in your way. 
Features:
- Race down tunnels and along pipes avoiding everything
- Endless play
- Mercy shields to help you along
- Progressive difficulty system to keep you on your feet

Dissection Simulator: Invertebrate Editi.title: Dissection Simulator: Invertebrate Edition
Dissection Simulator: Invertebrate Editi.desc:
VictoryXR’s virtual dissection software is a hands-on opportunity experienced through the power of VR. Join Wendy Martin, national award-winning science teacher, to guide you through a virtual reality dissection. Learn the fundamentals of dogfish anatomy through its various systems in our fully immersive VR experience using Carolina Biological’s expert curricula and process.

The entire program adheres to the Next Gen Science Standards (NGSS), America’s framework for science learning. In addition, we’ve implemented the processes and procedures of Carolina Biological--America’s leading supplier of science education materials. Using original and lifelike physical models, the dissection experience is recreated to the finest detail and is a comparable substitute for actual live specimen classroom dissections, without the safety and ethical implications.

Ramcastle.title: Ramcastle
Ramcastle.desc:
Choose your starting castle! 

Build walls to surround the perimeter of your base and place cannons in your territory to defend against waves of incoming ships.

Ramcastle is a classic strategy & cannon blasting experience being developed by CuriousVR.

MULTIPLAYER UPDATE: available now!

bHaptics Player.title: bHaptics Player

Fairgrounds.title: Fairgrounds
Fairgrounds.desc:
