Fairgrounds is the virtual place to hang out and play games. Play arcade-style games with your friends or explore our themed lounges. Fairgrounds is free and cross-platform. Available on Mac, Windows, and Oculus.

Check out Fairgrounds, and join us as we create somewhere you can call your place in the metaverse.

Grapple Tournament Demo.title: Grapple Tournament Demo
Grapple Tournament Demo.desc:
Free Demo of Grapple Tournament with limited singleplayer and occasional free multiplayer events.

For unlimited multiplayer check out the full game: https://www.oculus.com/experiences/quest/5133055276721

Join our Discord for free pvp events: https://discord.gg/A4fUKDC

Grapple. Shoot. Score. Master the vertical combat.

Grapple Tournament is an arcade shooter built from the ground up for virtual reality. You can enjoy complete 3D movement freedom by running, double jumping, wall jumping, climbing and using your grappling hook of course, in an alluring stylized world.

More than 12 multifunctional weapons! Plasma pistols, revolvers, energy rifles, shotguns and rocket launchers, energy blades and bow await your command. Use them in one hand, two handed (with secondary fire) or dual wield for increased damage. What is your tactic? Mobility or firepower?

In this demo you can play against bots and prepare for the multiplayer with a practice range, drone challenges and more.

Multiverse.title: Multiverse
Multiverse.desc: Dusty multiverse is an official Virtual Burning Man experience and it is an interactive and immersive social platform that thrives on artistic collaboration and participation on a global scale. You can enjoy many unique experiences just like a live Burning man: For examples, performers of all types can broadcast themselves live to a global audience and gift their art in many ways. Participants can also communicate in real time via live voice chat. You appear as a customized 3D avatar and will be able to see some of the official Burning Man honoraria art, along with some of the famous Burning Man Sound camps. DJs will be broadcasting live music 24/7. You can dance with others, and you can participate in many interesting social experiences.

TargetGolf.title: TargetGolf
TargetGolf.desc: This is a game where you hit a golf ball and hit the target.

AlpineAcceleration Demo.title: AlpineAcceleration Demo
AlpineAcceleration Demo.desc:
This game is
This is a trial version of "AlpineAcceleration".

In the Demo version, you can play stages 1, 2, and 7.
If you like it, please purchase the full version!


This game is
The goal of the game is to avoid falling off the stage and hitting obstacles.
Use jumping to reach the goal of the course.

The key is to adjust the timing and speed of your jumps!

Game Controls
Oculus Touch X button Hold
(When you're going downhill / Speed Up)
(On the way up the hill / Reduced deceleration)

Oculus Touch A button (Jump)

The Secret of Retropolis Demo.title: The Secret of Retropolis Demo
The Secret of Retropolis Demo.desc:
The Secret of Retropolis is a VR narrative game of a new kind, a blend of classic point-and-click adventure with immersive cinematography. Embody the witty protagonist of a film noir plot. Meet unforgettable characters. Solve puzzles. Lose yourself in the retro-futuristic atmosphere.

EXPERIENCE IN COMFORT.
As a seated experience with intuitive controls, first time VR users will find this game engaging and easy to play. Experienced VR users will find this game casual and relaxing.

STORY. ART. MUSIC.
Enter a sprawling retro-futuristic cityscape with an original score, ensemble of voice actors and detailed hand drawn (in VR!) environments.

GOOD ‘OL ADVENTURE GAME
Boot up that nostalgia for your favorite 90's point-and-click adventure games. Look around. Find items. Solve puzzles. Keep the past alive.


* No robots were harmed in the making of this game.

VR Practical Shooting.title: VR Practical Shooting
VR Practical Shooting.desc:
Release date 20 November 2021

VR Practical Shooting is a sandbox experience built for those who are interested in competition shooting and sandbox shooters. There are various free ranges, competition mode with detailed scoring, all using realistically modelled firearms and innovative controls to closely mimic the real thing in ways that feels natural. 

Join the discord server for feedback and suggestions: https://discord.me/blobworks
Join the YouTube channel for frequent devlogs: https://www.youtube.com/c/blobworks

GO CLUBBING VR.title: GO CLUBBING VR
GO CLUBBING VR.desc:
Clubmixed is proud to present Go Clubbing our fully interactive virtual club.  Explore five fabulous rooms with a host of DJs streaming in explosive video and audio sets.  We will be regularly updating this experience with new DJs from around the world.

The Underground Room
Massive screens beamed in with DJs playing some of the newest music, on giant screens move to the top-level using one of our exclusive dance cages.

The Sunset Bar
High In The Sky, visit our really cool sunset bar with smooth DJs playing banging tunes, grab a drink at our bar, and party the night away.  

The Time Machine  
Transports you back in time. We Recreate your favourite nights, clubs,  and sets.  From those  DJs who started it all (Club Classics).

The Pool Party
Get the ambience from the Miami music scene.

The Moon Party
Dance on the moon while watching the earth!

CUSTOM AVATARS
Please use the https://clubmixed.readyplayer.me/ link to build your own then use the shortcode on entry to the club.

Spunky Dungeon.title: Spunky Dungeon
Spunky Dungeon.desc: Being a master treasure hunter, you've been called upon by Wilberton. He has sent a team of archaeologists into a cursed dungeon. They have not returned and are in dire need of your help. Can you overcome the dungeon traps and defeat the magic monsters?

Squingle Demo.title: Squingle Demo
Squingle Demo.desc:
Featuring 8 levels from the full game – Experience Squingle first hand before getting the full version here: 

https://www.oculus.com/experiences/quest/3728129847268965

“Brilliantly creative” ~ RoadToVR

10/10 - “The perfect VR game.” ~ ZimTok5

93% - "A masterpiece.” ~ RuffTalkVR

9.1/10 - "One of the most fascinating and original things ever seen.” ~ VRItalia

“A great puzzle game.” ~ UploadVR

91% - “One of a kind.” ~ VRGameCritic

The critically-acclaimed Spiraling Psychedelic Puzzle – Squingle is a unique multisensory showcase that must be seen, heard and felt to be believed.

Guide revolving orbs through 100 handcrafted iridescent mazes that twist and turn, then race your own ghost!

Solve ingenious puzzles with a changing musical soundscape and "psychedelic visuals that are in a class of their own", as Squingle guides you through a story of transcendence.

Compete in Leaderboards, break world records, and unlock all the Achievements for intense replayability.

Tele Tennis.title: Tele Tennis
Tele Tennis.desc:
Multiplayer tennis simulation game

Learn more about us:

https://teletennis.games

For feedbacks, questions, or asking for testing keys, please joint our discord server: 

https://discord.gg/3Sctz5ABEn

We design this to be closer to a tennis game in real life, rather than a simple video game. Practice with helpful bots, train with professional tennis coach, and compete with real human player through teleportation.

UFO Blastorama.title: UFO Blastorama
UFO Blastorama.desc:
A new take on a classic arcade hit, wield two guns and defend Earth from the Invaders from Space!

Please note that this is a pre-alpha release.  There are bugs, and many features to be added.

VRGOS Worship & Praise Music.title: VRGOS Worship & Praise Music
VRGOS Worship & Praise Music.desc: This app was created to spread the good news of the Gospel. With one click you will experience and participate in 360 church service, singing and preaching. Discover new and upcoming recording artist, gospel and Christian music. This app promises to uplift and inspire your day.  If you like Gospel, Worship and Praise Music, take some time out and watch some gifted singers and musicians. Hear some of the greatest preachers expound on God's word.  You will be in the middle of the worship experience right in the comfort of your own home. VRGOS Worship & Praise is the next level of faith base ministry reaching the world for Jesus Christ.

4DMEDIAPLAYER.title: 4DMEDIAPLAYER
4DMEDIAPLAYER.desc:
1.ログインなし
ログイン無しでのご使用はスキップボタンを選択してお進みください。
お試し動画が視聴できます。

2.ログイン・ログアウト
LPEGPOINT提携サイトで登録したログインID、パスワードを入力しログインを選択します。
「ライブ/お試し動画/お気に入り/ローカル動画/DLセンター」等のメニューが並びます。
サイトで作品のご購入、月額契約等をしたIDでログインを行うと作品が一覧に並びます。
ログアウト方法＞メインメニュー左下の設定ボタンよりログアウトを選択してください。

3.右部メニュー
プレイヤー右部のメニューで「タイプ/並べ替え/メーカー/ジャンル/出演者/VR写真集/字幕機能」の検索が出来ます。
タイプは「VR・2D」の作品切り替えが出来ます。
右上部の検索ボタンを選択してワードを入力すると検索が行えます。
検索をやり直したい場合、下部のリセットボタンを選択して下さい。

4.購入済み
一覧から作品を選択、PLAYを押して視聴できます。
ダウンロードは「詳細＞ダウンロード」を選択します。DLセンターに登録されます。

5.設定
キャッシュクリア＞正常に再生しない場合、キャッシュの削除を行ってください。
プライバシーポリシー＞利用規約はこちらからご確認ください。
アップデート＞現在のバージョンの確認とアップデートができます。

6.ローカル動画
上部メニューで「全部/動画/VR写真集」の切り替えが可能です。
下部のボタンで選択、削除が行えます。
ローカル動画＞Downloadフォルダはダウンロードした動画が保存されます。

7.DLセンター
上部メニューでダウンロード中/ダウンロード済みが切り替え可能です。
ダウンロード中の動画の再生は出来ません。
動画の右側でその動画のファイル数が確認できます。
複数ファイルを自動でダウンロードしたい場合は自動DLをONにしてください。
ダウンロードを辞めたい場合はストップに切り替え下さい。削除・再ダウンロードは下部のボタンで行えます。

8.動画視聴中のメニュー
動画視聴中にトリガーを押すと操作メニューを表示します。
左側スライドバーで音量/明るさの調整が行えます。
中心のアイコンで再生/一時停止　10・60秒の早送り/巻き戻し、スライドバーでは再生時間の変更ができます。
右側のスライドバーでズーム、視差の調整

Puzzle Cafe VR.title: Puzzle Cafe VR
Puzzle Cafe VR.desc: Puzzle Cafe VR is a relaxing jigsaw puzzle game made for VR. Relax in a nice cafe and solve some jigsaw puzzles, complete challenges and upgrade the cafe scenery.

RAUM virtual collaboration.title: RAUM virtual collaboration
RAUM virtual collaboration.desc:
RAUM virtual reality collaboration changes the way we work today and simplifies the interaction with the digital tools.

A multi-user environment in which teams scattered around the world can virtually meet and work together. Teamwork in Virtual Reality, i.e. the fusion of the working world, office software and virtual reality meetings opens a whole new way to work, is highly efficient and will offer many industries an easy step into digitalization.

Seensio.title: Seensio
Seensio.desc:
SEENS.IO is a multi-purpose platform that can help millions of people connect in VR spaces. With unlimited connections, organizations can think of different ways to deliver content like real life. In addition, organizations can own these locations and customize them according to their intended usage.

A special feature of SEENS.IO is in the location map that recreates famous landmarks and architectural works in real life. Organizations can own a location in SEENS.IO World to support its various purposes.

Free to use the basic features for all users.
Multi-Platform: Connect VR and mobile devices.
Multi-Purpose: Can be suitable for many uses.
Massive Multiplayer: Supports connecting millions of users in each location.
Real Locations: Real-life locations recreated in the VR world of SEENS.IO.
Highly Customizable: Customize to the smallest detail of locations.
Own A Location: Take ownership of VR property inside SEENS.IO (NFT certified).
Easy To Manage: Easily organize meetings.

Antiprism.title: Antiprism
Antiprism.desc:
Follow the two misfit pilots Jexen and Malik as they stumble upon an ancient artifact that binds them together and takes them on a perilous adventure through the most dangerous place in the galaxy: The Gone.
Fight your way through bands of space pirates, armies of the Selysian Dominion, swarms of insect-like Kheelee, and even face Vel Selysian - the mysterious prophet-like leader of the Dominion.
Collect items and credits from your encounters and use them to customize and upgrade parts of your ships - you will need all the firepower you can get in order to reach the end of our pilots' journey.
Test your aim and dodging abilities against elite enemies, unique bosses and environmental hazards, as you uncover the secrets of the Antiprism and its connection to the extinct civilization of Arn.

Big Ballers Basketball.title: Big Ballers Basketball
Big Ballers Basketball.desc:
Big Ballers Basketball is the ultimate basketball simulator. Enter a virtual basketball court and practice your jump shot or even your sky hook! Use a natural basketball stroke and Big Ballers Basketball's realistic physics engine will do the rest. Make sure to hold the grip button until the top of your release. Try the 1 minute drill minigame or experiment with reduced gravity. The court is yours! Dribbling, multiplayer and even Shaq mode. It's the easiest way to have fun, socialize and exercise at the same time.

As you shoot enjoy the music from your very own Boom Box. Feeling a little tired? Big Baller's has got you covered you can play seated or standing. 

We look to update at least every two weeks so stay tuned!

Blackjack.title: Blackjack
Blackjack.desc:
Play SUPER FAST real-time MULTIPLAYER Blackjack now to improve your skills, gain experience, make new FRIENDS.

With Blackjack, you now have the famous gambling game always with you - for free and online. Play Blackjack like a pro. Adapt the rules, train your skills and become a blackjack pro yourself!

♦️ 10,000 FREE CHIPS ON SIGN-UP.
♠️ 1000 FREE CHIPS EVERY 12 HOURS.
♥️ VOICE CHAT – Live voice chat with gamers all over the world.
♣️ AVATARS – To personalize your in-game look.

Blackjack is a free online game of chance and skill for entertainment purposes only. It is not possible to win real money, real items/services/gifts or goods in kind by playing our skill games. The virtual currencies used in this game are called Chips, and they can be purchased in the ‘Store’ with real money. Chips cannot be exchanged for cash or be paid out in any form and can only be used to play our game. Blackjack is intended solely for an adult audience - gamers aged eighteen years or over.

BoomXR.title: BoomXR
BoomXR.desc:
A boxing pad trainer where you hit coloured targets in sync with the beats of your mp3.

You'll also have to dodge and parry strikes as you top the ranks of the ninja shrine.

Striking angles are strict and the game promotes hip movement for intense workouts.

The dark setting combines elements of rave and martial arts in a colourful experience.

All the beats are mapped in real-time by our algorithm, including the default music.

The game difficulty adapts to your live score so the better you play the harder it gets.

TIP: Create a folder "/sdcard/Music/Yolopia" to limit the mp3 search in that folder only.

EnvisionVR.title: EnvisionVR
EnvisionVR.desc:
Our EnvisionVR app allows you to view your future projects in high-fidelity Virtual Reality.

Create virtual inspections of your off-the-plan properties in VR. You can talk to buyers in real-time, explain what they are seeing and navigate them throughout the property.

Off-the-plan properties have been sold in the same way for years with brochures, high-quality photo renders, and stylish display suites. Whilst they do the trick, here at EnvisionVR we like to take things to the next level. That's why we created our world-first EnvisionVR app which allows you to view your future project in high-fidelity Virtual Reality and Augmented Reality using a VR headset or smart device. Our VR experiences are completely mobile, multi-person and collaborative coupled with an easy- to-use interface that will enhance your sales process.

Firedrake Crypts Of The Golem King.title: Firedrake Crypts Of The Golem King
Firedrake Crypts Of The Golem King.desc:
The Necromages of Ozmot are recruiting the dark forces of evil to find ancient and powerful artifacts scattered throughout the kingdom of Dorin.

Discover magic items and weapons and go on quests  obtaining new abilities, all the while trying to uncover the sinister plot of the Necromagesof Ozmot and their pursuit to exhume the long vanquished Red Dragons.

Will you brave the dark horrors of the crypt, solve it's riddles and recover the weapons and magics for the High Septs of Gilifax   before  the unlifeless minions Of Ozmot discover them? 

Playtime: 2-3 Hours
Specifically optimized for Q1
Optimized for accessibility (multimodal movement, high contrast graphics)

NOTE:
The Crypts Of The Golem King is an EXTREME VR experience.   Featuring fast paced free roaming 1st person movements, hard hitting melee combat, jump scares, 3D heights and claustrophobic environments. 
 It is intended for advanced VR users.

Hockey VR.title: Hockey VR
Hockey VR.desc:
The most realistic and advanced physics-based hockey simulation available! 
Features:
-    Advanced virtual reality puck and stick physics using Unreal Engine
-    Multiple control layouts available, Use both Touch controllers for more realistic puck handling
-    2 Game Types: Shoot from either 4 or 5 different ice locations and Choose between Timed or Shot Count modes
-    3 different environments: Small Town Hockey Arena, Mountain Ice Rink, Forest Night Rink
-    2 Game modes: Shoot against Targets or Face-to-Face against an AI Goalie that watches your every move!
-    Choose from Left or Right-handed sticks with curve
-    Shot Assist mode to help you hone your skills
-    Local Leaderboard; Play against friends for bragging rights
-    Play using your real hockey stick! Upgrade your game and visit https://www.melcher.ca/HockeyVR to purchase Realstick, an optional controller mount, that will connect your controller to your real hockey stick

* Realstick is not required to play

Stageverse.title: Stageverse
Stageverse.desc:
Catch regular unmissable events
Dive into a concert, explore interactive art exhibits, stumble upon a secret speakeasy pop-up, or kick it with friends in a listening room. Discover regular new events from pioneering creators at the apex of culture.

Explore Social Spaces
Meet by the bar, chill together in an exhibition space, or find a secret spot to convene. Wherever you go you can be together, in superreal spaces designed to delight and elevate your vibe.

Collect Virtual Goods
Play, create and express yourself with interactive toys, ownable outfits and collectible items.

Flex Your Style
Be who you wanna be with new avatar outfits dropped weekly.

Party Up & Party Hop
Party up with friends and explore a new world, together. Party hop to switch it up and meet the rest of the community!

Talk Naturally
Do more than just share words on a screen - communicate like you do in real life with spatial voice chat for an all-natural flow.

Demon Rush.title: Demon Rush
Demon Rush.desc:
Demon Rush is a casual ragdoll arena brawler, heavily inspired by other arena combat games on VR.  As banished hero, you are looking to fight your way out of the nether world.

The demon hordes will do anything to keep you imprisoned, so you will have to use all the weapons at your disposal to fight your way out.

Fundamental Force.title: Fundamental Force
Fundamental Force.desc:
Fundamental Force is a game that challenges your spatial thinking over 21 mind-blowing celestial levels. Fight against mysterious creatures in Escher-style environments and deny laws of physics!

Forget what "up" and "down" means, you can change the direction of gravity at any time. Ever wanted to walk on walls or to stroll along the ceiling? We’ve got a solution! Feel the true freedom of movement by picking one of the two gravity changing devices.

TACHYON allows you to teleport onto any flat surface and make it your new floor. Appear out of nowhere to catch the enemy off guard, then disappear in an instant!

With GRAVITON, you can change gravity in place, meaning that you will start falling towards your new "floor". Keep switching the gravity while you are falling, and now you can fly!

Use the gravity, find your way, dodge and pick the right moments to shoot and you will win!

Guitar Strummer.title: Guitar Strummer
Guitar Strummer.desc:
This is not another beat rhythm game. It's more of a guitar simulator. This is an app that lets you play chords on a virtual guitar. It functions similar to an autoharp so you can easily change chords and focus on rhythm and timing. It’s not explicitly an educational tool but it will prove useful for those learning to play guitar. So impress your dog, and annoy your friends as you become a guitar strumming master. 

* Two ways to play chords: Traditional style open chords represented as orbs you can position and select, or go more hands on playing barre chords directly on the fretboard. 

* Dynamic volume control: Intuitively add emphasis by varying your strum expression. There is visual feedback to help you control your playing. 

* Warm and relaxing environment to play in. 

* Save preset chord configurations so you can quickly jump into session after starting

* Tablature that you can place in the world and play along with. 

* Add your own custom chords and tablatur

Interplay Learning Player.title: Interplay Learning Player
Interplay Learning Player.desc:
Interplay Learning is an online, on-demand learning experience platform delivering a growing catalog of courses for the skilled trades industry. Get the training you need to reach that next level in HVAC, Solar, Plumbing, Electrical, and Facility Maintenance. Plus, our catalog keeps growing. You’ll find hundreds of hours of training including video and scenario-based exercises across different equipment types. Hone your skills and be ready for whatever the real world throws at you.

Whether you’re new on the job or a more seasoned pro looking to advance, the Interplay Learning course catalog can help you be the kind of tech you want to be – a great one.

AN ONLINE, ON-DEMAND SKILLED TRADES CATALOG
A growing catalog of field-like training courses focused on helping tradesmen upskill through:
Interactive, 3D based simulations to deliver field-like training
Expert-led video courses drive understanding
Knowledge checks throughout engage users and reinforce lessons

Mixeal Apartment.title: Mixeal Apartment
Mixeal Apartment.desc:
Explore a double story apartment where you have the ability to change the design style to either contemporary, Georgian or Mediterranean with a click of a button.

There are few technologies as immersive as VR, which can digitally put you in the shoes of a person walking around a building/home. While it may seem like an expensive investment, it helps your business in the long run. You don't need to stage or show properties in person as much if you have VR tech ready to go.

This demo showcases the potential of VR for Archviz and Real Estate industry and an example of work we provide at Mixeal.

Office Escape Rooms.title: Office Escape Rooms
Office Escape Rooms.desc:
Office Escape Rooms is a series of rooms and areas to explore and solve in order to complete them. 

There are 4 levels to choose from. Cubicles, Kitchen, Office and Toilet. 

The controls are simple and there are teleport AND smooth locomotion. 

Feel free to rate, comment and give us feedback about what you like, dislike and what could be fun to see in the upcoming levels.

If you encounter any bugs, please report them on our Discord Server.
We will also host give aways and events on discord so join us and be a part of our development.

Discord: https://discord.gg/EGdpMnq22Y

ZomB Run.title: ZomB Run
ZomB Run.desc: In this endless VR Runner, take control of Max Redemption, Zombie Annihilator; final survivor of a crack team of finishers of the undead. In VR use full body motion to steer our protagonist through the English landscape of fiendish foes. Duck run and jump and swing your fists to knock down the ghoulish corpses of the undead. How long will you travel before taking vacancy among the dead?

Chess.title: Chess
Chess.desc:
The most important features of our Chess:
*  It has 10 different levels of difficulty
*  Hints are available to show the most advantageous moves
*  In the case of a mistake, you can use an undo option
*  It has challenges with hundreds of chess puzzles.

Mini-game and Chess Puzzles
When you don't have time or energy for a full game, solve chess puzzles. 
The puzzles are quick tasks of giving your opponent a checkmate, in a limited number of moves.

10 levels of difficulty
Are you a chess master or are you just a beginner? Regardless of that, you will find the level suitable for your chess skills. Choose from 10 different difficulty levels, train tactics and win! 

Undoing movements
Have you made a mistake or want to try another tactic? Nothing simpler. Use the Undo button and win!

Hints
If you need a hint on how to best make your next move, use the Hint.

additional_data.Languages: English, French (France), German, Italian, Norwegian (Nynorsk), Polish, Portuguese (Portugal), Russian, Spanish (Spain), Turkish

Eden Unearthed.title: Eden Unearthed
Eden Unearthed.desc:
Thousands of years into the future... There are no more humans… Or so they thought...

The world is Eden and it is nothing like the one we know — but they do have apples. Lots of them. Use them for fuel and dash through Eden’s scenery in search of a trace of humanity.

Only on Netflix May 27.

additional_data.Publisher: Justin Robotics in partnership with Netflix

KUBIKOS.title: KUBIKOS
KUBIKOS.desc:
KUBIKOS set is a set of low poly, cartoony, building blocks. Game contains Egypt world, Platformer world, dungeon, published to date (100+ objects) and will be added to overtime.

Features:
*Add more than 1000+ object with out losing fps
*Autosave. Your progress never be erased
*You can build dungeon, castle
*Build with out limit.
*One of the best simulation games: begin constructing your dream world
*Enjoy the visual and sound effects.
*Build your own construction

PartyON (Beta Release).title: PartyON (Beta Release)
PartyON (Beta Release).desc:
PartyOn. Turn on your party cell.

Experience virtual parties like never before with live karaoke sessions, sports nights, to virtual chats. All packed inside the PartyOn.

Create virtual rooms, invite friends, or jump into random spaces hosted by party and music aficionados around the world. Never go out when there's PartyOn!

Unique Features:

Awesome Lively Avatars
Customize your own full-body 3D avatar like a true rock star! Comes with a range of facial expressions and gestures.

Immersive and Gorgeous Virtual Rooms
Sing your heart out from nightclubs to outer space. Ignite that party mood in places unimaginable.

Selection of Songs and MV Content
Top popular songs by the hundreds, infused with virtual super-effects and avatar animations to blast your senses to the stars.

Real-Time Social Interactions
Sophisticated audio systems for truly one-of-a-kind party spaces, chat and interact with fun and wonky objects/emojis as you enjoy live singing from around the globe.

Starfighter Arduxim Multiplayer.title: Starfighter Arduxim Multiplayer
Starfighter Arduxim Multiplayer.desc:
Strap into the cockpit of your starfighter and take on enemy starships in this first-person tactical space shooter. Fight as part of a team alongside your friends or in free for all battle. Features multiple game modes, ships and weapon load-outs.

Control your ship using Touch controllers, a gamepad, or hand tracking. Players can use the thumb sticks on a physical controller, or for a more immersive experience grab virtual cockpit controls using the Touch controllers or your bare hands.

The multiplayer of Starfighter Arduxim is free to play and has no micro-transactions or ads.

The full version available separately includes:
* A fourteen mission story based campaign covering your first tour of duty on the front lines
* Practice mode
* Survival/horde challenge mode with online leader board

additional_data.Supported Controllers: Oculus Touch, Gamepad, Touch (as Gamepad), Hand Tracking

VR Blast.title: VR Blast
VR Blast.desc:
⚡Lock N’ Load!⚡
VR Blast is an incredible roguelite arcade shooter that takes you into a unique world where you blast Blocks with awesome weapons!🔫
Dive into the arcade with immersive graphics, gameplay, and music - sitting or standing, VR Blast will blow your mind! Find the perfect match, trigger explosions and eliminate Shielded Blocks to avoid overloading the Board - or it’s game over!🕹️ Unlock upgrades and choose the ultimate powerups to reach the furthest level possible!
🚀The arcade is waiting - let’s blast!🚀

🎶ORIGINAL MUSIC
A plethora of incredible original music composed by amazing artists for the best Block-busting experience!

🎲POWERUPS GALORE
Variety of powerups to unlock and choose from, making each run different and unique!

🔫AWESOME WEAPONS
Incredible unique weapons to unlock and choose from!

🧩WHOLE LOTTA BLOCKS
Tons of special useful and harmful Block types that will make every level feel new!

VR JAPAN THEATER.title: VR JAPAN THEATER
VR JAPAN THEATER.desc:
Journey to Japan and explore the traditional performing arts.

Whether you join a tea ceremony, a traditional Kabuki dance performance, or a night out with Geisha, you aren’t only in the room, you are part of the experience.

This immersive VR experience will give you the chance to learn elaborate and colorful details about the Japanese culture you have always wanted to know about, and answers to questions you didn’t even know you had.

How does one enter a tea room correctly?

What is the white makeup made off that Kabuki performers paint their faces with?

How do Geisha spend their time off?

Go down the rabbit hole and find the answers to these and many more almost forgotten mysteries and closely guarded secrets of ancient Japanese traditions.


Our mission at VR Japan Theater is to preserve old Japanese traditions in danger of being forgotten for the next generations to come, and to make it easily accessible in an immersive format for Japanese and foreigners alike that only the VR

Adapting Futures.title: Adapting Futures
Adapting Futures.desc:
Get ready to experience the nature of work in five different energy sectors with Adapting Futures. Learn about what it’s like to work in petrochemicals, cleantech, high tech, industrial construction, and renewables. Whether you’re an experienced, transitioning, or new worker, see how your skills align with numerous career opportunities. 

These five unique sector modules will not only show users a glimpse of the work but also test their skills with minigames and challenges inspired by the energy industry. Hosted by the charismatic Appo, an expert robot in all things energy, try one or try all five tours as a tool to help determine where each worker’s future prospects lie in the ever evolving energy industry. 

This VR experience will send users a career profile with skills they can take to www.careersinoilandgas.com to see what opportunities the energy industry has in store for their experience level, career interests, and skills.

Admiral Wars.title: Admiral Wars
Admiral Wars.desc:
Admiral Wars breathes new life into the strategy game genre thanks to the capabilities of VR by putting you in the middle of the action. It’s not enough to out-maneuver or out-gun opponents, you must also protect the flagship at all costs. One lapse of concentration is all it takes for an opponent’s guns to line up right outside the starboard window, and if that happens, well… as they say, a good captain always goes down with the ship.

Admiral Wars is a VR game for players looking for a brand-new tactical experience that is easy to pick up but difficult to master. Anyone can learn to sail the waves, but it takes an experienced Admiral to conquer them. The game includes a VS AI mode, and a 1v1 multiplayer mode, with much more to be added in the future!

Players who want to help contribute to the game's development are encouraged to join the studio Discord to chat with the developers: https://discord.gg/5fqtkZVHwR

Don't Upset Bobby.title: Don't Upset Bobby
Don't Upset Bobby.desc:
Halloween Update is live! Enjoy the spooky decorations and the new puzzle! :D

Don't upset Bobby is an atmospheric puzzle horror game, features three puzzles of varying challenge, and a fun yet spooky environment to interact with. Take on the challenge and compare your scores with your friends to see who can complete the puzzle quickest! Do you dare to take on the challenge? Better not keep Bobby waiting...

Don’t Upset Bobby was birthed from a game jam in 2019 and we’ve decided to polish it up and upload a demo of it for you all to play! We hope you have fun with this small and creative experience!

Features:
-Three fun building block style puzzles that increase in difficulty
-Fun and stressful gameplay
-Fully physics based! You can interact with most things!

Volleggball - Demo.title: Volleggball - Demo
Volleggball - Demo.desc:
Play volleyball against eggs in virtual reality !
- Play against 2 Eggs, with a teammate Egg
- Bump, pass, jump and spike, and go anywhere on the court
- Wonderful Egg island ! 
- Careful, ball can be on fire !
- Send the ball in time to your opponents before it explodes 

Come on our discord and tell us what you think about it ! 
https://discord.gg/4QcFZPnfBj

The Wonder of Numbers and Sounds.title: The Wonder of Numbers and Sounds
The Wonder of Numbers and Sounds.desc:
A snowy world with floating numbers and pleasant sounds. In the center of the world, there is an iceberg with a number engraved on it.
Your goal is to turn the number into "1" by hitting the iceberg with the floating numbers. When you turn the numbers into “1”, you’ll find the music that you played with the numbers...

The rules of this world:
Numbers from 2 to 30 float in the space, and numbers over 30 disappear.
If you shoot the iceberg with a divisible number, the iceberg will become smaller and smaller.
If you grab the floating numbers in both hands and bring them closer, the numbers will be added.
If you grab the divisible number of the floating number and shoot it, the number will be divided.
Try to make the number on the iceberg "1" within the time limit of 5 minutes.
Can you find the hidden relationship between numbers and sounds in this world?

The first VR work by WonderLab, an EdTech company that has won numerous awards for its digital content in mathematics and art.

AYAKASHI KITAN.title: AYAKASHI KITAN
AYAKASHI KITAN.desc:
"AYAKASHI KITAN" is a Japanese-style horror action VR.

It is an adventure where the shrine maiden and her disciples become a phantom called "AYAKASHI", confront the mighty evil spirits that prevail in the city, and save the world.

By adding an element of exterminating evil spirits to the Japanese-style haunted house, even those who are not good at haunted houses can enjoy it.

◆◆◆◇◇◇◆◆◆◇◇◇

Collaboration with virtual YouTuber Kimino Miya!

Life-sized Kimino Miya is appearing as one of the shrine maiden's disciples! She will have an adventure with you.

Audio and subtitles are not localized.

Generally Relative Space Golf.title: Generally Relative Space Golf
Generally Relative Space Golf.desc:
Basically golf in space!
Features:
- Cool gravity shenanigans
- 30 gorgeous maps
- A live generated soundtrack

HALLO EINSTEIN.title: HALLO EINSTEIN
HALLO EINSTEIN.desc:
約100年前にアインシュタインが発見した相対性理論 によると、動いているものや重いものの周りでは時空がゆがむ、といいます。
このコンテンツでは時間にフィーチャーして、超高速で移動した場合どのくらい時間がゆがむのか？実際の理論に基づき、その時間差を体感できます。

コンテンツは大きく２つに分かれており、ナビゲートに沿って順番に進んでいけば全内容を体験できるようになっています。

ZONE1 光時計の世界：
時間が遅れるしくみを、解説パートと体験パートで学べます。

ZONE2 宇宙トラベル：
超高速での宇宙旅行へ出かけて、実際にどのくらいの時間が遅れるのかを体験できます。

ふだん考えることのない科学の理論。
知らなくても生きていけるし、自分とは関係ない話。
─でも、本当はみんな知りたいんじゃないでしょうか…？
そして、知るときっとワクワクします！
難しそうだから、と知ろうとしなかったかも知れない世界を、
できるだけ「分かりやすく」「正しく」「魅力的に」伝えます！
自由なVRの世界では、実際の時空の制約を離れ、超高速飛行することも可能です。
VRだからこそできる体験を通して、相対性理論の世界を垣間見てください。

MIFF XR.title: MIFF XR
MIFF XR.desc: With thanks to the immense generosity of Major Supporter Ling Ang, MIFF presents a reimagined XR program on a world-class online platform available globally for free. Enter the mind of the world’s greatest con man in the AR piece Fortune! by Brett Gaylor, Nicolas Bourniquel and Arnaud Colinart. Charlotte Rampling guides you through underwater caves filled with bioluminescent creatures in Abel Kohen’s Biolum. A young boy uncovers family secrets in an intricate, Tim Burton–esque world built by German Heller and Federico Carlini. Witness a Samoan rite of passage in Iopu Auva‘a and Aaron Wilson’s IOPU. And Jumoke Sanwo immerses you in Lagos’ bustling streets and idyllic beaches.

Off The Chains Disc Golf Demo.title: Off The Chains Disc Golf Demo
Off The Chains Disc Golf Demo.desc:
This Demo includes the first two (of seven) courses.

Off The Chains Disc Golf is a lighthearted disc golf simulation. Start your disc golfing adventure learning how to play with the friendly AI-controlled DiscBot!

The best part of disc golf? Playing with your friends of course. Enjoy all playable courses with lobby-based private and public matchmaking (yes, even this demo is multiplayer!).

Both experienced disc golfers and newcomers alike will appreciate our realistic disc physics. Each disc has its own rating using a 4-number rating system that will be familiar to disc golf enthusiasts, but easy for newcomers to learn.

Throughout the course of the game you will earn Chain Link points to unlock new discs. Customize the collection that you want to take with you on your next round.

With multiple beautiful courses with varying biomes you may find yourself stopping to just enjoy the scenery. This simulation is designed to be relaxing and enjoyable, yet competitive!

On Target VR Darts.title: On Target VR Darts
On Target VR Darts.desc:
Now with Multiplayer!

The ultimate realistic darts simulation with 6 game modes and 5 beautiful rooms to play in! Experience the pinpoint accuracy of Quest while challenging your friends online in games of 501 and 301, or create a 4 player room of Freethrow and make up your own games.

Show off your fully customized darts by choosing from dozens of tips, barrels, shafts and flights. Create hundreds of combinations in our Dart Customization menu, including a Glow in the Dark set of each part!

Single Player mode includes Cricket, 501, 301, and Around the world, all vs AI, as well as Freethrow and Speed Darts modes to get you warmed up. Gain achievements, and challenge players from around the world for top spot on one of our many Leaderboards.

Play in one of five beautifully rendered AAA quality scenes including the Black Hat Tavern, the Tournament Arena, Basement Rec Room, and a Brutalist Default Room that also has a Glow in the Dark theme.

See you in the Tavern!

additional_data.Languages: English, Chinese (China), Dutch, French (France), German, Japanese, Korean, Polish, Russian, Spanish (Spain), Ukrainian

SUPER die zweite Sch\u00f6pfung.title: SUPER die zweite Schöpfung
SUPER die zweite Sch\u00f6pfung.desc: "SUPER the second creation" is a VR experience supplementary to the exhibition under the same name at the Museum of Communication in Bern, where biotechnology, artificial intelligence and digitalization meet. Here you can experience these topics in VR up close. You can gene manipulate an animal, watch a movie inside a book, and look up at talking pictures.If you like to chat or have questions, the artificial intelligence is looking forward to talking to you.

Secret of Harrow Manor.title: Secret of Harrow Manor
Secret of Harrow Manor.desc:
Inspired by classic survival horror gameplay, you find yourself in an abandoned mansion infested with zombies. To survive and progress, you'll need to search the area for weapons, healing items, and keys.

Features:
-4 interconnected levels filled with monsters and items
-A co-op multiplayer mode with random enemy and item spawn locations
-A carefully crafted inventory system, watch your ammo so you don't get caught by surprise!

Tranzient Lite.title: Tranzient Lite
Tranzient Lite.desc:
Make beats in VR - This is not a rhythm game!

Immerse yourself in live looping and music production in VR.

- Synced looping with content library, auto time-stretched and pitch-shifted to fit the song.
- Record vocals including mo-cap and replay of your avatar.
- Use your custom Ready Player Me avatar.
- Set of drum kits/one-shots.
- Use Decks to create a seamless mix.
- Full set of audio FX applied per clip or per scene (reverbs, chorus etc). 
- Loop record automation of audio FX parameters and synth parameters.
- Assignable 3D control of FX and synth parameters.
- Loop videos synced to the beat.
- Step sequencer - trigger any item in the world and loop record instruments/drumkits. Edit steps, swing quantize.
- Built in Analog Synth sim and Wavetable synth with >250 Sounds
- Spatial Mixing - create a binaural mix based on clip positions.
- In game camera and screen/mirror.

Unlimited Bowling.title: Unlimited Bowling
Unlimited Bowling.desc:
Feel the joy and excitement of real bowling!

•Real world dynamic ball hook motions and pin actions make you feel the same satisfaction of hitting a perfect strike as playing bowling in real life!

•In total of 9 challenging oil patterns to bowl on! Bowl like a pro, adapt your game and conquer on any lane conditions!

•Online Free Play mode let's you bowl with your friends and others all around the world the way you want it. You can hold a casual bowling party or you can join together for a thrilling stepladder competition!

•Engage in Daily Events to clinch the titles and challenge yourself for the best scores!

•Challenging Versus AI mode to test your bowling skills to the limit!

•Score 300 points or more easily in an action-packed 100-pin game! But scoring a perfect 3000 points game won't be as easy!

VekWars.title: VekWars
VekWars.desc:
Sometime in the mid-1980s development began on a technology that, had it gone to market, would have changed video gaming as we know it.  A complete virtual-reality system meant for arcades, utilizing twin head-mounted vector monitors of the type used in many classic games of the time.

Sadly, funding for the project dried up before it reached completion, and the first game for the system - VekWars - never saw the light of day, continuing to exist only in rumor and a handful of blurry photographs from the period.

But now a team of digital archaeologists based in Austin, Texas have successfully extracted the source code for this game from a dusty 8-inch floppy disk provided by an anonymous benefactor.  We are pleased to present VekWars - fully updated to support modern virtual-reality systems (or non-VR monitors) and playable for the first time in over 35 years!

Wisdom.title: Wisdom
Wisdom.desc: Wisdom is a breakthrough in science education that explains the effects of psychedelics on the brain within the predictive coding neuroscience framework. In Wisdom you can hold the psilocybin molecule and fit it into the receptor and you can even experience and understand how synesthesia happens. Don’t forget to dance while you're learning!

Wolf and Pigs.title: Wolf and Pigs
Wolf and Pigs.desc:
Once upon a time, the notorious Pig Brothers gang invaded the New World, blasting and disfiguring nature to build their secret base.

Portrayed as evil by the media – who have been bought and paid by the Pig Brothers – the Wolf is the last defense between Nature and the brothers’ greed.

With no one to stop them, the Pig Brothers are laying waste to everything in their path, raking in the cash. Everyone thinks that Wolf is dead, but there’s a sliver of hope. It turns out that Wolf has upgraded his body with high-end prosthetic arms loaded with all sorts of weaponry, including shotguns and bombs!

Nature has its defender at last. Will the Pig Brothers pay the ultimate price?

Key Features:
Experience an age-old fairy tale from a totally different perspective!
Move freely across the world through an innovative grappling mechanic.
Upgrade your character to fight the final boss.
Explore the world along with thousands of interactive objects.
Solve challenging puzzles and infiltrators!

HitMotion:Reloaded Demo.title: HitMotion:Reloaded Demo
HitMotion:Reloaded Demo.desc:
HitMotion: Reloaded is a new way of doing fitness in VR. Step inside virtual reality, and stay fit while having fun!

HitMotion is about moving inside a virtual ring, punching targets fast and dodging the attacks of bars coming towards you. There is no front rail like in many other similar games, but a ring where you fight the enemies appearing all around you. The training is pretty intense, and in a few minutes, you are going to punch many targets and sweat a lot. And if a level is too easy for you, don't worry: you can customize the force required to hit the targets and also the duration of the level to best suit your training needs.

The game is currently in alpha, and in this free demo, you can play 2 training levels + 8 static workout levels. You can play in AR or VR and even customize your music. We plan to introduce leaderboards, daily challenges, dynamic levels, and much more in a future full release of HitMotion if we get enough funding.

Are you ready for the fitness battle?

Pop's.title: Pop's
Pop's.desc:
Pop's is the new funniest VR arcade game available!

Find the matching object on your desk, grab it with your gun and shoot the toy before it falls. But be careful, enemies will try to prevent you.

Chain multiple combos, shots and speed accuracy to reach the high score.

Potato Party: Hash It Out.title: Potato Party: Hash It Out
Potato Party: Hash It Out.desc:
Welcome, friends, to POTATOPIA — where you can finally paint your mashterpiece.

In this quick-draw multiplayer game, it's YOU (the VR potato) against YOUR FRIENDS (iOS and Android potatoes), as they race to be the first to guess what you're drawing in three dimensions.

Up to 8 players can join using the free mobile app on iOS and Android. Watch the VR potato draw on your device or on a stream, input custom prompts, make your guesses, and use special powers to foil your fellow future french fries!

As the VR potato, choose your medium — 3D shapes, air-painting, or canvas drawing — to dazzle your fellow spuds with your artistic prowess.

Draw your worst, guess your best — just don't eat the artist. Please.

Treasure Island.title: Treasure Island
Treasure Island.desc:
Command your ship and set sail!

Treasure Island provides an immersive pirate experience for those willing to take on the challenge.

Sail your ship, fight the Kraken, or just relax in the Tavern. This is an open experience where you choose your own destiny!

This release is currently in Pre Alpha. Content is being added at regular intervals. For more details visit http://quickdevelopment.net/treasureisland/

VRGolfRangebeta.title: VRGolfRangebeta
VRGolfRangebeta.desc:
It is a application that allows you to experience the driving range of golf at home. You can check your swing on VR by holding the controller instead of the golf club and swinging. You can also set the controller on a golf club for practice and swing. In that case, use the position adjustment function of the controller.

Currently installed functions

1. Tutorial
2. Range mode
・Swing data display
・Swing record
・Swing playback
・Setting change
3. Game mode
・Balloon split
・Building target
・Driving contest
・Closest to the pin
・play 1 Hole
4. Lesson mode
・Slice correction 01
・Slice correction 02
・Hand floats
5. Round Play Mode
・GDO Chigasaki Golf Links
6. Optional
・Vibration setting
・Club position adjustment
・Ball＆Ballistic color change
7.Language change
・English
・Japanese

Please note that everything is under development.

Brick Attack.title: Brick Attack
Brick Attack.desc: The modern reimagination of the retro breakout game, Brick Attack has intuitive controls to make it easy for anyone to pick up. However, every time you hit a brick, it flies out of the frame straight at your head! Make sure to dodge the brick before it hits you, but wait - don't lose your concentration on the ball!

Mediamorfosis 2021.title: Mediamorfosis 2021
Mediamorfosis 2021.desc: Official selection of 360 video experiences at Mediamorfosis 2021. Only avaiable from 26 to 31 july.

MotoX.title: MotoX
MotoX.desc:
MotoX is an arcade-style motocross/motorcycle racing game where players are immersed in the speed, danger, and adrenaline of a virtual Motocross experience. Explore unique worlds by riding through different levels to beat the clock!

KEY FEATURES:
- Explore unique environments
- High-speed racing
- Clear Death-defying stunts
- Dodge Obstacles
- Unique music themed for each location
- Collect coins to unlock new Bikes
- Progress through new and exciting worlds
- Comfort controls

Nebula Nemesis.title: Nebula Nemesis
Nebula Nemesis.desc:
When the universe is in danger, we send our greatest fighters. But they failed, so now all we have is you. So shuttle up and brace yourself for a laser shooting, space flying, alien blasting experience as you fight your way through the nebula. Unleash strategic powerups, encounter a variety of enemies, travel through infinite levels and get ready to get nostalgic in this 8-bit galactical video game.

This game is also customisable, you can import your own nemesis and fight against them in space. Add your own memes or photos and face them head on this time with a ship and laser cannons. What could go wrong.

Puzzling Paths.title: Puzzling Paths
Puzzling Paths.desc: Build and fix paths across 20 different levels. This game will make you think and push your brain. This is a great brain workout. Can you fix all 20 paths?

SUP Island.title: SUP Island
SUP Island.desc:
Your very own island adventure awaits. Paddle, get fit, discover new islands and hidden treasure, or just relax and hang out with friends (online multiplayer) in your exclusive private resort.

On 'SUP Island' (SUP = Stand Up Paddleboard) you stand on a large surfboard and use a paddle to move yourself over the water.  It's the perfect sport for virtual reality as you and your board move naturally through the world, just like in real-life.

Relaxation or fitness? You choose. Paddle around and explore your surroundings, and before you know it you'll have achieved your fitness goals and be finding treasure and earning rewards like new boards, paddles and locations. Fitness tracking is built-in so you can see your real-time stats like time paddled, distance, and estimated calories burnt.

Host your friends on your own private island: it's invite only, so your experience is fun, safe and filled only with people you know.

What are you waiting for? Visit SUP Island today!

Squadron One.title: Squadron One
Squadron One.desc:
Squadron One is the multiplayer arcade dogfighting space combat experience built for Quest.

Meet up at the round table and launch into space.

Fly through power up gates to upgrade your guns, missiles, shields and health.

Defeat everyone else to take the crown and win the round.

Balloon Gunner.title: Balloon Gunner
Balloon Gunner.desc:
The islands of your Empire have been invaded, and only you and your war balloon can save them!!

Fly your war balloon through an array of different missions and enemies. Use cannons, missiles and bombs to blast and pop your way to victory!

Features:
* Simple, fun, addictive gameplay - just point and shoot!
* 40 varied and challenging levels.
* A wide range of enemy/target types, including 10 aerial adversaries.
* Play seated, standing, or however you like.
* Tiny file size!

BEFORE YOU PLAY:
* Note that you steer using the Oculus controller (the right by default), not by turning your head.
* If you're left-handed, you can switch to the left controller in Options.

Fitris VR.title: Fitris VR
Fitris VR.desc:
FITRIS VR is an all new way to workout you body as well as your mind! 
Control the falling blocks with fitness moves and shoot for your highscore - whilst getting a cardio bodyweight workout!

Punches - left/right
Squats - rotation
Jumping Jacks -  quick drop

GET CREATIVE - Get creative stacking blocks in a small game field. 
MIND & BODY - Test out and train your mind-body connection. 
QUICK REACTION - Improve your quick decision making in Time-Attack mode! 
CALORIE BURN - Hit your target calorie burn by checking the score breakdown after the game!

If you are looking to break a sweat in VR, FITRIS VR is here for you!
All new Game-fields, Global Rankings, Control Variations, Battle modes coming soon.

*FITRIS VR is still an experimental experience. Any comments, feedback, suggestions are welcomed and encouraged!
Thank you for your purchase, abd we are looking forward to hearing how you enjoy FITRIS VR!

High Voltage Electrical Substation Train.title: High Voltage Electrical Substation Training

Stack Defense.title: Stack Defense
Stack Defense.desc:
Play this VR game with friends and others via crossplay.

Cubes are spawning to your right, grab them and place them on your Table.
Protect your stack from getting shot down by other players.
While you can shoot their stack.

Win the game by having the biggest stack at the end of the round.
Roundtime can be set between choosen by the creator of the room.

Create you own room and coose your prefered gametype and playercount (2-4).

You can also customize your avatar.

Search for games or host your own.
Full Crossplay support! Play on PCVR against Quest 1/2 Players.

Happy Stacking!


** Upcoming: Experience und Levelsystem
** Soon: Use the ingame voicechat for communication.

Theme Park Ride: Into the Metaverse (DEM.title: Theme Park Ride: Into the Metaverse (DEMO)
Theme Park Ride: Into the Metaverse (DEM.desc:
Into the Metaverse is a detailed, slow moving theme park style ride about humanity's quest for ever deeper immersion, showing scenes from the past, present and future. 32 scenes total of which 8 are available in this 10 minute polished and very immersive "DEMO". If you love dark rides found at the leading theme parks around the world, then you will be pleasantly surprised how much of that experience can be had now in Virtual Reality. It really does feel like you are on a high end ride. The Future of virtual theme park rides is looking very bright...what do you think?

Buy us a coffee over on Ko-Fi and help support the future of Dark Rides: https://ko-fi.com/metaverseadventures 

Chat with other Dark Ride Enthusiast on our Discord Server: 
https://discord.gg/qSUxYbuEkq

Ride Stats for Geeks: 
https://www.metaverse-adventures.com/into-the-metaverse/ride-stats-for-geek

ZenVR.title: ZenVR
ZenVR.desc:
*For a Limited Time, ZenVR is available 20% off; Lessons 7-8 will arrive as free updates by Spring 2022* 

All of us want to better control our emotions and manage stress. ZenVR is the meditation learning system you’ve been looking for! With an instructor-led classroom experience, ZenVR will teach you real meditation beyond relaxation and guide you to take your skills off the cushion and into your everyday life. The growing curriculum of classes is built with real meditation teachers and proven in research conducted at Georgia Tech to teach you skills to improve your everyday mental wellbeing. 

Easily fit meditation into your weekly routine. Lessons 1 - 6 (each a half hour-long class) are available now. You’ll also receive access to Practice mode where you can build personalized sessions to conveniently review techniques and concepts and/or to simply meditate guided or solo. We'll be releasing more lessons and features as we continue expanding!

Welcome aboard and happy meditating!

Tennis League VR - Early access demo.title: Tennis League VR - Early access demo
Tennis League VR - Early access demo.desc:
Tennis League VR is a realistic tennis simulator for Oculus Quest and Quest 2 where you can casually play alone or with other people online, and also properly learn tennis techniques and train them.

This Early Access alpha features a small slice of the final game, coming on Oculus Quest and Oculus Quest 2 this Fall!

Features:
- Spins: the game understands shots and movements to reproduce also top spins, slices, and lobs.
- Training mode: learn basic techniques and practice with timed exercises and targeted areas of the court
- Custom mode: train using the ball cannon at different speeds, or challenge the CPU in an exhibition
- Multiplayer mode: play a rally with an online friend 
- Different settings and court surfaces (urban and synthetic currently available)

Feel like a real tennis champion!

VR Sketch.title: VR Sketch
VR Sketch.desc:
VR Sketch is a tool for editing and visualizing architectural models from SketchUp in virtual reality. See https://vrsketch.eu/documentation.html for details

The present version does not aim for photo realism and instead focuses on having a cartoonish but well performing mode that lets you edit SketchUp files 100s of megabytes in size.

You can also share your models with others and view them together!

For more information on how to use it, please see https://vrsketch.eu

Imrsivo Player.title: Imrsivo Player
Imrsivo Player.desc: Imrsivo player permets d'explorer/visionner les différentes expériences VR réalisé par la communauté.

DoVille.title: DoVille
DoVille.desc:
DoVille is in Early Access.

DoVille Episode 1: Juniper Beach, is here.
Designed by a team that includes older, nostalgic adults, DoVille is your VR vacation dream come true.

Included in the first download is Juniper Beach, a low poly BEACH and sleuthing adventure. Thrill to easy-to-use activities; catch the mysterious art thief and save the beach, or simply stretch out for an extended stay in the warm, warm sun. Take a dip, water ski, or ride the hot-air balloon. 

More episodes are on the way!
For more information (and even a report on the positive brain effects, visit doville dot fun).

IVF Sim Pro.title: IVF Sim Pro
IVF Sim Pro.desc:
IVF SIM PRO is the world’s first interactive IVF training in Virtual Reality.
Put on your Oculus Quest headset, grab the 2 handheld controllers, and find yourself in a virtual, 3D, IVF laboratory settings. Here you can take a look around and can get acquainted with the parts and functionality of the specific microscope. After that, choose between a guided and non-guided training options and perform a full-fledged ICSI and biopsy procedure. 
In the guided training option, you have to follow along instructions to complete certain tasks. When you get more confident, you can complete the tasks again and again without instructions. 
The functions of the micromanipulators of the microscope are fully adapted to the 2 handheld controllers of the VR headset, thus providing a really immersive and hyper realistic experience. 
Highly advised to all medical students working in this field - or even for enthusiastic amateurs.

SynergyXR.title: SynergyXR
SynergyXR.desc:
SynergyXR gives users a DIY XR toolbox that lets them easily create their own VR meeting space and add a wide range of interactive content like 3D models, pdf documents, images, and even videos.  

Users can interact with the content manager to drop content anywhere in the space. Users can also resize, place and interact with content, including playing videos and writing on virtual whiteboards. Even better, you can step inside 3D models to get a fully immersive experience.  

SynergyXR is free to download and try out the tutorial. For subscription options, please contact: https://www.synergyxr.com/speakwithsales

ARK-ADE Demo.title: ARK-ADE Demo
ARK-ADE Demo.desc:
Have you ever dreamt about being inside an old Arcade Machine?

Inspired by the major 80’s Pop Culture references, ARK-ADE harmonizes the old fast-paced Run ‘n’ Gun games with the new era of VR technology, diving you into an iconic setting to strafe enemies, protect ARK and defeat ADE.

FEATURES
Choose between Free Locomotion and Teleport Movement to enjoy the game without the risk of motion sickness
Protect ARK from ADE’s army
Morphing weapon
Enjoy destructible environment and covers
Collect all the secrets and defeat ADE for good
Immerse into the nostalgic 80’s Low-poly Sci-Fi setting
Shoot to the beat of our original soundtrack

Exit Condition One.title: Exit Condition One
Exit Condition One.desc:
This is a classic escape room game built exclusively for VR using roomscale to give you the experience of really being there. Walking is fully supported. Your hands and all objects act just like in the real world, no "ghost objects." The puzzles are all tightly interwoven into the room and feel more like problems that need to be solved rather than puzzles that need to be figured out. There's about an hour of playtime.

Cool Features
- Roomscale walking, locomotion, teleporting, stationary, crouch, stand
- In-game visualization of the guardian to align physical and virtual spaces
- Drone with unique 3D controller
- Full use of physics
- VR within VR
- Fireworks display for finishing

There is a discord here: https://discord.gg/2NfBumhKQD .

AlpineAcceleration.title: AlpineAcceleration
AlpineAcceleration.desc:
This game is
The goal of the game is to avoid falling off the stage and hitting obstacles.
Use jumping to reach the goal of the course.

The key is to adjust the timing and speed of your jumps!

Game Controls
Oculus Touch X button Hold
(When you're going downhill / Speed Up)
(On the way up the hill / Reduced deceleration)

Oculus Touch A button (Jump)

Matching Pairs VR.title: Matching Pairs VR
Matching Pairs VR.desc: Matching pairs reimagined for VR. Explore 2 fun filled levels and go from 5 to 40 pairs! Challenge yourself to beat your fastest times. Supports both controllers and hand tracking as input methods.

Connec2.title: Connec2
Connec2.desc:
The virtual collaboration platform Connec2 allows you to have a lifelike social experience in which physical distances disappear. High quality voice, precise movements and a low latency communication provide an endless productive experience.

Connec2 offers an accessible ‘XR as a service’ solution. Instead of developing expensive XR software from scratch, Connec2 allows teams to effortlessly meet, publish and share content in order to start implementing XR today!

Connec2 offers both TEMPORARY and DEDICATED Workspaces to meet in. Both TEMPORARY and DEDICATED Workspaces offer all features Connec2 has to offer. 

You can easily create a TEMPORARY Workspace within Connec2. Other people can join using its Workspace Code. Within a TEMPORARY Workspace, you can host meetings with up to 5 people with a session time limit of 30 minutes per session.

DEDICATED Workspaces have unlimited session time and more users.
Visit www.connec2.nl for more information about DEDICATED Workspaces.

Cosmos Crash.title: Cosmos Crash
Cosmos Crash.desc:
Cosmos Crash – The first person shooting & puzzle VR game of Viriver Studio is now online.

In this game, you’ll be a space pilot with your ship trapped by orbits in the depths of the vast universe. By firing high-tech marbles, you need to make matches of three or more same-colored marble in the orbit before it reaches your ship. The game contains 10 different orbits waiting for you, think fast and aim smart to solve these problems!

Spatial 3D orbit
The 3D spatial orbits are the biggest highlight of Cosmos Crash. Surrounded by various shapes of orbits (crown, pipe, balance, gear, etc)， the game brings you immersive experience as if you are just there in the universe, giving full play to the superiority of virtual reality.

Strategy
Each of the 10 orbits has different strategies to clear all the marbles. Special orbit like accelerating orbit (speeding up the pass-by marbles) and balance shaped orbit (requires clarity of both side orbit) appears as the game progressed.

Digging Simulator 2020 - BETA.title: Digging Simulator 2020 - BETA
Digging Simulator 2020 - BETA.desc:
2021 NOTE : Have had some bugs flagged which explains the bad reviews, this was a project upgrade and port to App Lab so I could work on new stuff - please be patient while I resolve :)

Have you ever wished that wherever you were you could just dig a hole? Have you ever lost a rental deposit for digging too many holes in the backyard? What about ruining a camping trip because someone sprained their ankle after standing in a hole you dug in the middle of the night.

If so, Digging Simulator is for you!

Digging Simulator lets you dig infinite holes, using your skill, power and technique to cleave and shape the earth. As you progress you gain new tools, and learn new ways to make your mark on the benighted ground.

 - Virtual Reality digging game - (currently available on quest)
 - Strike terrain to dig and explore
 - Collect treasure and unlock the depths below
 - Discover new tools to make new holes, or power up old ones
 - VR trackers mean velocity and direction create your hole

Faraday's Magnets.title: Faraday's Magnets
Faraday's Magnets.desc:
This is a paid preview version to fund our further development. Please support us to visualize human knowledge in Virtual Reality. Thank you so much!

--

Transport yourself back in time to 1855 into the lecture hall of Michael Faraday, the experimental physicist who made vital discoveries around the understanding of electromagnetism. Joined by Scottish mathematical physicist James Clerk Maxwell, you will be able to visualize and interact with the magnetic forces in action like never before.

Put on the "Dyson Hat" to see the invisible forces - the math structure superimposed onto the reality. We were inspired by Prof. Freeman Dyson's essays to design this hat for visualizing the two-layer structure of the world - the reality that satisfied math equations and the reality that we can touch.

Pick up two bar magnets and feel the magnetic field. Use a bar magnet to generate current from the helix coils. Do you know why the direction of current changes?

Noun Town (Beta version).title: Noun Town (Beta version)
Noun Town (Beta version).desc:
The fastest and most fun way to learn a new language has arrived.

Immerse yourself in a foreign world and learn one of 8+ languages. Speak, read, and listen in a mysterious town that comes to life as you learn.

> Choose Japanese, Spanish, French, Italian, German, Chinese, and more
> Learn 500+ nouns, 200+ verbs, and 50+ useful phrases
> Use mini-games to practice your learning and have fun
> Personalised learning helps you learn at just the right level and pace

Developed using the latest memory science research, Noun Town takes language learning to the next level by immersing you in a new environment. With tools like voice recognition, spaced repetition, and audio from fluent speakers, you’ll grow your skills and save your villager friends.

RC Airplane Challenge.title: RC Airplane Challenge
RC Airplane Challenge.desc:
Fly model airplanes in RC Airplane Challenge in this arcade styled flight sim. Fly by yourself offline or with up to 32 other players in online gameplay. In addition to free flight, single player features the following 4 game modes:
Bomb Drop - Destroy as many targets as you can in this timed mode.
Rings - Try to fly through as many rings as you can with each new ring becoming increasingly harder to hit.
Balloon Pop - Pop as many balloons as you can in this timed mode.
Time Trial - Complete the course as quick as you can in this race against time.

Robotics in VR (DEMO).title: Robotics in VR (DEMO)
Robotics in VR (DEMO).desc:
The first step is to run the program on a PC with the Windows operating
the system, select the first lesson (only one lesson is available in the free
version)
And then connect from a virtual reality headset
I attached the manual
TeacherBuild - https://www.microsoft.com/store/apps/9N2G5GVRPPN6
Our team developed a gamified solution and curriculum for classroom and individual remote teaching the robotics in VR for students. We are tackling the problems of early professional orientation and equal access to education. Schools with underserved or underrepresented students could benefit from our scaled and cost-effective solution.

VRParty.title: VRParty
VRParty.desc: Play mini-games together with others or alone!

WorkNoMore.title: WorkNoMore
WorkNoMore.desc: In our game, you can shoot office items as much as you want to vent your pressure in work. This is an early version of the project, and more themes and gameplay will be added in the future. If you like this project, please leave your valuable suggestions in the comment section below.

Zephyrus Demo.title: Zephyrus Demo
Zephyrus Demo.desc:
Welcome to Zephyrus, a world on the verge of the logical and the magical, full of wizards, witches, mystical and cursed beings. Become a mage, or a witch wield your power and your intelligence to escape from the 'The Dark River Ruins' map. Play alone or call your friends to uncover the secrets of the world, solve puzzles, and avoid the creatures on the way.

The full version of 'Zephyrus Prelude' contains even more stuff:
- Brand new 'Abandoned Shrine' map
- Magic Teleport Cube
- New avatars, curses, chests, collectable crystals, and items
- New Area Magics
- Dynamic lights, shadows
- Improved the existing 'The Dark River Ruins' map
- Improved multiplayer experience
- Generic bug fixing
- Feature improvement
- In-game menu

Zephyrus Prelude is in Early Access now, come and shape the game with us…
https://www.oculus.com/experiences/quest/4769000029788189/?utm_channel=applab_demo

additional_data.Languages: English, Chinese (China), French (France), German, Hungarian, Italian, Japanese, Polish, Portuguese (Brazil), Russian, Spanish (Spain), Swedish

\u30b3\u30df\u306a\u3073VR\uff08COMINAVI.title: コミなびVR（COMINAVI VR）
\u30b3\u30df\u306a\u3073VR\uff08COMINAVI.desc:
The World's First Manga Platform for Enjoying Japanese Manga Comics in VR

Features.
The position and size of the manga can be changed freely.
You can switch between various backgrounds in the reading space.
You can add new manga in the VR space.
You can add new comics in the VR space - Can be used offline (need to download comics in advance)

Cominavi account is required. For details, please check (https://mechacomi.jp/).

\u91cd\u6a5f\u3067Go VR.title: 重機でGo VR
\u91cd\u6a5f\u3067Go VR.desc:
実機に合わせたレバーパターンで、プロの方や、プロを目指す方も安心。
JIS方式かコマツ方式を選べるので、実際に運転するタイプや慣れている方に合わせて選べます。

◆こんなあなたにオススメです
・ショベルカーの操作に慣れていない方の練習に
・実機を動かす前のシミュレーションに
・技能実習生への教育訓練に
・実技試験の前に練習しておきたいときに
・本当は実機に触れたい重機オタクの方に

◆訓練内容
　　（１）ショベルカー基本操作１　土をダンプへ積み込み、岩を目的地まで運ぶ
　　（２）ショベルカー基本操作４　ドラム缶をポールの間を通してゴールまで移動する
　　
◆レバーパターン
　JIS方式とコマツ方式のどちらか選択可

◆言語
・日本語（Japanese）と英語（English)のどちらか選択可

◆スピード設定
以下のスピードを設定できます
・旋回、アーム、ブーム、バケット開閉
・前進、後進
・グラップル旋回、開閉（有料版のみ）

有料版では基本操作訓練、事故事例体験、危険予知訓練が可能。

additional_data.Developer: トライアロー株式会社
additional_data.Publisher: トライアロー株式会社

\u91cd\u6a5f\u3067Go VR+.title: 重機でGo VR+
\u91cd\u6a5f\u3067Go VR+.desc:
実機に合わせたレバーパターンで、プロの方や、プロを目指す方も安心。
JIS方式かコマツ方式を選べるので、実際に運転するタイプや慣れている方に合わせて選べます。

◆こんなあなたにオススメです
・ショベルカーの操作に慣れていない方の練習に
・実機を動かす前のシミュレーションに
・技能実習生への教育訓練に
・実技試験の前に練習しておきたいときに
・本当は実機に触れたい重機オタクの方に

◆訓練内容
操作訓練8種
　　（１）ショベルカー基本操作１　土をダンプへ積み込み、岩を目的地まで運ぶ
　　（２）ショベルカー基本操作２　切土を下からならす
　　（３）ショベルカー基本操作３　切土を上からならす
　　（４）ショベルカー基本操作４　ドラム缶をポールの間を通してゴールまで移動する
　　（５）グラップル操作訓練１　　丸太をトラックへ積み込む　
　　（６）グラップル操作訓練２　　鉄パイプをトラックへ積み込む
　　（７）グラップル操作訓練３　　大木をトラックへ積み込む

　事故事例体験9種
　　（１）電線切断事故　　　アームが電線に接触したことによる接触事故
　　（２）人身接触事故１　　視界不良の中、作業したことによる接触事故
　　（３）転落事故　　　　　旋回の方向を間違えたことによる転落事故
　　（４）人身接触事故２　　安全確認ミスによる人身事故
　　（５）横転事故　　　　　安全確認ミスによる横転事故
　　（６）人身接触事故３　　安全確認ミスによる人身事故
　　（７）人身接触事故４　　安全確認ミスによる人身事故
　　（８）人身接触事故５　　安全確認ミスによる人身事故
　　（９）人身接触事故６　　安全確認ミスによる人身事故

　危険予知訓練3種（作業者がいる中での作業）
　　（１）ショベルカーをトラックから降ろす
　　（２）作業員を確認しながらダンプに土を積み込む
　　（３）街中での道路工事

◆レバーパターン
・JIS方式とコマツ方式のどちらか選択可
　レバー配置を自由にカスタマイズが可能


◆言語
・日本語（Japanese）と英語（English)のどちらか選択可

◆スピード設定
以下のスピードを設定できます
・旋回
・アーム、ブーム
・バケット開閉
・前進、後進
・グラップル開閉
・グラップル旋回

additional_data.Developer: トライアロー株式会社
additional_data.Publisher: トライアロー株式会社

The Puny Climber.title: The Puny Climber
The Puny Climber.desc:
Early Access

In this puzzle plaforming game you play as an unhatched eye. You have sticky hands that automatically attach to any surface so you can climb but also walk on your hands as if they were feet. That makes you like half your usual size, turning you into an agile little climber.

Your every move will be watched by observing full fledged eyes, which are looking for bricks to build their tower with. They need to look at a certain number of same color bricks before they can collect them. You can help them collect or impede their efforts. Working with the eyes will reward you with high scores but you also need to reach coins which are the key to completing the levels.

The outside world is a dangerous place. Watch out for rats and other enemies that guard collectible power ups and also come out swarming at night.

Feel the action. When you dodge, you dodge. When you run, you run. It's the immersion of actual movement.

Fencer - Demo.title: Fencer - Demo
Fencer - Demo.desc:
This is a DEMO including one exercise

VR Fencing Trainer Combines a Virtual or Real Eppie Rapier and Saber with Virtual Exercises

A game complex of exercises aimed at reaction and attention. The athlete learns and practice to attack and defend with sets of challenges.

Muscle memory and motor skills are formed through practice and repetition of exercises in VR with a real or virtual blade

King Of Hell - Prototype Version.title: King Of Hell - Prototype Version
King Of Hell - Prototype Version.desc:
This is a prototype game, this price is a symbolic value to help developers upgrade the game, add more levels, and help us complete this game. Thanks for believing us! (We recommend using hand tracking)

King of Hell is a first-person tower defense game. In this game, you can help your towers to protect your door to block enemies invade your captured floor and HQ where you have your plans to dominate the hell.

How many floors you dominate, more close you going to be a King Of Hell

You need to use hand movements to cast magic, your abilities and memory define casting speed and your success. This is not easy! But I believe in your abilities!

TitanZero.title: TitanZero
TitanZero.desc:
Titan Zero is a full battle mech multiplayer game that gives you the experience of being a mech pilot while playing against other mechs. Compete against 5v5 and 6v6, every mech has a vital role to play. 

Mechs come in different sizes ranging from small, medium, large which carry unique weapon combinations. Choose from Flankers, Outriders, Assault, Direct Support to Indirect Support - which carries long-range weapons. Aesthetic and ability upgrades are also available to showcase your chosen mech.

Arizona Ranger.title: Arizona Ranger
Arizona Ranger.desc: Get ready to step into the wild wild west in this gunslinging adventure. Arizona Ranger is a short action packed VR experience heavily inspired by the song Big Iron from artist, Marty Robbins. Take on the role of an Arizona Ranger hunting down an outlaw by the name of Texas Red. Prove yourself to the locals by shooting targets in timed challenges and best the rampant outlaws in the town of Agua Fria by defeating them in duels.

Flux Ball.title: Flux Ball
Flux Ball.desc: Why stop with pivots and squats?  Flux Ball pressures the player to lie flat and tumble out of sticky situations, constantly moving between standing, crouching and prone positions.  Engage in a close quarters shoot out using your Guard Cage for protection from enemy fire.  When struck, your cage will be lowered into a liquid container, drowning those who fall too far down.  Flux Ball is best played on fitness mats and/or a rug.  Come test your Flux Ball skills...

High School Anatomy for Quest.title: High School Anatomy for Quest
High School Anatomy for Quest.desc:
----THIS PRODUCT IS FOR ENDUSER ONLY (under EULA licence) FOR INSTITUTIONAL ACCESS FEEL FREE TO CONTACT US: info@medicinevirtual.com -----
 

Do you know how many bones are in the human body? Get to know the human anatomy in an enjoyable way thanks to the High School Anatomy. 
The High School Anatomy is an educational application in VR that offers unique virtual and educational experience thanks to all advantages of virtual reality in order to make learning more entertaining and effective. 
Explore your body to the smallest details with precisely modelled anatomical structures. Amazing graphics and intuitive control allows you to explore the human anatomy from a whole new perspective. A unique function – AntMode ®– makes you 40 times smaller in order to explore the inner body structures in a greater detail. The High School Anatomy contains all anatomy systems and a number of amazing functions.

NAKA.title: NAKA
NAKA.desc:
everis NAKA provides customers with eXtended Reality (XR) spaces for configuring immersive experiences to cover a wide variety of use cases:

Training spaces
Configurable focus-intensive trainings performed in safe, controlled 3d realistic models and environments 

Showroom and retail spaces
Engaging and memorable experiences for retail and customer support processes

Processes and business support spaces
Business-specific connected process for employees, associates and other collaborators (e.g. onboarding, support)

Meetings and collaborative spaces
Multi-user, VoIP-enabled environment for sharing documents, videos, tasks and much more.

NaN Industry.title: NaN Industry
NaN Industry.desc:
N⸱a⸱N Industry is a VR puzzle game where you build a "factory" in 3D by placing action blocks in space. Arrange them so that they will push, weld, destroy other blocks, fire lasers, and so on. The goal is to guide input blocks to output locations, possibly modifying, splitting or combining them along the way into larger structures.

* 30+ built-in puzzles
* 6 space locations, no gravity—blocks float
* increasing puzzle difficulty from easy to seriously hard
* puzzle editor included
* in-game workshop of published puzzles made by others

This game puts emphasis on the freedom of placement one gets from VR: there is no gravity; blocks can be moved and rotated along any axis and float along under their own inertia.

Pickup Basketball VR.title: Pickup Basketball VR
Pickup Basketball VR.desc:
Pickup Basketball VR is a multiplayer VR game that lets up to 4 players play in various game modes including 1v1, 2v2, Horse and 3-point contest. Pickup Basketball VR allows players to compete online with or against friends and players from across the world.

This basketball game is an immersive sports gaming experience like never-before utilizing the technology of VR.

Pickup Basketball VR utilizes unique technology in allowing  for a never-before experienced simulation of basketball featuring:

- Realistic controls that involve dribbling, shooting, passing that brings you the feel of a true basketball game

- Multiplayer mode where you can play other players online and test your skills in full play pick up games

- Different court options including playground, gym, skyrise and more.

- Customize your player avatar with a variety of options including face, skin tone, hair, jersey and other accessories

Art Plunge.title: Art Plunge
Art Plunge.desc:
Art Plunge is a gallery where you can get the feeling of being inside famous paintings. This is a short but sweet experience featuring 5 VR interpretations of the following artworks:

Mona Lisa, 
Starry Night, 
The Birth of Venus, 
The Creation of Adam and 
Girl Reading a Letter at an Open Window

additional_data.Supported Controllers: Touch (as Gamepad), Oculus Touch, Hand Tracking
additional_data.Languages: English, Chinese (China), Chinese (Hong Kong), Chinese (Taiwan), Greek, Japanese, Swedish

GAIM.title: GAIM
GAIM.desc: Improve your skills as a hunter or sports shooter with GAIM virtual training simulator. Practice shooting and hunting in the comfort of your home, and with more sophisticated tools than at the shooting range. Precise barrel tracking, correct animal anatomy and correct ballistics ensure detailed understanding of your shooting technique. Together with analysis and replay of every shot, this simulator will take your training to the next level. Practice on targets where you set the distance, speed and direction then test your skills on running game in driven hunt scenarios or a set sport shooting scenario.

Squingle.title: Squingle
